title: Volandri: "La grandezza di Sinner? Non sta sul trono, ma aiuta gli altri azzurri"
content: Il 2025 di Jannik Sinner si chiuderà in casa, con le ATP Finals di Torino e le finali di Coppa Davis in programma all'Unipol Arena di Bologna tra il 18 e il 23 novembre. Sullo slancio dei trionfi del 2023 e del 2024, la nazionale azzurra punta a calare il tris davanti ai tifosi di casa. E Filippo Volandri, capitano della selezione italiana, sta seguendo con enorme attenzione il percorso di Sinner dopo il rientro dai tre mesi di sospensione, pregustando già l'atmosfera che si vivrà fra quattro mesi nel capoluogo emiliano. "Quando Jannik è in campo, quando deve giocarsi un match, è una macchina da guerra - ha dichiarato Volandri parlando alla Gazzetta dello Sport -. Quando però è in Davis, o quando ci sono altri italiani è fantastico perché si mette sempre a disposizione. È anche questa la sua grandezza : non si mette lassù sul trono da numero uno ma cerca sempre di aiutare a suo modo con una parola, uno stimolo, una domanda come ha fatto a Londra anche con Vasamì e Basile". "Il progetto è di vincere la terza entro il prossimo triennio, in cui giocheremo sempre in casa . Abbiamo una squadra talmente ricca e variegata che quando qualcuno non ce la fa, ci sono altri che stanno bene. Anche a Wimbledon, abbiamo avuto le uscite premature di Berrettini e Musetti ma abbiamo bilanciato con le buone notizie di tre italiani agli ottavi con un Sonego ritrovato, un Cobolli ai quarti e il titolo di Jannik. Abbiamo vinto Wimbledon, ragazzi".

title: Joe Rogan comes to the defense of long-time friend and employer Dana White
creator: SAM
content: or over three decades, has been the driving force behind the meteoric rise. From a floundering, underground fight promotion to a global sports juggernaut, the UFC's transformation under leadership has been nothing short of historic. As the promotion enters its 32nd year, the organization continues to thrive-now part of TKO Holdings-but much of its stability and identity still revolves around one man: White's impact on the UFC is undisputed. He's built stars, expanded the sport globally, and turned MMA into one of the fastest-growing forms of entertainment. But even a legacy like his isn't immune to controversy. In recent months, growing frustration over as heavyweight champion has created waves. Critics argue that has mismanaged the situation, leading to calls for accountability-and even demands for his resignation. Amid public outcry, Joe Rogan stands by Dana White The criticism escalated after revealed that had privately called him to vacate the heavyweight title and retire-only to later walk it back. With interim champ left in limbo, fans grew restless. Online petitions soon followed, one of which has collected over 130,000 signatures demanding Jones be stripped of the belt. Another petition, more surprisingly, called for removal from the UFC. But not everyone is turning against longtime UFC commentator and trusted voice of the sport, has come to his defense-again. Appearing recently on a podcast with wellness expert , no-nonsense leadership style, calling him 'the...

title: ООН пообещали сделать снова великой
creator: Марина Совина
content: Кандидат на должность постоянного представителя США при ООН Майк Уолтц пообещал вернуть Всемирную организацию к ее былой славе и подчеркнул важность наличия площадки, где все страны смогут свободно выражать свои мнения. Его слова приводит РИА Новости . «Но по прошествии 80 лет ООН отошла от своей основной миротворческой миссии. Мы должны вернуться к уставу и основополагающим принципам ООН», — заявил Уолтц. При этом кандидат на должность постоянного представителя США при ООН отметил, что основное внимание он намерен уделять «злонамеренным действиям» Коммунистической партии Китая . О том, что Уолтц покинул пост советника Трампа, стало известно 1 мая. По данным телеканала Fox News, его отставка связана со скандалом с мессенджером Signal.

title: Amanda Seyfried gives rare insight into family life with her 2 children and reveals her 'daunting' milestone ahead
creator: Hello!
content: Amanda Seyfried is not a regular mom, she's a cool mom! The Mean Girls star is busy making a lot of fun memories with her two children , Nina and Thomas, and opened up to HELLO! about parenthood, work, and a "daunting" milestone just months away. The Hollywood star - who shares her daughter and son with husband Thomas Sadoski - lives in Upstate New York - and loves nothing more than planning adventures with her family. "We don’t have any real traditions, but vacations are the best time to just be together without the usual work or schedules. We try to keep the days slow and open, which feels like such a luxury," she said. And where does Amanda like to go? "The Cape. It’s our happy place. We love the quiet, the beach, and just having the chance to slow down together. No big plans, just walks, food, and time to breathe." You may also like Just like many fellow parents, Amanda has one or two lifesaver hacks up her sleeve when they go out and about too. "Snacks, snacks, and more snacks. Sticker books and notebooks are life-savers too. And I always bring an empty tote bag because my kids collect everything, from rocks to napkins with drawings on them. Giving those things a place helps keep my bag from becoming a museum," she said. Amanda's children are big fans of her current collaboration with The Bellevue Hotel too. The actress - who is co-founder of plastic-free children's toy brand Make It Cute - has teamed up with the luxury Philadelphia hotel to offer guests an...

title: Ayotte vetoes Republican-backed public school book ban bill
creator: Annmarie Timmins
content: Protestors brought books that have been banned in other states to the New Hampshire State House to protest a bill that would ban some books and materials in New Hampshire public schools.(Annmarie Timmins / NHPR)Gov. Kelly Ayotte vetoed a bill Tuesday that would have allowed parents to request certain books and materials be removed from their child’s school.The Republican-backed bill targeted books, films, and other items that depicted nudity and sexual contact unless the school could show they had "serious" scientific, educational, artistic or political value.The state’s largest teacher’s union applauded Ayotte’s veto in a statement Tuesday.“Every student deserves to see themselves reflected in the pages of their books,” said Megan Tuttle, president of the New Hampshire chapter of the National Education Association. “NEA-NH applauds Governor Ayotte for standing up for the freedom to read in New Hampshire. We hope this book ban bill veto represents a changing tide at the State House and call on lawmakers to listen to Granite Staters who overwhelmingly oppose classroom censorship efforts.”The bill passed both chambers of the Legislature largely along party lines earlier this year. Parents can already opt their children out of classes and materials they find objectionable. Under this bill, materials that were successfully challenged would have been deemed out-of-bounds for all students.The legislation would have given school districts until November to establish a process for...

title: Tondela: Xavi Huarte e Brayan Medina já estão ao serviço
content: Médio espanhol e defesa-central colombiano às ordens de Ivo Vieira; Joe Hodge junta-se amanhã ao grupo, precisamente no dia em Christian Marques realiza exames médicos Xavi Huarte e Brayan Medina já trabalham em Tondela . Apesar de ainda não terem sido oficializados pelo clube - Afonso Rodrigues , extremo, ex- Famalicão , foi o único reforço até agora apresentado pelos auriverdes -, tanto o médio espanhol como o defesa-central colombiano estão devidamente integrados com os novos companheiros e passam a ser opções efetivas de Ivo Vieira. 1 julho 2025, 16:23 Mercado oficial: Tondela reforça-se com extremo ex-Famalicão Afonso Rodrigues assinou até 2028 com os auriverdes Mas as novidades para o treinador madeirense vão continuar nos próximos dias. A BOLA sabe que Joe Hodge já realizou os indispensáveis exames médicos e a partir desta quarta-feira começará a treinar na sua nova realidade. Esta quarta-feira, de resto, ficará ainda marcada pela chegada de Christian Marques aos beirões. Tal como A BOLA anunciara em primeira mão, o defesa-central internacional sub-21 português está garantido pelos tondelenses para as próximas quatro temporadas e hoje irá submeter-se a todos os procedimentos clínicos inerentes à sua contratação para depois poder, também ele, passar a trabalhar com o grupo de Ivo Vieira. 14 julho 2025, 14:18 Mercado Tondela: internacional sub-21 português está garantido Christian Marques, defesa-central que terminou contrato com os...

title: Иммиграционные власти США требуют от арендодателей сведения о клиентах
content: МОСКВА, 16 июл - РИА Новости. Иммиграционные власти США требуют, чтобы арендодатели предоставляли им информацию о своих арендаторах, передает агентство Ассошиэйтед Пресс . "Иммиграционные власти требуют, чтобы арендодатели предоставляли договоры об аренде, заявления на аренду, адреса пересылки корреспонденции, удостоверения личности и другую информацию о своих арендаторах, что является признаком того, что администрация (президента США Дональда - ред.) Трампа нацелилась на них в качестве вспомогательной меры в усилиях по массовым депортациям", - говорится в сообщении. Как рассказал агентству адвокат по сделкам с недвижимостью Эрик Тьюсинк из Атланты, арендодатели получают требование предоставить полные досье на арендаторов, в то время как заявление на аренду может включать информацию о трудовой деятельности, семейном положении и родственных связях. В требовании, поступившем в распоряжение агентства, также содержится запрос на информацию о других лицах, проживавших с арендатором. Один из документов, рассмотренный агентством, направлен из Службы гражданства и иммиграции США (USCIS), который входит в состав министерства внутренней безопасности страны. В день инаугурации 20 января Трамп в своей первой речи в должности 47-го президента США пообещал немедленно остановить проникновение нелегалов на американскую территорию и начать процесс депортации миллионов мигрантов. Он также ввел общенациональный режим чрезвычайной ситуации в связи с положением на южной границе...

title: CT paranormal investigator, 54, dies while on tour with Annabelle, said to be most haunted doll
content: The sudden death of a 54-year-old man who was on tour with Annabelle, said to be the world’s most haunted doll, is being mourned by the paranormal world.Dan Rivera was the lead investigator for the New England Society for Psychic Research or N.E.S.P.R., an organization founded by famed, late Connecticut paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren.Rivera was known for his passion in defending others against dark forces.“It is with deep sadness that Tony, Wade, and I share the sudden passing of our close friend and partner, Dan Rivera,” said a post on the organization’s Facebook page.“We are heartbroken and still processing this loss. Dan truly believed in sharing his experiences and educating people on the paranormal. His kindness and passion touched everyone who knew him. Thank you for your support and kind thoughts during this difficult time.”Rivera says in a video online that he and Lorraine Warren had an instant connection when they met on separate paranormal investigations years ago. He wound up working for the Warrens and said he and Lorraine had a special bond until her death.Rivera is said to have been on a nationwide tour with the scary Raggedy Ann doll that has been said to make bad things happen to people who anger her.They were in Gettysburg, Pa. on the “Devils on the Run Tour,” when medics were called to aid Rivera. His cause of death is pending. Speculation is already whirling online about his death.Annabelle draws huge crowds wherever she goes because of...

title: FC Porto defronta o Twente na pré-época
content: O Twente vai ser um dos adversários do FC Porto nesta pré-temporada. Os dragões vão receber a equipa dos Países Baixos a 27 de julho (domingo), às 18h00, num encontro com transmissão na Sport TV. Francesco Farioli conhece bem o Twente, que terminou no sexto lugar do campeonato dos Países Baixos. Ao serviço do Ajax, o novo técnico portista registou uma vitória (2-0) e um empate (2-2) diante deste adversário, o último que defrontou na liga neerlandesa. De recordar que o FC Porto também vai defrontar o Atlético de Madrid a 3 de agosto, no Estádio do Dragão, no jogo de apresentação aos sócios e adeptos .

title: Trump says any ‘credible’ Epstein files should be released
content: Washington, United States (AFP)-Donald Trump said Tuesday the US Justice Department should release all “credible” information from its probe into notorious sex criminal Jeffrey Epstein as he sought to douse a firestorm of criticism from his supporters over his handling of the case. The president is facing the most serious split of his political career from his famously loyal right-wing base over suspicions that his administration is covering up lurid details of Epstein’s crimes to protect rich and powerful figures they say are implicated. “The attorney general has handled that very well,” the Republican leader said of Pam Bondi, who leads the Justice Department, when he was asked about the case at the White House. Trump repeated his claim that the Epstein files were “made up” by his Democratic predecessors in the White House — even though he said multiple times during the election campaign that he would “probably” release them. “She’s handled it very well, and it’s going to be up to her,” Trump said. “Whatever she thinks is credible, she should release.” Trump’s latest comments mark a softening of his stance, after he voiced frustration in the Oval Office and online about his supporters’ fixation on Epstein and pleaded with them to move on. The president’s “Make America Great Again” (MAGA) movement has long held as an article of faith that “Deep State” elites are protecting Epstein’s most powerful associates in the Democratic Party and Hollywood. Trump has faced growing...

title: Suki Waterhouse Says She Got A Hernia From Wearing Pants That Were Too Tight
creator: HuffPost
content: Suki Waterhouse is coming clean about a unique medical setback she endured months ago. The singer shared a funny tweet revealing her recent diagnosis Monday on X: ”‘suki you never tweet anymore’ have you ever considered I wore pants so tight 6 months ago it caused a hernia & I’ve been too scared to tell you.” The 33-year-old later quoted her original tweet, adding two photos of the alleged pants in question, and then a photo of herself in what appears to be a hospital bed and gown. But that wasn’t the most shocking thing to fans. Stunned followers on X pointed out that Waterhouse had a blue vape on top of her hospital gown. “Vape in the hospital is diabolical,” one fan wrote, with Waterhouse answering, “so true.” While Waterhouse hasn’t yet shared more about her condition ― or her pants ― she has upcoming tour dates starting in August listed on her website. The singer is no stranger to performing after challenging health events in her life. Last year, she appeared on stage six weeks after giving birth to her first child with fiancé Robert Pattinson. The entertainer shared that she initially was hesitant to perform, but decided to go for it. “Like, honestly, of course [I was thinking]: ‘Holy shit, how is this going to work, is this even going to be possible?’” Waterhouse told British Vogue last year. “You just have to go, ‘This is what we’re doing, this is what we’re about and fuck what anyone else thinks,’” she added. title: Las Cuatro Milpas headed to mandated sale due to unpaid taxes
content: Las Cuatro Milpas, a dining staple in Barrio Logan for nearly a century, is facing a government-mandated sale next March after the owners failed to meet a deadline last month for gradually paying off more than $60,000 in back property taxes. The ongoing debt, which dates to the 2019-20 tax year, has not kept the popular Mexican restaurant from continuing to operate, but with a five-year repayment plan no longer an option, the fate of the Logan Avenue eatery remains more uncertain. The only way now to avoid a government sale would be to pay off the entire tax bill by next March or to simply sell the property privately before then. In addition to the property tax bill, there is more than $130,000 in other tax liens on the Las Cuatro Milpas business. The bulk of that sum — a little more than $103,000 — represents unpaid sales taxes owed the state of California for the past several years, according to lien information provided by the San Diego County assessor’s office. Most of the balance of tax debts relates to unpaid federal income tax. Margarita Hernandez, whose grandparents Petra and Natividad Estudillo opened Las Cuatro Milpas in 1933, is well aware of the tax debt the restaurant is facing but declined to answer questions this week on whether there are any plans in the near future to sell the eatery and an adjoining building that the family has long owned. Last year, Hernandez, who is in her late 70s, told the Union-Tribune that the family wasn’t ready then to sell its land...

title: La velocidad de la lectura
creator: Clarin.com - Home
content: Durante mucho tiempo el transporte más rápido por tierra fue el caballo. Galopando se podía llegar a poco más de 40 kilómetros por hora. Hoy un tren de alta velocidad supera los 300. Viajar entre Europa y América a principios del siglo XIX significaba meses. El mismo recorrido ahora es una noche. En los Juegos Olímpicos de Atenas de 1896 el récord de los 100 metros llanos fue 12,0 segundos. Usain Bolt lo superó en 2009 en Berlín con 9.58. Y a pesar de todo, y sin embargo, leemos a la misma velocidad de la época de Aristóteles. Nadie inventó (aún) una inteligencia o un procedimiento que aumente nuestra velocidad de lectura. Nadie en la vida real. En la ficción, varios. El escritor inglés H.G. Wells, por ejemplo, escribió El Nuevo Acelerador. En el cuento el profesor Gibberne decide crear una pócima que acelere el tiempo humano: el de la vida, el corazón, los pulmones, los músculos. “Imagínate con un frasquito como éste”, dice Gibberne, “y que en este precioso frasquito se encuentra el poder de pensar dos veces más rápido.” ¿Es posible?, pregunta su amigo. “Y supónte, por ejemplo, que quieres terminar un libro. O un doctor, que tiene que luchar contra la muerte y necesita concentrarse y reflexionar sobre un caso. O un abogado.” ¿Pero es posible? “Tan posible -dijo Gibberne, y miró por la ventana hacia algo que pasaba vibrando- como un autobús.” Por supuesto, lo logra. El profesor y su amigo beben el Nuevo Acelerador. La primera sorpresa ocurre cuando...

title: Un muerto y un herido tras balacera en Ponce
content: Agentes del Negociado de la Policía investigan una balacera reportada a eso de las 4:38 de la tarde de hoy, martes, en la calle Rial del sector Punta Diamante, en Ponce . Según el informe preliminar, una llamada al Sistema de Emergencias 9-1-1 alertó sobre disparos en el lugar. PUBLICIDAD Al llegar los agentes, encontraron el cuerpo baleado de un hombre dentro de un vehículo Ford Raptor color blanco. Otro hombre resultó herido de bala durante el incidente. Hasta el momento, ninguno de los involucrados ha sido identificado. Agentes de la División de Homicidios del Cuerpo de Investigaciones Criminales (CIC) de Ponce, en unión al fiscal de turno, se encuentran en camino a la escena para iniciar la investigación.

title: Clausura Corte periodo; en agosto tendrá últimas 4 sesiones
creator: Víctor Fuentes / Agencia Reforma
content: Ciudad de México.- La Suprema Corte de Justicia clausuró hoy el último periodo de sesiones de la integración derivada de la reforma judicial de 1995, que ya sólo volverá en agosto para dos sesiones de Pleno y dos de Salas.El Pleno tuvo hoy una larga sesión privada para resolver un caso de responsabilidad administrativa, y acordar el trámite, durante su receso, de inconformidades contra la elección de magistrados de la Sala Superior del Tribunal Electoral del PJF.En la sesión pública, con solo ocho Ministros presentes, se votó parcialmente un asunto, y la Presidenta Norma Piña clausuró el periodo sin dar algún mensaje.La Corte se va al receso sin haber designado a tres de los cinco integrantes del nuevo Órgano de Administración Judicial (OAJ), como ordena la Constitución, nombramientos que el gobierno y Ministras afines parecen interesados en dejarle a la nueva integración.Mil 341 pendientesCon datos al 4 de julio, la Corte tenía mil 341 asuntos pendientes de resolución, más los que seguirán ingresando hasta el 29 de agosto, último día hábil de la actual integración.En 2025, el promedio de ingreso de expedientes por día hábil ha sido de 65, por lo que en los 21 días hábiles de agosto, podrían llegar alrededor de mil 300 casos.De estos, sin embargo, entre 70 y 80 por ciento serán desechados por la Presidencia, en su mayoría amparos directos en revisión, por lo que no generan carga de trabajo para el resto de la Corte.En total, al 14 de julio...

title: Ciudadanos y policías evitan extorsión a menor de edad
creator: MANUEL JIMÉNEZ
content: Tras percatarse de que una menor de edad estaba siendo extorsionada vía telefónica, ciudadanos dieron aviso al 9-11, y con una pronta respuesta, policías municipales evitaron que se consumara el delito de extorsión, al poner a salvo a la joven; en hechos ocurridos en la ciudad de Nogales.El parte policial indica que los hechos ocurrieron el lunes 14 de julio, aproximadamente a las 14:14 horas del día, cuando una joven mujer, de 17 años de edad, estaba siendo amenazada vía telefónica, con el fin de obtener dinero mediante la extorsión.Extorsión | Foto: IlustrativaLa menor fue obligada a comprar un chip telefónico mediante amenazas, lo que alertó a personas que se encontraban cerca de la menor, quienes llamaron a la línea de emergencia 9-11, para reportar la situación.De acuerdo con el informe, los oficiales actuaron de manera oportuna al localizar a la menor en la plaza Busto a Colosio, evitando así que la extorsión se consumara; para posteriormente ser trasladada a las oficinas de seguridad pública.Extorsión | Foto: IlustrativaLa madre de la menor fue alertada de lo sucedido, por lo que se dirigió al lugar donde estaba siendo resguardada la menor. El reporte indica que se ofreció ayuda sicologica a la menor para atender cualquier afectación emocional derivada de los hechos.Tras verse a salvo y recibir orientación de la corporación policiaca, la menor se retiró del lugar con su madre, mientras que los oficiales dieron aviso al Centro de Atención...

title: Love Island fans say star 'needs to stop' after 'bitter' row
creator: staronline@reachplc.com (Danni King)
content: The drama continued on Love Island as Tuesday's (15th July) episode brought a fresh wave of tension to the villa, with a dumping and recoupling sending shockwaves through the contestants. The complicated love triangle between Harrison, Lauren, and Toni remained a focal point, but things escalated when Toni discovered Harrison and Lauren had taken their romance to the next level. Furious, Toni told Harrison she was done with him and no longer wanted any part in the situation, before confronting Lauren in a heated chat. Toni snapped at Lauren, saying: "You don't deserve to be sitting there crying, because that was me two weeks ago." Lauren fired back, unimpressed: "OK, well thanks. But, I'll make my own decision about mine and Harrison's situation." Toni made it clear she'd made up her mind about Harrison, telling Lauren she was at a loss for words but knew the pair would never see eye-to-eye while in the villa, reports OK! . The conversation left Love Island fans stunned, with many feeling it had portrayed Toni in a negative light. "Toni needs to stop this. Bless her she's hurting so much #Loveisland," one viewer tweeted, while another wrote: "This toni crash out is making me cringe #LoveIslandUK #LoveIsland." A third fan chimed in: "Hate to say it but Toni is coming off as really bitter #LoveIsland," and a fourth added: "naaa Toni this is ridiculous." "Toni is wrong for that cause what's the vim for Lauren? All over a silly boy like Harrison #LoveIsland," another fan...

title: Bridge opening: Shivamogga MP flags last-minute plan change by govt
creator: DHNS
content: Shivamogga: A day after Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah’s absence at the inauguration of India’s second-longest cable-stayed bridge across River Sharavathi in Shivamogga district, triggered a political slugfest, Shivamogga MP B Y Raghavendra on Tuesday accused the state government of changing its position on the event at the last minute..“Despite all the negative publicity about the event, the inauguration of the bridge went off successfully,” said Raghavendra..The Shivamogga MP also took exception with Karnataka Public Works Minister Satish Jarkiholi not attending the event. “He (Satish) stated that he would attend the event. In fact, Satish was at Sigandur where the puja was held. But he returned without attending the inaugural ceremony, perhaps at the instance of the government, which was very unfortunate,” said Raghavendra..Siddaramaiah writes to PM Modi, alleges Gadkari's Shivamogga event was breach of protocol .Responding to AICC general secretary in-charge of Karnataka Randeep Surjewala’s remarks that the BJP had insulted the seven crore people of the state, Raghavendra said, “I merely discharged my duty as the MP for Shivamogga. Neither I nor members of my family are looking to extract any political mileage from the event.”.Continuing his attack on the Congress government, he added, “The state government, which organised a celebratory event to commemorate RCB’s IPL victory in a day’s notice, is now giving excuses for playing truant at the inaugural ceremony....

title: ФСБ показала видео задержания начальника полиции аэропорта Нижнего Новгорода
content: Федеральная служба безопасности (ФСБ) опубликовала видео задержания начальника полиции аэропорта Нижнего Новгорода. Кадры предоставлены РИА Новости. На записи видно, как сотрудники ФСБ задерживают руководителя отдела транспортной полиции и других работников аэропорта. В ролике также показаны миграционные карты с разрешением на выезд из страны, а также деньги и украшения. Ранее сообщалось , что начальника полиции аэропорта Нижнего Новгорода Мусаева задержали по подозрению в организации незаконной миграции. Предполагается, что он мог использовать связи с азербайджанской диаспорой региона для реализации преступного плана. В транспортной полиции Приволжского федерального округа сообщили, что в случае подтверждения вины Мусаев и его сообщники будут уволены.

title: Dems press Waltz on Hegseth sharing 'demonstrably sensitive information' in Signal chat
content: Sen. Tim Kaine, D-Va., questioned Mike Waltz on Pentagon investigations related to the Signalgate group chat that was used to discuss strikes against Houthis and Hegseth's role in the chat. Democratic lawmakers zeroed in on Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth’s role in a Signal group chat during a confirmation hearing for former National Security Advisor Mike Waltz to serve as ambassador to the U.N. Waltz came under scrutiny after his team set up a Signal group chat to discuss strikes against the Houthis. A journalist from the Atlantic was accidentally included along with other top administration officials, including Hegseth, Vice President JD Vance and Secretary of State Marco Rubio. While Sen. Tim Kaine, D-Va., said it was an "amateurish move" for Waltz’s office to include the journalist, Kaine said that nothing indicated Waltz shared classified information in the chat. But Kaine said there are at least two Pentagon investigations underway, one with the Pentagon inspector general and another with the Air Force, to determine whether Hegseth did disclose classified information in the chats when he discussed specific aircraft and times of the strikes. ‘PROFOUND COWARDICE’: BOOKER SLAMS WALTZ FOR ‘FAILURE OF LEADERSHIP,' SIGNALGATE ACCOUNTABILITY Sen. Tim Kaine, D-Va., speaks during a confirmation hearing before the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations in the Dirksen Senate Office Building July 15, 2025, in Washington. (Getty Images) "They haven't yet reached a conclusion, but...

content: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. You can interchange the charms to customize the case to fit your mood for the day. title: The Jonas Brothers reflect on the band's longevity and reveal their backstage essentials
content: In USA TODAY’s The Essentials , celebrities share what fuels their lives, whether it's at home, on set, or on the road. NEW YORK – The Jonas Brothers still know how to strike an emotional chord. The band's latest love song, "When You Know," has the group in its feels. "There's that feeling when things are either right or wrong, when it's time to stay (or) when it's time to go," Joe Jonas , 35, tells USA TODAY of the song. "If there's that one person that's always gonna have your heart. It's hopefully something people can relate to. It's probably the most emotional song on this album." It's a similar emotion to when the group performs their " Little Bird ," which perhaps walked so "When You Know" could fly. The middle brother of the group, Jonas is no stranger to getting personal through music. Jonas previously told USA TODAY that the group would be "fighting back tears" when they performed father/daughter bond ballad "Little Bird," off 2023's "The Album." He released a solo LP, "Music for People Who Believe in Love," in May, after his split from ex Sophie Turner . The new track will appear on the Jonas Brothers' seventh studio LP, "Greetings from Your Hometown," out Aug. 8. Ahead of its release, the three brothers chat with USA TODAY about personal moments with fans, receiving a blessing from the Bee Gees' Barry Gibb and their go-to lunch while on tour. The Jonas Brothers surprise fans with personal performance Equally as personal for the group is how family bonds can be...

title: Fiscales de EU piden frenar redadas de ICE con agentes enmascarados y vestidos de civil
content: A través de una carta dirigida a todos los miembros del Congreso de Estados Unidos, este lunes los fiscales generales de veinte estados solicitaron la aprobación de una ley que prohíba a los agentes del Servicio de Inmigración y Control de Aduanas (ICE, por sus siglas en inglés) realizar redadas portando máscaras que cubran sus rostros y vestidos de civil. En el comunicado, la coalición liderada por la fiscal general de Nueva York, Letitia James, expresó su preocupación ante el hecho de que los agentes de ICE puedan llevar a cabo detenciones sin identificarse, lo cual consideran una violación a los derechos civiles. LEE: Trump presiona a la Reserva Federal a bajar las tasas; asegura que inflación es "muy baja" "Es profundamente preocupante que, en Estados Unidos, agentes enmascarados puedan detener a personas en las calles, en vehículos sin identificación, sin siquiera identificarse como agentes del orden", señala el documento. Los fiscales generales —entre los que se encuentran representantes de estados como C alifornia, Massachusetts y el Distrito de Columbia — exigen que los agentes se identifiquen de forma clara, tanto a nivel personal como institucional, en cualquier operación realizada en espacios públicos “para el cumplimiento de la ley civil”. Además, advierten que, de no cambiar esta situación, se estaría permitiendo una "amenaza a la seguridad pública" y una evasión de la rendición de cuentas que "infunde temor en comunidades de todo el...

title: LVBP: Caribes de Anzoátegui definió plan con los importados para la campaña 2025-26
content: A falta de unos tres meses para que inicie la temporada 2025-26 de la Liga Venezolana de Beisbol Profesional (LVBP), Caribes de Anzoátegui quiere presentar el mejor equipo posible para el día inaugural, con el objetivo de retornar a Postemporada, una instancia donde siempre se mostró protagonista durante la década pasada. Por esta razón, la dirigencia del elenco oriental, con el gerente deportivo, Otto Padrón , como uno de los que encabeza este grupo, busca moverse a medida de que se acerca la fecha de inicio del torneo. En una conversación exclusiva con Meridiano Online , el directivo habló sobre los planes para la contratación de importados y la confección de la plantilla. " Con respecto a los importados, hemos avanzado. Serán seis lanzadores y el plan es tener tres abridores e igual número de relevistas o contar con abridores y dos relevistas" , comentó Padrón. Sin embargo, todavía no es algo concreto, sino que se irá decidiendo de acuerdo a las incorporaciones que sume Caribes de Anzoátegui en las próximas semanas. "Todo esto depende de con que contemos de material criollo y de los permisos que estamos tramitando", afirmó. En la campaña 2024-25 de la LVBP también se hizo énfasis en traer lanzadores importados, con cuatro al momento de iniciar la temporada. No obstante, el rendimiento no fue el esperado en la mayoría de los casos, como se demostró con el hecho que La Tribu ocupo el penúltimo puesto en efectividad colectiva, con un promedio de...

title: ¿Pueden los agentes de inmigración exigir información sobre inquilinos a propietarios? Advierten que ICE ya lo hace
content: Las autoridades de inmigración en Estados Unidos están exigiendo a los propietarios de viviendas que entreguen información detallada sobre sus inquilinos , incluyendo contratos de arrendamiento, solicitudes de alquiler, direcciones de reenvío e identificaciones. Esta medida, revelada por The Associated Press , sugiere que la administración Trump está focalizándose en los propietarios para que colaboren en su estrategia de deportaciones masivas. Eric Teusink , un abogado de bienes raíces en Atlanta , ha confirmado que varios de sus clientes han recibido recientemente citaciones judiciales (subpoenas) solicitando expedientes completos de sus inquilinos. Las citaciones, de dos páginas y descritas como “subpoenas de cumplimiento de información” , también piden datos sobre otras personas que residen con el inquilino. Una de ellas, fechada el 1 de mayo, está firmada por un oficial de la unidad antifraude de la Oficina de Ciudadanía y Servicios de Inmigración de EE.UU. (USCIS) , pero carece de la firma de un juez . Aún se desconoce la magnitud de estas citaciones, pero podrían indicar una nueva fase en los esfuerzos de la administración por localizar a personas que se encuentran en el país de forma irregular, muchas de las cuales proporcionaron sus direcciones en el país norteamericano como condición para su entrada inicial sin visado. La legalidad de estas demandas está siendo cuestionada por expertos legales y administradores de propiedades, quienes señalan...

title: Couple of random thoughts on first two days of the SEC Media Daze
content: FAYETTEVILLE, Ark. — There haven't been any bombshells dropped at SEC Media Days in Atlanta, but there are some nuggets that Arkansas fans would find interesting. By the time Razorbacks coach Sam Pittman along with quarterback Taylen Green, linebacker Xavian Sorey Jr. and defensive lineman Cam Ball take the stage Thursday afternoon, a big chunk of the media will be long gone. In the first couple of days, the Hogs haven't gotten many mentions that made the air. One, though, a lot of folks weren't expecting did. And Razorback fans have noticed. As nearly every talking head on TV has made predictions for the coming year, one team at the top not what folks around hear have really considered. They've been talking for months that a November game against LSU is one that's "gettable" (with a copyright attribution to Ruscin & Zach on ESPN Arkansas). Now the Tigers are going to be a team getting a lot of picks to win both the SEC Championship and even the national title. A lot of that is because Brian Kelly has put together what the 247Sports composite transfer ranking lists as the No. 1 team. Apparently that's getting more respect than many fans think. As if November wasn't already shaping up to be difficult with Arkansas have back-to-back road games in the 10th and 11th slots on the schedule now there are two teams getting mentioned as the best in college football. That has been a somewhat surprising tidbit. Not that LSU is being mentioned as good, but the number of people putting...

title: Нет ни одного солнечного окуня: ученые сделали интересное открытие о рыбе в зоне ЧАЭС
content: В Чернобыльской зоне отчуждения вылавливали рыбу – сугубо с исследовательской целью. Ученые определяли, какие виды есть в низовьях рек Уж и Припять, а также в водоемах осушительной системы. Сотрудники Чернобыльского радиационно-экологического биосферного заповедника обнаружили, что там водятся 19 видов рыб, и среди них инвазионных (то есть чужеродных в этой местности) практически нет . Результатами исследователи поделились на сайте ЧРЭБЗ. Большинство видов являются типичными представителями фауны Полесья, инвазионных встречалось крайне мало. " Не зафиксировано ни одного амурского чебачка или солнечного окуня, а ротань и серебристый карась встречались очень редко . Это может свидетельствовать об относительно стабильном состоянии водоемов и ихтиоценозов, а также о том, что в ненарушенных экосистемах чужеродным видам сложно закрепиться", – рассказали сотрудники ЧРЭБЗ. Ихтиоценоз – это группировка взаимно связанных видов рыб, которые сосуществуют в определенной водной среде. Исследователи рассказали, что ихтиологические исследования проводили в рамках программы Летописи природы в Чернобыльском заповеднике. ЧРЭБЗ получил лимиты и соответствующие разрешения на изъятие водных биоресурсов. "Вылов осуществляли с помощью ловушек, малькового волока и жаберных сетей. Особенностью нынешних исследований стало использование разновозрастной жаберной сети, которая соответствует европейскому стандарту EN 14757:2015. Этот метод позволяет получить полную картину видового и...

title: Долгожданную Toyota RAV4 показали в другом дизайне. Фото
content: Новый кроссовер Toyota RAV4 2026 модельного года оказался долгожданным автомобилем, который уже полностью рассекретили официально. Однако многим эта модель не дает покоя, поэтому ее показали в другом дизайне. Модель ранее продемонстрировали после официальной премьеры. Но на канале LUXYCAR новую Toyota RAV4 6 поколения показали с альтернативным дизайном. Это своеобразное визуальное рассуждение на тему возможного облика японского кроссовера. Автомобиль опять будет соперничать с Kia Sportage, Mazda CX-5, Hyundai Tucson и другими популярными моделями сегмента недорогих кроссоверов. Дизайн Toyota RAV4 изменился полностью. Спереди появились новые фирменные фары Toyota С-образной формы. Они уже есть на Camry, гибриде Prius, электрокарах линейки bZ. Задние фонари получили геометричную форму и стильную графику. Стандартные гибриды Toyota RAV4 теперь предлагают 229 и 239 л.с. Плагин-гибридные кроссоверы выдают 268 и 320 сил. Последний предлагает запас хода до 1350 км с заряженной батареей и полным баком (150 км исключительно на электротяге). Купить Toyota RAV4 6 поколения можно будет до конца 2025 года. OBOZ.UA ранее рассказывал про новый кроссовер Mazda .

title: Tish Cyrus Got Too High at One of Daughter Miley's Birthday Parties: 'I Was Coming Freaking Unglued'
creator: People
content: NEED TO KNOW Tish Cyrus and her daughter Brandi are reminiscing on high times. During the Tuesday, July 15 episode of Boyfriend Material with Harry Jowsey , the mother-daughter duo recalled a time when Tish, 58, got way too high from a weed brownie at one of daughter Miley Cyrus ' birthday parties. Jowsey, 28, asked Tish if there was a time she "accidentally got too high" before she became sober. "It was not good at all," Tish said. Brandi, 38, chimed in that it had happened "a few times." The incident that Tish recalled happened when Cyrus, 32, had a birthday party at Beacher's Madhouse in Hollywood. "Miley would have parties there and it was a whole thing, but this was actually before I smoked, and I ate some brownies at the party," Tish explained, saying that she went home and then fell asleep. Two hours later, "everything was spinning and I was coming freaking unglued," Tish continued, "and I actually called Miley and I was like, 'Oh my gosh, Mile. I feel so weird and so sick. I need to go to the emergency room. You have to come get me right now.' " Tish said the "Flowers" singer was concerned and recalled Tish being fine when they saw each other a few hours ago. "She was like, 'Did you eat something? Tell me,' and I was like, 'No. The only thing I ate was a brownie.' and she goes, 'At Beacher’s?' and I'm like, 'Yes.' " Miley informed Tish that she had eaten a weed brownie and asked how much of it she ate. Tish had eaten the "whole thing." "She's like, 'Holy crap,' "...

title: Немає жодного сонячного окуня: вчені зробили цікаве відкриття щодо риби в зоні ЧАЕС
content: У Чорнобильській зоні відчуження виловлювали рибу – суто з дослідницькою метою. Учені визначали, які види є в пониззі річок Уж і Прип’ять, а також у водоймах осушувальної системи. Співробітники Чорнобильського радіаційно-екологічного біосферного заповідника виявили, що там водяться 19 видів риб, і серед них інвазійних (тобто чужорідних у цій місцевості) практично немає . Результатами дослідники поділилися на сайті ЧРЕБЗ. Більшість видів є типовими представниками фауни Полісся, інвазійних траплялося вкрай мало. " Не зафіксовано жодного амурського чебачка чи сонячного окуня, а ротань і сріблястий карась траплялись дуже рідко . Це може свідчити про відносно стабільний стан водойм та іхтіоценозів, а також про те, що в непорушених екосистемах чужорідним видам складно закріпитися", – розповіли співробітники ЧРЕБЗ. Іхтіоценоз – це угруповання взаємно пов'язаних видів риб, які співіснують у певному водному середовищі. Дослідники розповіли, що іхтіологічні дослідження проводили в межах програми Літопису природи в Чорнобильському заповіднику. ЧРЕБЗ отримав ліміти й відповідні дозволт на вилучення водних біоресурсів. "Вилов здійснювали за допомогою пасток, малькового волоку та зябрових сіток. Особливістю цьогорічних досліджень стало використання різновічкової зябрової сітки, яка відповідає європейському стандарту EN 14757:2015. Цей метод дозволяє отримати повнішу картину видового та розмірного складу риб, а результати співставні з міжнародними даними", – зазначили...

title: Довгоочікувану Toyota RAV4 показали в іншому дизайні. Фото
content: Новий кросовер Toyota RAV4 2026 модельного року виявився довгоочікуваним автомобілем, який вже повністю розсекретили офіційно. Однак багатьом ця модель не дає спокою, тому її показали в іншому дизайні. Модель раніше продемонстрували після офіційної прем'єри. Але на каналі LUXYCAR нову Toyota RAV4 6 покоління показали з альтернативним дизайном. Це своєрідне візуальне міркування на тему можливого вигляду японського кросовера. Автомобіль знову змагатиметься з Kia Sportage, Mazda CX-5, Hyundai Tucson та іншими популярними моделями сегмента недорогих кросоверів. Дизайн Toyota RAV4 змінився повністю. Спереду з'явилися нові фірмові фари Toyota С-подібної форми. Вони вже є на Camry, гібриді Prius, електрокарах лінійки bZ. Задні ліхтарі отримали геометричну форму і стильну графіку. Стандартні гібриди Toyota RAV4 тепер пропонують 229 і 239 к.с. Плагін-гібридні кросовери видають 268 і 320 сил. Останній пропонує запас ходу до 1350 км із зарядженою батареєю і повним баком (150 км виключно на електротязі). Купити Toyota RAV4 6 покоління можна буде до кінця 2025 року. OBOZ.UA раніше розповідав про новий кросовер Mazda .

title: Oto co Chris Evert powiedziała na wizji o Idze Świątek. Poszło w świat
creator: Paweł Matys
content: Iga Świątek (3. WTA ) w sobotę wygrała szósty w karierze turniej wielkoszlemowy. Była liderka światowego rankingu w finale upokorzyła Amandę Anisimową (7. WTA), pokonując ją 6:0, 6:0. Amerykanka od początku meczu grała bardzo nerwowo, popełniła prawie trzy razy więcej niewymuszonych błędów (28 przy 11. Świątek). - Chyba zamarłam trochę przez nerwy. Już przed meczem byłam zdenerwowana, ale nie jakoś ekstremalnie. Może też trochę opadłam z sił po tych dwóch tygodniach walki - powiedziała Anisimowa po meczu. "The Sun" pisze, co Chris Evert mówiła podczas transmisji finału Wimbledonu Na temat gry Anisimowej głos zabrała legendarna tenisistka Chris Evert. "Ona tam zamarzła, jest sparaliżowana, przeżywa koszmar. Myślę, że ma naprawdę mało w "baku". Wcześniej miała kilka emocjonujących pojedynków i teraz jest wyczerpana. Musi spróbować znaleźć w sobie trochę energii" - mówiła Evert podczas transmisji finału, teraz cytowana przez brytyjski dziennik "The Sun". Evert chwaliła też Igę Świątek. "Świątek zawsze miała problemy na Wimbledonie i często była rozczarowana po występie tutaj. Ona uwielbia się ślizgać, a na trawie nie można tego robić. Teraz żyje w swoim własnym małym świecie, jest skupiona, skoncentrowana. Polka pokazuje klasę, dlatego jest jedną z najlepszych zawodniczek świata" - dodała Evert. Zobacz także: Niewiarygodne słowa. Naczelny hejter Świątek zaskakuje po Wimbledonie Na początku czerwca była legendarna...

title: Sınır kenti Kilis'te 15 Temmuz Demokrasi ve Milli Birlik Günü etkinliği
content: Suriye sınırına sıfır noktada bulunan Kilis 'te 15 Temmuz Demokrasi ve Milli Birlik Günü etkinliği düzenlendi. Anma programına katılan Kilis Valisi Tahir Şahin , Belediye Başkanı Hakan Bilecen , Garnizon Komutanı Ersin Özbalcı, Cumhuriyet Başsavcısı Emre Kaya , İl Jandarma Komutanı Halil Coşkun, İl Emniyet Müdürü Aykut Korkmaz, kurum müdürleri, gaziler, şehit yakınları ve yüzlerce vatandaş, Hacı Cümbüş Kavşağı'ndan başlayarak Cumhuriyet Meydanı 'na kadar kortej yürüyüşü gerçekleştirdi. Yürüyüşün ardından meydanda saygı duruşunda bulunuldu, İstiklal Marşı okundu ve şehitler için dualar edildi. Programda Kur'an-ı Kerim tilavetiyle birlikte 15 Temmuz'da şehit düşen vatandaşların isimleri tek tek anons edildi. Kilis Valisi Tahir Şahin, "O gece aziz milletimiz, Cumhurbaşkanımız Sayın Recep Tayyip Erdoğan 'ın tarihi çağrısına uyarak canı pahasına devletine, bayrağına, ezanına, istiklaline ve istikbaline sahip çıktı. Çünkü biz biliyoruz ki millet iradesinin üzerinde hiçbir güç yoktur. Darbe girişimi adı altında yürütülen bu ihanet hareketi, milletimizin çelikten iradesine çarparak paramparça oldu. Bu millet tankların önüne bedenini siper etti, uçaklara imanla karşı koydu, namlulara göğsünü gerdi" dedi. Konuşmasında birlik ve beraberlik vurgusu yapan Şahin, "Özgürlüğün, demokrasinin ve bağımsızlığın adı Türkiye 'dir. Hiçbir ihanet şebekesi bu milleti esir alamaz. Rabbim bu millete bir daha böyle...

title: Vuelca camión en Santa Fe
creator: Roberto Sánchez
content: Tijuana BC.- El conductor de un camión de redilas resultó con lesiones luego de que la unidad se volcó cuando circulaba por la avenida Paseo Alicante del Fraccionamiento Santa Fe Quinta Sección.Residentes de la localidad contactaron a las autoridades a las 06:50 horas de ayer tras presenciar como el vehículo, que no transportaba carga, cayó sobre su lado derecho en la entrada de una privada.Rápidamente acudió personal de bomberos para auxiliar en las labores de rescate del chófer, pero a su llegada al sitio se percataron de que el individuo había logrado salir por sus propios medios. Te puede interesar: Vinculan a uno en Rosarito por robo con violenciaSin riesgoParamédicos de la Cruz Roja valoraron al conductor, cuyas lesiones no ponían en riesgo su vida y no fue necesario su traslado a un hospital, mientras policías municipales resguardaron la escena.Presuntamente, la unidad, había sufrido una falla mecánica que originó el percance, así como golpes a la maya de una pequeña canalización que divide ambos sentidos de la vialidad.Por su parte, los habitantes de la Privada Savena se vieron afectados porque el camión obstruía la reja de salida, lo que ocasionó que no pudieran sacar sus vehículos a la vía pública. Algunos minutos más tarde, la unidad fue colocada en su posición original con ayuda de una grúa que después la remolcó a un corralón municipal como parte de las investigaciones.

title: Solon’s first cannabis dispensary is opening soon
content: SOLON, Ohio — Solon is getting a new kind of green business this July: its very first cannabis dispensary. The Botanist, located at 33113 Aurora Road, is preparing to open its doors pending final approval from the Ohio Division of Cannabis Control. Kate Ols, executive vice president of revenue for The Botanist, said they are hopeful that approval will come this week. Once open, the dispensary will serve both medical marijuana patients and adult-use customers. The company also plans to launch a drive-thru soon after opening, giving shoppers a convenient and discreet way to pick up orders without leaving their car. The dispensary’s opening comes as Solon officials consider new zoning regulations that would limit how close marijuana dispensaries and vape shops can be to each other. The proposed changes aim to prevent over-concentration, promote public health and reduce youth exposure to cannabis and vape marketing. A text amendment to the zoning code was set to be discussed at the June 24 Planning Commission meeting. If approved, its would still require City Council approval before taking effect. “The Botanist Solon is our first dispensary in the city, a thoughtfully repurposed space completely reimagined for today’s cannabis customer,” Ols said. “This location also features one of Northeast Ohio’s first cannabis drive-throughs, launching shortly after opening, and is designed to serve both medical and adult-use guests with convenience, professionalism and care.” City leaders...

title: Woman's Fiancé Calls Her 'Lazy' for Wanting to Hire a Full-Time Maid. He Thinks She Should 'Do More Around the House'
creator: People
content: NEED TO KNOW A woman turns to the Reddit community for advice following a heated disagreement with her fiancé over hiring a full-time maid. She shares that both she and her partner have good jobs and split their finances evenly, but she actually earns a bit more than he does. They live together with two large dogs, a golden retriever and a border collie, which means their house gets messy quickly. “When we first moved in, I took on most of the cleaning and cooking,” she writes in her post , explaining how she enjoyed cooking for her fiancé at first, and sometimes they would order takeout when she was too tired. But the demands of juggling work, house chores and cooking eventually became overwhelming for her. “After months of juggling work, house chores, and cooking — sometimes even having to cook while in the middle of meetings — I burned out. Completely,” she confides. The couple agreed to hire a part-time maid, which she says isn’t expensive where they live, and it helped lighten her load. However, the maid doesn’t come every day, so she still finds herself making breakfast for both of them and serving it before he wakes up. Recently, she suggested hiring someone to clean every weekday to keep the house in shape and relieve some of her stress. Her fiancé’s reaction was less than supportive. “He got really upset and said it wasn’t necessary, that I’m being lazy, and that I’m trying to avoid any responsibility for housework,” she reveals. She points out that she has...

title: وزير الطوارئ السوري يعلن إخماد حرائق اللاذقية
content: أعلن وزير الطوارئ السوري رائد الصالح، انتهاء إخماد حرائق اللاذقية، مشدداً على أن التحدي القادم هو إعادة تأهيل الغابات المتضررة، ومؤكداً أن الكارثة الحقيقية تكمن في تداعيات ما بعد الحريق، رغم ما تحقق من إنجاز ميداني واسع. وحذر وزير الطوارئ وإدارة الكوارث السوري خلال مؤتمر صحفي مشترك مع محافظ اللاذقية محمد عثمان في المدينة، من تداعيات خطيرة قد تمتد لسنوات، موضحا أن ما تحقق هو نتيجة لـ"تكافل وطني وشعبي واسع، وتعاون ميداني بين مؤسسات الدولة والفرق التطوعية والدولية"، وفق ما نقلت وكالة الأنباء السورية "سانا". وأضاف الصالح أن : "النار انتهت، لكن المهمة لم تنته، ومن اليوم تبدأ مهمتنا الحقيقية لإعادة الحياة إلى هذه الجبال"، في إشارة إلى بدء جهود إعادة التأهيل وإحياء الغابات المتضررة. وتوجه وزير الطوارئ السوري بالشكر إلى الفرق القادمة من تركيا والأردن والعراق ولبنان وقطر، "وإلى جميع الفرق التطوعية التي كان لها دور مهم في الدعم اللوجستي، إضافة إلى وزارات الدولة ومؤسساتها التي عملت بتناغم ومسؤولية".

title: El papa León XIV evoca la histórica ‘tregua de Navidad’ de 1914: «Siempre es posible encontrarse»
content: Ciudad del Vaticano (EFE).- León XIV evocó este martes la histórica ‘tregua de Navidad’ entre soldados enemigos en 1914 y aseguró que «siempre es posible encontrarse, incluso en tiempos de divisiones, bombas y guerras», con motivo de un partido de fútbol benéfico entre políticos y cantantes italianos. En su mensaje para el tradicional ‘El Partido del Corazón’, el papa destacó el profundo significado de esta iniciativa que une deporte, solidaridad y compromiso social y que este año se realiza en apoyo a los niños que llegan a Italia desde zonas de guerra, un proyecto impulsado por el Hospital y la Fundación Bambino Gesù junto con Cáritas Italia. El deporte como inclusión El pontífice recordó la “tregua de Navidad” de 1914, cuando soldados alemanes, franceses y británicos se reunieron espontáneamente cerca de la ciudad belga de Ypres para jugar un partido de fútbol en medio de la Primera Guerra Mundial y comparó ese gesto con el evento benéfico para ayudar a los niños que sufren por los conflictos bélicos. “Todavía es posible —siempre es posible— encontrarse, incluso en tiempos de divisiones, de bombas y de guerras”, afirmó, subrayando la urgencia de crear espacios para el diálogo y la reconciliación. También valoró la participación de los equipos formados por políticos y cantantes, señalando que tanto la política como la música pueden ser instrumentos de unidad y esperanza. “La política puede unir en lugar de dividir, si se dedica al arte...

title: Pope Leo XIV delivers heartfelt homily on divine love and unity during Mass with Carabinieri at Castel Gandolfo chapel in Italy
creator: Temitope Oke
content: While taking a short summer break in the peaceful hills of Castel Gandolfo, Pope Leo XIV didn’t take a break from his spiritual mission.On July 15, he chose to celebrate Mass not at the Vatican but at the local Carabinieri station’s chapel—bringing faith, reflection, and unity to the very people responsible for keeping the peace.The Carabinieri, Italy’s military police force, welcomed the Holy Father into their modest chapel, where he offered both a homily and heartfelt words of encouragement during his time away from Rome.A Family Beyond BloodReflecting on the day’s Gospel reading from Matthew 11:20–24, Pope Leo shared a moving message: there is a connection between people that runs even deeper than blood—one rooted in Christ.He reminded those present that, “We are truly brothers and sisters of Jesus when we do the will of God.”That means living in love, not just talking about it—choosing compassion, mercy, and kindness in the way God asks us to.God’s Family Is a GiftThe Pope expanded on this idea by painting a beautiful picture of divine relationship.He said that God doesn’t keep his love to Himself.“When his only Son becomes our brother, his Father becomes our Father, and the Holy Spirit, who unites them, comes to dwell in our hearts,” he explained.It’s not just about following rules—it’s about embracing a relationship that transforms the way we live and see others.Mary’s Role as Our Spiritual MotherFrom the Castel Gandolfo chapel, Pope Leo also spoke about Mary, Jesus’...

title: 11 remedios caseros para combatir los síntomas de la gripa: con ingredientes que seguro tiene en casa
content: Frente a los drásticos cambios de temperatura que caracterizan la temporada actual, muchas personas buscan alternativas naturales para prevenir o mitigar los síntomas de la gripe. Aunque estos remedios caseros no sustituyen la atención médica, pueden ofrecer alivio temporal y complementar el tratamiento recomendado por un profesional de la salud. (Además: El tubérculo que regula los niveles de azúcar en la sangre, controla la presión arterial y mantiene sus ojos sanos ). A continuación, se detallan once remedios tradicionales y accesibles, muchos de ellos respaldados por instituciones como Mayo Clinic, que pueden ayudar a mejorar el bienestar general durante un resfriado común: 1. Miel con limón: alivio para la garganta La mezcla de una cucharada de miel con el jugo de medio limón puede suavizar la garganta irritada. El limón, por ser un cítrico, aporta vitamina C , mientras que la miel tiene propiedades antibacterianas. Versátil en la cocina, mejora el bienestar físico y emocional con su consumo regular. Foto: iStock 2. Ajo: refuerzo del sistema inmune Consumir ajo crudo o incorporado a las comidas puede fortalecer el sistema inmunitario. Su compuesto activo, la alicina, posee efectos antiinflamatorios y antibacterianos, además de ayudar a mejorar la circulación. 3. Jarabe de cebolla: remedio contra la tos Preparado con una cebolla grande, tres cucharadas de miel, hojas de eucalipto y un chorrito de vino tinto, este jarabe se deja macerar toda la noche y...

title: Foragida na Itália, Zambelli entrega imóvel funcional com atraso e pode ser multada
creator: Marina Verenicz

Por conta disso, poderá ser multada em mais de R$ 7 mil.O imóvel era utilizado pela parlamentar, sua mãe e seu filho, antes de ela deixar o país para escapar da prisão preventiva determinada pelo Supremo Tribunal Federal (STF).Zambelli teve a prisão decretada pelo ministro Alexandre de Moraes após ser condenada a 10 anos de reclusão por envolvimento na invasão do sistema do Conselho Nacional de Justiça (CNJ), em parceria com o hacker Walter Delgatti Neto. title: Trump’s Big Crypto Bills Blocked By House Republicans — Here’s Why.
creator: Sara Dorn, Forbes Staff
content: A group of House Republicans blocked a package of crypto bills from moving forward for a final vote Tuesday, contesting President Donald Trump, whose personal businesses have become more deeply involved in crypto. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, R-Ga., arrives for a meeting of the House Republican Conference at the ... More Capitol Hill Club on Tuesday, June 10, 2025. (Tom Williams/CQ-Roll Call, Inc via Getty Images) Thirteen Republicans, mostly hardline conservatives, voted alongside Democrats in a 196-223 vote against a procedural motion to move three crypto bills forward. The bills include what’s known as the GENIUS Act to regulate stablecoins, the Digital Asset Market Clarity Act and the Anti-CBDC Surveillance State Act. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, R-Ga., said she voted against the rule for debating the legislation because House Speaker Mike Johnson, R-La., did not allow members to submit amendments and because the GENIUS Act does not include a ban on a Central Bank Digital Currency (though the Anti-CBDC Surveillance State Act explicitly prohibits the Central Bank from issuing a digital currency). Johnson told reporters House members who blocked the legislation did so because they want to see all three bills joined together in one package, which would allow them to wield more control over the regulations. Earlier Tuesday, Trump urged the House to “get the first Vote done this afternoon” and told “ALL REPUBLICANS” to “VOTE YES” in a post on Truth Social , acknowledging what...

title: Pineapple Financial announces 1-for-20 reverse stock split
content: Pineapple Financial ( OTC:PAPLF ) announced on Tuesday that it will implement a 1-for-20 reverse stock split of its common shares, effective as of July 16. Following the reverse split, the number of outstanding common shares will adjust from 20,092,025 common shares to 1,004,675 common shares. The company said one of the primary goals of the reverse stock split is to increase the per-share market price of its common shares to enable the company to regain compliance with the NYSE American's Listing Qualifications. title: Obra de arte del gol favorito de Messi se estrena en New York
creator: Diego Mauricio Magaña Gorostieta
content: Hace algunas semanas Lionel Messi eligió el gol que marcó en la final de la Champions League de 2009 en Roma ante el Manchester United como el tanto favorito en su carrera , el cual en conjunto con el artista Refik Anadol y la fundación Inter Miami recrearon como una obra de arte que por fin vio la luz. Este martes, Lionel Messi anunció a través de redes sociales la inauguración de la exposición que muestra dicha obra de arte creada por Refik Anadol, esto con el objetivo de recaudar fondos para iniciativas solidarias. Entre dichas causas benéficas, s e busca que la obra de arte con el gol que Messi inmortalizó con el Barcelona aquella noche en el Olímpico de Roma, será para apoyar y facilitar el acceso a programas educativos en países de Latinoamérica y del Caribe. La obra, misma que lleva por nombre Living Memory: Messi - A Goal in Life, cuya exhibición ya está disponible para el público en general, se exhibe de manera gratuita en Christies New York, así lo dio a conocer el astro argentino a través de sus redes sociales. “Llegó el momento: ya se puede ver la increíble obra de arte digital que creó Refik Anadol con los recuerdos de mi gol favorito, gracias a una iniciativa de Inter Miami Foundation. Está unos días en Christie’s NY. Me parece que el resultado es espectacular y también muy especial para mí. Ojalá sirva para ayudar a muchísima gente” , escribió Messi en sus redes sociales. ¡Tus opiniones importan! Comenta en los artículos y...

title: Trump sobre tarifas de 50% ao Brasil: ‘posso fazer isso' e 'quero dinheiro entrando nos EUA’
content: A declaração, que ignora fatores econômicos, foi dada após jornalistas questionarem o republicano sobre a tarifa imposta ao Brasil. A medida é a mais alta até agora, que devem enfrentar cobranças elevadas sobre importação nos EUA a partir de 1o de agosto. Em , Trump argumentou que irá elevar a taxa do Brasil em 50% por ter uma relação comercial "injusta" com o país. Os dados oficiais, no entanto, mostram que os norte-americanos têm vantagem na balança comercial. Além disso, o republicano citou Jair Bolsonaro (PL) e disse ser "uma vergonha internacional" o julgamento do ex-presidente no Supremo Tribunal Federal (STF). Nesta terça-feira, Trump também após ser informado sobre o apresentado pela Procuradoria-Geral da República (PGR). Em sua fala, Trump afirmou que “não é que ele seja amigo” de Bolsonaro, mas sim alguém que conhece. O presidente dos EUA também voltou a dizer, sem apresentar provas, que o julgamento de Bolsonaro no STF seria uma “caça às bruxas”. “Ele negociou acordos comerciais contra mim em nome do povo brasileiro, e foi muito duro, porque queria fazer um bom negócio para seu país. Ele não era um homem desonesto. Acredito que isso seja uma caça às bruxas e que não deveria estar acontecendo. Eu sei disso”, continuou. 'Estamos fazendo isso porque eu sou capaz de fazer', diz Trump, sobre aplicação de tarifas Déficit comercial? Ao justificar a tarifa de 50% sobre produtos brasileiros, Trump afirmou que a relação comercial dos EUA...

title: Sánchez y Pradales acuerdan el traspaso a Euskadi del primer bloque de la gestión de la Seguridad Social
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: El Lehendakari, Imanol Pradales , y el presidente del Gobierno central, Pedro Sánchez han acordado el traspaso a Euskadi de cuatro nuevas transferencias, entre ellas algunas materias del primer bloque del traspaso de la gestión de la Seguridad Social como cuatro prestaciones no contributivas -tres prestaciones familiares y el subsidio especial por nacimiento-, así como la gestión de las prestaciones económicas del seguro escolar. No obstante, no se ha completado todo el bloque al no haber acuerdo sobre la prestación por desempleo y el subsidio una vez agotado el paro. Además, se ha pactado el traspaso a Euskadi del centro Nacional de Verificación de Maquinaria (CNVM) , con sede en Barakaldo, y las funciones y servicios en salvamento marítimo en aguas territoriales del Estado correspondientes al litoral vasco. Imanol Pradales y Pedro Sánchez han presidido esta tarde en el Palacio de La Moncloa en Madrid la Comisión Bilateral de Cooperación Permanente, en la que se han abordado siete materias como son autogobierno y transferencias; Gestión migratoria ; Descarbonización de la industria y Programa de inversión en Redes eléctricas ; Conectividad de Euskadi; Reasignación de Fondos Europeos MRR; Macrorregión Atlántica , y la Oficialidad del euskera en Europa. En el encuentro, que se ha prolongado durante casi tres horas, ha concluido, en materia de autogobierno, con el acuerdo para el traspaso de diversas materias incluidas en el primero bloque de la Seguridad...

title: Vício em celular entre adolescentes: estratégias eficazes para pais
creator: Marina Pinheiro, Agência ContilNet
content: Hoje em dia, é cada vez mais comum ver adolescentes grudados no celular o tempo todo, polegar deslizando sem parar, e o mundo real em segundo plano. Muita gente acha que é fase, mas e se for mais fundo do que parece. Se esse comportamento já virou rotina aí na sua casa, fique tranquilo. Aqui você vai encontrar formas reais de lidar com isso. Vamos falar de sinais, limites e como usar a tecnologia para virar esse jogo sem drama. Muitos pais percebem que seus filhos passam tempo demais no celular, mas nem sempre sabem se é só um hábito ou algo mais sério. Quando o adolescente se isola, perde o interesse por outras atividades ou vive irritado, vale ligar o alerta. Esses sinais podem indicar um vício em celular, e é aí que entra a ajuda da tecnologia. Com o app Eyezy, por exemplo, os pais conseguem acompanhar o uso do celular, bloquear apps e entender melhor o que está acontecendo no dia a dia digital dos filhos, e isso é algo essencial diante dos efeitos do uso excessivo de telas no cérebro e na concentração dos jovens. Lidar com o vício em celular entre adolescentes não é tarefa fácil, mas os pais têm um papel fundamental nesse processo. Com algumas atitudes simples, é possível ajudar os filhos a usarem a tecnologia de forma mais equilibrada. Confira algumas formas abaixo. Bloquear apps que tomam horas do dia pode ser uma ótima saída para reduzir o uso excessivo do celular. Jogos, redes sociais e vídeos curtos acabam virando rotina e tiram o foco dos...

title: Grande Recife tem quatro das 20 cidades com os piores índices de saneamento básico do país, diz estudo
content: ✅ O estudo, divulgado nesta terça-feira (15), foi elaborado pelo Instituto Trata Brasil com a consultoria GO Associados e avaliou a situação dos cem municípios mais populosos do país, com base em dados do Sistema Nacional de Informações sobre Saneamento (Snis). As quatro cidades pernambucanas que figuram nas piores colocações ficam na Região Metropolitana: Nenhuma cidade do estado apareceu entre os 20 municípios mais bem avaliados. Segundo o estudo, o grupo dos 20 últimos colocados apresentou, entre 2019 e 2023, um investimento médio de R$ 78,40 em saneamento por habitante. O gasto necessário para a universalização seria de R$ 223,82. Ainda de acordo com o levantamento, Jaboatão ficou entre as dez piores colocadas em dois índices do ranking: o Indicador de Atendimento Total de Água, em 95o lugar; e o de Coleta Total de Esgoto, na 92a colocação. Além disso, , no Sertão do estado, também ficou entre os dez piores desempenhos no Indicador de Atendimento Total de Água, em 92o lugar. Coleta de esgoto O sistema de esgotamento sanitário da capital e dos outros três municípios da Região Metropolitana é administrado pela Companhia Pernambucana de Saneamento (Compesa) em parceria com a empresa BRK. Atualmente, Pernambuco tem uma cobertura de coleta de esgoto de 34% e de 86% no fornecimento de água tratada, de acordo com a Secretaria Estadual de Recursos Hídricos. Em dezembro do ano passado, o governo do estado anunciou o projeto de concessão à...

title: Carlito Breaks Silence On WWE Departure
content: Carlito has opened up about his recent departure from WWE, stating that while he is a professional and will move on, he was not happy with how the company handled his final days. The former United States Champion's contract was not renewed in June, bringing his second run with the company to an end. In a new interview with fellow WWE alum D-Von Dudle y, Carlito discussed the circumstances surrounding his exit. He confirmed that it was the company's decision not to renew his contract. How The WWE Run Ended Carlito explained that he was given very little notice about his status. He said WWE informed him just two weeks before his contract expired that they were not re-signing him and that he did not need to come to the final TV tapings. "The contract ended and they wanted me not to renew," Carlito said (H/T to Fightful ). "They call it like two weeks out. You don't have to come to the RAW or whatever." He expressed frustration with this approach, feeling that as a veteran, he should have been allowed to finish his duties professionally. "I'm a professional. I don't like that... Treat me like a mark or something. I'll do my job... It's not the end of the world either." title: Espacio de horror: 750 migrantes hacinados en jaulas en centro de detención Alligator Alcatra
content: Un grupo de legisladores estatales y federales de Florida ha encendido las alarmas tras visitar el nuevo centro de detención migratoria apodado Alligator Alcatraz , construido en un antiguo aeropuerto abandonado en medio de los Everglades. Rodeado de pantanos y fauna salvaje, este polémico sitio alberga ya a 750 migrantes en jaulas, según denunciaron los congresistas, quienes calificaron el lugar como un “ campo de internamiento ” que representa una peligrosa y costosa maniobra política. ¿QUÉ DIJERON EXACTAMENTE LOS LEGISLADORES? Los legisladores demócratas que recorrieron el centro lo describieron como un entorno extremo e inhumano. Entre los denunciantes se encuentra el senador estatal Carlos Guillermo Smith , quien afirmó: “ 750 humanos en jaulas. No nos permitieron hablar con los detenidos ni caminar por las áreas ocupadas. Hay inmigrantes sin antecedentes criminales ” . La falta de transparencia y acceso pleno refuerza las sospechas sobre lo que ocurre dentro de estas instalaciones. Las denuncias no terminan ahí. La congresista federal Debbie Wasserman Schultz aseguró que hay hasta 32 personas hacinadas por jaula , con apenas algunas literas y baños compartidos en condiciones deplorables. “ Toman agua del mismo lugar donde defecan. Las imágenes que circulan no muestran la magnitud del horror. Viven en jaulas ” , sentenció la legisladora, visiblemente afectada tras el recorrido.
