title: Galatasaray’da yeni sezon hazırlıkları sürüyor
content: Galatasaray’da yeni sezon hazırlıkları sürüyor İSTANBUL, (DHA)- GALATASARAY, 2025-2026 sezonu hazırlıklarına bugün yaptığı antrenmanla devam etti. Kemerburgaz Metin Oktay Tesisleri’nde teknik direktör Okan Buruk yönetimindeki antrenman dinamik ısınmayla başladı. Dört grup halinde 8’e 2 pas çalışmasıyla devam eden antrenman, iki grup halinde topa sahip olma çalışmasının ardından çift kale maçla sona erdi. Sarı-kırmızılı ekip, yarın saat 12.30 ve 18.00’da yapacağı antrenmanlarla hazırlıklarına devam edecek.

title: Kansas City Chiefs secure record contract deal with Trey Smith as highest-paid guard in NFL history
creator: Temitope Oke
content: Just when fans thought the Kansas City Chiefs couldn’t make any more big-money moves, they’ve done it again—this time locking down one of their most valuable players on the offensive line.A Massive Payday Before the DeadlineWith just hours to go before Tuesday’s franchise-tag deadline, the Chiefs reached a massive agreement with guard Trey Smith, signing him to a four-year, $94 million contract.This isn’t just any deal—it’s historic.According to ESPN’s Adam Schefter, Smith’s new contract includes $70 million in guaranteed money, making him the highest-paid guard in NFL history.Not only does he take the top spot for guaranteed cash, but he’s also now earning the highest annual average salary ever handed to a guard.The NFL’s Most Expensive Offensive Line DuoSmith isn’t alone at the top of the pay charts.With this deal in place, Kansas City now boasts the NFL’s highest-paid guard and center duo.His teammate Creed Humphrey signed his own record-setting extension last year—a four-year, $72 million deal with $50 million guaranteed.Together, they form one of the most dominant and now priciest offensive line pairings in the league.Avoiding a Franchise Tag Tug-of-WarBack in February, the Chiefs had slapped the franchise tag on Smith to keep him from hitting free agency—effectively putting him on a one-year, $23.4 million contract.That move bought them time, but also came with the risk of losing him next offseason or having to tag him again in 2026 at an even higher cost.Instead, they...

title: Bre-B: estas son las consecuencias de no registrar sus llaves en el nuevo sistema
content: El Sistema Bre-B de Pagos Inmediatos es una plataforma tecnológica diseñada para facilitar la transferencia de fondos entre cuentas bancarias en tiempo real. Este sistema es una evolución de las redes tradicionales de pagos.Esta nueva innovación permite que los pagos se realicen de manera instantánea, 24/7, sin importar la hora o el día de la semana. Su implementación ha revolucionado el panorama de pagos, brindando a los usuarios y empresas una solución ágil, eficiente y segura para mover dinero en tiempo real.Principales característicasTransferencias en tiempo real: el principal beneficio del sistema Bre-B es que las transferencias se realizan de forma instantánea. Cuando un usuario realiza un pago o una transferencia, los fondos se acreditan en la cuenta del destinatario casi al instante, eliminando las esperas tradicionales que pueden durar horas o incluso días.Operación 24/7: a diferencia de los sistemas tradicionales, que suelen tener horarios de operación restringidos (por ejemplo, solo en días hábiles y en horarios específicos), el sistema Bre-B permite realizar pagos en cualquier momento del día o de la noche, incluso los fines de semana y feriados. Seguridad y fiabilidad: el sistema está diseñado para ofrecer una infraestructura robusta y segura que garantice la protección de los datos y la integridad de las transacciones. Esto último, acompañado de los sistemas de control de los principales bancos del país.Las transferencias son...

title: İstanbul - Heybeliada açıklarında motoryat tekneye çarptı: 7 kişi kurtarıldı
content: İstanbul - Heybeliada açıklarında motoryat tekneye çarptı: 7 kişi kurtarıldı İSTANBUL, (DHA) – Heybeliada açıklarında motoryatın çarptığı tekne battı. Denize düşen 7 kişi Sahil Güvenlik ekipleri tarafından kurtarıldı. O anlar cep telefonu kamerasıyla kaydedildi. Kaza, öğle saatlerinde Heybeliada Alman Koyu açıklarında meydana geldi. İddiaya göre, içinde 7 kişinin bulunduğu seyir halindeki tekneye motoryat çarptı. Çarpmanın etkisiyle su almaya başlayan tekne kısa sürede battı. Teknede bulunan 7 kişi denize düştü. İhbar üzerine olay yerine Sahil Güvenlik Komutanlığı ekipleri sevk edildi. Denize düşen 7 kişi kısa sürede kurtarıldı. Kazazedelerin sağlık durumlarının iyi olduğu öğrenildi. Kazayla ilgili inceleme başlatıldı. Ekiplerin müdahalesini başka teknede bulunanlar cep telefonu kamerasıyla kaydetti. (DHA)

title: Denizli'de 7 katlı binanın çatısında çıkan yangın söndürüldü
content: Denizli'de 7 katlı binanın çatısında çıkan yangın söndürüldü DENİZLİ (AA) - Denizli'nin Pamukkale ilçesinde 7 katlı binanın çatısında çıkan yangın itfaiye ekiplerince söndürüldü. Pelitlibağ Mahallesi Hürriyet Caddesi'ndeki 7 katlı binanın çatısında henüz belirlenemeyen nedenle yangın çıktı. İhbar üzerine bölgeye sağlık, itfaiye ve polis ekipleri sevk edildi. İtfaiye ekiplerinin müdahalesiyle söndürülen yangın nedeniyle çatıda hasar oluştu.

title: Beylikdüzü açıklarında sürüklenen tekne kurtarıldı
content: Beylikdüzü açıklarında sürüklenen tekne kurtarıldı İSTANBUL (AA) - Beylikdüzü açıklarında makine arızası nedeniyle sürüklenen ve içinde 4 kişi bulunan tekne kurtarıldı. Kıyı Emniyeti Genel Müdürlüğünden yapılan açıklamada, "West İstanbul Marina önlerinde makine arızası nedeniyle sürüklenen ve içerisinde 4 kişi bulunan 5 metre boyundaki tekne, KEGM-5 hızlı tahlisiye botumuzca yedeklenerek West İstanbul Marina'da emniyete alındı." ifadeleri kullanıldı.

title: Türkiye'nin Oscar adayı filmi belli oldu
content: Kültür ve Turizm Bakanlığı Sinema Genel Müdürlüğü koordinasyonunda, sinema alanındaki meslek birliklerinin temsilcilerinden oluşan 15 kişilik Türkiye Oscar Seçim Komitesi tarafından yapılan değerlendirme sonucunda, başvuran 14 film arasından ‘Hemme'nin Öldüğü Günlerden Biri' oy çokluğuyla Türkiye'nin Oscar adayı olarak belirlendi. 2024 yapımı film, tarım işçisi Eyüp'ün, domates kurutma işinde emeğinin karşılığını alamadığı patronu Hemme'yi öldürmek üzere Siverek'te çıktığı öfke dolu bir günlük yolculuğu konu alıyor. Filmin yönetmenliğini, senaristliğini ve başrolünü Murat Fıratoğlu üstlenirken, oyuncu kadrosunda yönetmenin akrabaları ve bölge halkı yer alıyor. Dünya prömiyerini 28 Ağustos-7 Eylül 2024 tarihleri arasında düzenlenen 81'inci Venedik Uluslararası Film Festivali'nin ‘Orrizonti' (Ufuklar) bölümünde yapan film, burada ‘Jüri Özel Ödülü'ne layık görüldü. Ardından, 23-29 Eylül 2024 tarihleri arasında gerçekleştirilen 31'inci Adana Altın Koza Film Festivali'nde ‘En İyi Film' ödülünün sahibi oldu.

title: TBMM Milli Savunma Komisyonu Başkanı Akar'dan, 15 Temmuz ve "Terörsüz Türkiye" açıklaması:

title: Çanakkale'de tarım arazisinde çıkan ve ormanlık alana sıçrayan yangına müdahale ediliyor
content: Çanakkale'de tarım arazisinde çıkan ve ormanlık alana sıçrayan yangına müdahale ediliyor ÇANAKKALE (AA) - Çanakkale'nin Gelibolu ilçesinde, tarım arazisinde çıkan yangına müdahale ediliyor. İlçede, Evreşe ile Şadıllı köyleri arasındaki tarım arazisinde, öğleden sonra henüz belirlenemeyen nedenle yangın çıktı. İtfaiye ve Orman Bölge Müdürlüğüne bağlı ekiplerin havadan ve karadan müdahalesiyle yangının büyümesi engellendi. Akşam saatlerinde havadan müdahalenin sona ermesinin ardından rüzgarın etkisiyle alevler, ormanlık alana da sıçradı. Ekiplerin bölgedeki yoğun müdahaleleri sürüyor.

title: Tekirdağ'da orman yangınına müdahele sürüyor; bir mahalle daha boşaltıldı
content: Tekirdağ'da orman yangınına müdahele sürüyor; bir mahalle daha boşaltıldı Tekirdağ'ın Şarköy ilçesinde çıkan orman yangını rüzgarın da etkisiyle geniş alana yayılmaya devam ediyor. Şenköy ile Kocaali mahallelerinin ardından alevlerin yaklaşıp tehdit altına aldığı Kızılcaterzi Mahallesi de boşaltıldı. Şarköy Belediye Başkanı Alpay Var, yangının büyüyerek başka mahallelere sıçradığını söyledi. Var, "Şenköy, Kocaali ve Kızılcaterzi mahallerinde vatandaşlarımızı tahliye ettik. Hayvanları ekiplerin yardımıyla çıkarttık. Hayvanları güvenli bölgelere almaya devam ediyor ekipler. Kocaali ve Şenköy mahallerinde risk kalmadı. Kızılcaterzi'de risk devam ediyor. Yangın mahalleye inmesin diye ekiplerin müdahalesi sürüyor. Ormanlık alanda yangın hala devam ediyor. Çevre iller, tüm kurumlar emek veriyor" dedi. Bölgedeki rüzgar nedeniyle alevleri kontrol altına alma çalışmaları büyük bir gayretle sürdürüyor. Kızılcaterzi Mahallesi'ndeki çalışmalarda bir iş makinesi yoldan çıkarak kaydı. Mahallelerde tarım aletlerinin de yandığı görüldü. (DHA) Haber-Kamera: Mehmet YİRUN-Nuri ÇAĞLAR/ŞARKÖY(Tekirdağ), (DHA)

title: Burdur'da şarampole devrilen kamyonetin sürücüsü öldü
content: Burdur'da şarampole devrilen kamyonetin sürücüsü öldü BURDUR (AA) - Burdur'un Gölhisar ilçesinde şarampole devrilen kamyonetin sürücüsü hayatını kaybetti. Abdulselam Demircan (54) idaresindeki 35 DDR 78 plakalı domates yüklü kamyonet, Yusufça beldesinde şarampole devrildi. İhbar üzerine kaza yerine 112 Acil Sağlık, jandarma ve itfaiye ekibi sevk edildi. İtfaiye ekiplerinin müdahalesiyle sürücü araçtan çıkarıldı. Sağlık ekiplerince yapılan kontrolde, sürücü Demircan'ın yaşamını yitirdiği belirlendi. Sürücünün cenazesi, Gölhisar Devlet Hastanesi morguna götürüldü.

title: Ambala News: डाकघरों में 22 से मिलेगी डिजिटल सुविधा
content: अंबाला। डाक विभाग जल्द ही डिजिटल सुविधा से लैस हो जाएगा। इसके तहत आइटी 2.0 के तहत एटीपी (उन्नत डाक प्रौद्योगिकी) एप्लीकेशन की शुरुआत की जा रही है। इस सुविधा के तहत ग्राहक क्यूआर कोड के माध्यम से डिजिटल भुगतान कर सकेंगे। यह एप्लीकेशन अंबाला कैंट, बराड़ा, बिहटा, मुलाना, केसरी, साहा, धीन, अधोया, माजरी क्षेत्र के सभी डाकघरों में 22 से लागू हो रही है। पोस्टमैन भी जीपीएस सुविधा के साथ वितरण कार्य करेंगे। इसके तहत ओटीपी आधारित वितरण कार्य होंगे। ग्राहक एप के माध्यम से डाक सेवाओं का प्रयोग कर सकेंगे जबकि लेनदेन को सुरक्षित बनाने के लिए क्यूआर कोड का उपयोग होगा। डिजिटल इंडिया-कैशलेस इंडिया के तहत डाकघरों में ग्राहकों को बेहतर सुविधाएं देने तथा उनको आधुनिक बनाने के लिए एटीपी यानी उन्नत डाक प्रौद्योगिकी की शुरुआत की जा रही है। प्रवर अधीक्षक डाकघर अंबाला मंडल विजय कुमार ने बताया कि डाक विभाग अगली पीढ़ी के एपीटी एप्लीकेशन का लॉन्च करने जा रहा है। यह डिजिटल उत्कृष्टता और राष्ट्र निर्माण की दिशा में एक बड़ा कदम है। इस परिवर्तनकारी पहल के तहत 21 को डाकघरों में कोई भी सार्वजनिक लेनदेन नहीं किया जाएगा।

title: İstanbul-15 Temmuz şehidi Prof. Dr. İlhan Varank kabri başında anıldı
content: İstanbul-15 Temmuz şehidi Prof. Dr. İlhan Varank kabri başında anıldı Gülseren KARAPINAR- Emir BENLİOĞLU/ İSTANBUL, (DHA)- 15 Temmuz gecesi darbeciler tarafından şehit edilen Eski Sanayi ve Teknoloji Bakanı Mustafa Varank'ın ağabeyi Prof. Dr. İlhan Varank kabri başında anıldı. 15 Temmuz'da şehit edilen Prof. Dr. İlhan Varank, şahadetinin 9'uncu yılında Fatih Şehzadebaşı Camii avlusunda bulunan kabri başında anıldı. Akşam namazının arından Prof. Dr. İlhan Varank, babaları merhum Ali Haydar Varank ve tüm şehitler için mevlit okutuldu. Programa İstanbul Valisi Davut Gül, AK Parti İl Başkanı Abdullah Özdemir, Bilal Erdoğan, Selçuk Bayraktar, AK Parti Bursa Milletvekili Mustafa Varank, İstanbul İl Emniyet Müdürü Selami Yıldız ve çok sayıda kişi katıldı. (DHA)

title: Apartman merdivenlerinde ölü bulundu
content: Apartman merdivenlerinde ölü bulundu Batuhan KILIÇ/ ESKİŞEHİR, (DHA)- ESKİŞEHİR’de, Irak uyruklu Sarmas Haydar Fadhıl Al Bassam (41), oturduğu apartmanın merdivenlerinde ölü bulundu. Olay, Güllük Mahallesi Kırımlılar Sokak’taki 4 katlı apartmanda meydana geldi. Irak uyruklu Sarmas Haydar Fadhıl Al Bassam, komşuları tarafından apartman merdivenlerde hareketsiz halde yerde yatarken bulundu. Komşuların ihbarı üzerine olay yerine sağlık ve polis ekipleri sevk edildi. Sağlık ekiplerinin yaptığı kontrolde, Bassam’ın hayatını kaybettiği belirlendi. Savcılık ve polis ekipleri tarafından ölümü şüpheli görülen Bassam’ın cesedi otopsi için hastane morguna kaldırıldı. Bassam’ın kesin ölüm nedeninin yapılacak otopsinin ardından netlik kazanacağı belirtildi. Soruşturma sürüyor. (DHA) FOTOĞRAFLI

title: El Grande Americano Set For July 25th AAA Show
creator: Jeremy Thomas
content: El Grande Americano is heading to AAA for their July 25th event. AAA President Marisela Peña announced via Twitter on Tuesday that the WWE star will be in action at the show, which takes place at Juan de la Barrera Olympic Gymnasium and will be a TV taping. Pena wrote: “THE GREAT AMERICAN arrives at @luchalibreaaa for the TV-recorded event of the #AlianzasAAA tour in Mexico City. July 25, Juan de la Barrera Olympic Gymnasium. Tickets available at @boletomovil” Americano last competed on last week’s episode of Raw where he defeated Dragon Lee. EL GRANDE AMERICANO llega a @luchalibreaaa para el evento grabado para TV de la gira #AlianzasAAA 💫 en la Ciudad de México. 25 de julio, Gimnasio Olímpico Juan de la Barrera. Boletos disponibles en @boletomovil pic.twitter.com/2NAT6y1FEp — Marisela Peña (@MPenaAAA) July 15, 2025

title: Число пострадавших в ДТП с электробусами в Москве выросло
creator: Никита Хромин
content: Число пострадавших в ДТП с двумя электробусами в Москве выросло до 14. Об этом сообщает столичный департамент здравоохранения в Telegram -канале. «В результате ДТП 14 человек обратились за медпомощью, среди них два ребенка», — говорится в сообщении ведомства. Уточняется, что госпитализированы были 10 человек — 9 взрослых и 1 ребенок. Остальные пострадавшие от госпитализации отказались. Взрослых пациентов доставили в ГКБ им. С.С. Юдина, ГКБ No31 им. академика Савельевой, ММКЦ «Коммунарка», Первую градскую больницу. Ребенок находится в НИИ НДХиТ. Отмечается, что все госпитализированные находятся в состоянии средней степени тяжести. Их жизням ничего не угрожает. ДТП произошло днем 15 июля на Профсоюзной улице. Изначально сообщалось об 11 пострадавших.

title: 5 Kişinin öldüğü kazaya neden olan TIR’ın sürücüsü tutuklandı
content: 5 Kişinin öldüğü kazaya neden olan TIR’ın sürücüsü tutuklandı Erol POLAT/ DİLOVASI(Kocaeli), (DHA)- KOCAELİ'nin Dilovası ilçesi D-100 Karayolu üzerinde meydana gelen kazada TIR'ın dorsesindeki konteyner otomobilin üzerine düştü ve araçtaki 5 kişi hayatını kaybetti. Kazaya neden olan TIR'ın sürücüsü Şahin Karakaş çıkarıldığı mahkemece tutuklandı. Kaza dün, saat 17.30 sıralarında meydana geldi. Ankara istikametine giden Şahin Karakaş idaresindeki 41 AHJ 004 plakalı TIR, önce aynı yönde giden sürücüsünün adı öğrenilemeyen 34 DCK 849 plakalı otomobile, ardından Sinan Demir idaresindeki 34 DKT 578 plakalı otomobile çarptı. Çarpışmanın şiddetiyle savrulan TIR’ın dorsesindeki konteyner, Sinan Demir’in kullandığı otomobilin üzerine devrildi. Kazada Sinan Demir ile aynı araçta bulunan Okan Demir, Ramazan Budak, Ümit Adsay ve Muhammet Zengin araç içerisinde sıkıştı. İtfaiye ekipleri tarafından sıkıştıkları yerden çıkarılan Sinan Demir ve Okan Demir kaza yerinde, Ramazan Budak, Ümit Adsay ve Muhammet Zengin ise kaldırıldıkları hastanede hayatını kaybetti. Adli Tıp’taki incelemelerin ardından Fatih Devlet Hastanesi Morgu'na kaldırılan cenazeler daha sonra yakınlarına teslim edildi. Okan Demir, Sinan Demir ve Muhammet Ali Zengin memleketleri Ağrı’da, Ramazan Budak Kayseri’de, Ümit Adsay ise Kocaeli’nin Dilovası İlçesi’nde toprağa verildi. Kazadan yaralı olarak kurtulan ve Kocaeli Derince Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi’ne...

title: Kilis'te, birnlerce kişi bayraklarla yürüdü
content: Kilis'te, birnlerce kişi bayraklarla yürüdü Reşit ÇELEBİOĞLU/KİLİS, (DHA)-KİLİS'te, 15 Temmuz darbe girişiminin 9'uncu yıldönümü dolayısıyla düzenlenen Milli Birlik Yürüyüşü'ne binlerce vatandaş katıldı. Kilis Valiliği tarafından organize edilen Milli Birlik yürüyüşüne Vali Tahir Şahin, Belediye Başkanı Hakan Bilecen, daire amir ve müdürleri, sivil toplum örgütü temsilcileri ve çok sayıda vatandaş katıldı. Yürüyüşte jandarma özel hareket ile polis özel hareket timleri de vatandaşlarla birlikte katıldı. Türk bayrakları ile Hacı Cümmüş Kavşağı'nda başlayan yürüyüş, Cumhuriyet Meydanında son buldu. Cumhuriyet Meydanı'nda düzenlenen 15 Temmuz Demokrasi ve Milli Birlik Günü etkinliği saygı duruşu ve İstiklal Marşı’nın okunmasıyla başladı. Etkinlikte konuşan Kilis Valisi Tahir Şahin, 15 Temmuz’un milletin birlik ve beraberlik içinde yazdığı büyük bir direniş destanı olduğunu vurgulayarak, Türk milletinin o gece devletine, bayrağına ve istiklaline sahip çıktığını söyledi. FOTOĞRAFLI

title: 20 günlük uzay görevini tamamlayan 4 astronot döndü
content: Uzayda 20 günü geride bıraktılar, tarihe geçtiler. Hindistan, Polonya ve Macaristan’dan dört astronotu taşıyan SpaceX kapsülü, California açıklarında iniş yaptı. Özel uçuşla 25 Haziran’da yola çıkan dört astronot, Uluslararası Uzay İstasyonu’ndaki görevlerini tamamlayarak Pasifik Okyanusu’na iniş yaptı. Hindistan’dan, Polonya’dan, Macaristan’dan ve ABD’den 1'er astronotun bulunduğu kapsül, San Diego açıklarında suya indi. Üç ülke, bu tarihi uçuş için kişi başına 65 milyon dolardan fazla ödedi. Uzayda pek çok deney yapan ekip, ülkelerindeki çocuklarla ve liderlerle de görüntülü görüşmeler gerçekleştirdi. NASA, özel sektörün önünü açan bu tür uçuşların, 2030 sonrası yeni nesil uzay istasyonlarına hazırlık olduğunu vurguluyor.

title: Trabzonspor’dan Saul Niguez hamlesi! İspanyollar duyurdu
content: Trabzonspor’un Atletico Madrid’den Saul Niguez’i kadrosuna katma ihtimali güçlenmeye devam ediyor. Yeni sezon öncesi transfer çalışmalarını sürdüren Trabzonspor, orta sahasını güçlendirme adına tecrübeli yıldız Saul Niguez için girişimlerini sürdürüyor. Football-Espana’nın haberine göre Niguez, Avrupa’da kalmak istiyor ve Suudi Arabistan’dan gelen teklifleri geri çeviriyor. AS gazetesi ise Trabzonspor’un, eski futbolcusu Stefan Savic aracılığıyla Saul’ü ikna etmeye çalıştığını yazdı. Ayrıca hem Atletico Madrid’in hem de deneyimli futbolcunun yolları ayırmak istediği belirtildi. Yine bordo-mavili kulübün 30 yaşındaki yıldız için resmî teklif yaptığı da gündeme gelmeyi sürdürdü.

title: 3 وفيات و21 مصابا.. ننشر أسماء ضحايا حادث تصادم 3 سيارات في زفة بمحور ديروط
content: دفعت هيئة الإسعاف بـ 15 سيارة إسعاف لنقل الوفيات والمصابين في حادث تصادم تريلا وسيارة ربع نقل وأخرى ميكروباص أثناء سيرهم في زفة عرس بمحور ديروط بمحافظة أسيوط ، إلى مستشفيا ديروط و أسيوط الجامعي . بلاغ لمديرية أمن أسيوط بتصادم 3 سيارات كان اللواء وائل نصار مدير أمن أسيوط، تلقى إخطارا من مأمور مركز شرطة ديروط، يفيد ورود بلاغا من غرفة عمليات النجدة بوقوع حادث تصادم تريلا وسيارة ربع نقل وأخرى ميكروباص أعلى محور ديروط ووجود وفيات ومصابين . انتقل إلى موقع الحادث اللواء وائل نصار مدير أمن أسيوط وقيادات المديرية ومركز شرطة ديروط ودفعت هيئة الإسعاف بـ 15 سيارة إسعاف لنقل الوفيات والمصابين . مصرع 3 أشخاص وإصابة 21 اخرين وحصل موقع صدى البلد على أسماء الوفيات والمصابين وهم " زينب عبد المنجي محمد " 65 عاما، و " سوسن عبد التواب هريدي " 47 عاما، و " علي محمد عبد الحفيظ " 20 عاما " وفيات وتم نقلهم إلى مشرحة مستشفى ديروط المركزي . بينما أصيب كلا من " حسن محمد شكري " 24 عاما، اشتباه نزيف بالمخ والصدر ، و " صفية عادل عابد " 30 عاما، نزيف بالبطن وبتر بالساق اليمنى، وتم نقلهما إلى مستشفى أسيوط الجامعي . و " ليلى محمد عبد الحفيظ " 15 عاما، كسر مضاعف بالساق اليمنى ، و " يوسف محمد أحمد" 16 عاما، كسر بعظام الجمجمة، و " تحية محمد عبد الحفيظ " 35 عاما، اشتباه نزيف بالبطن، و " عبد الرحمن سيد محمد " 19 عاما، كسر بالجمجمة وعظام الوجه، و " صابرين محمود علي" 36 عاما، كسر مضاعف بالساق اليمنى ، و " محمد رمضان هلال " 9 أعوام ، كدمات بالجسم ، و " عليا عبد المنجي حنفي " 56 عاما، كدمات بالجسم . كما أصيب كلا من " أمنية خلف محمد " 32 عاما، كدمات متفرقة بالجسم، و " دياب منصور حماد...

title: House Judiciary Democrats demand Epstein hearing, float subpoenas
creator: The Hill
Rebecca Beitsch
content: House Judiciary Democrats are calling for a public hearing on the Jeffrey Epstein files, saying top officials in both the Justice Department and the FBI should account for their handling of information surrounding the deceased financier.The Justice Department last week released a new memo concluding that Epstein did not commit suicide and said the high-powered figure did not keep a list of clients for others involved in his sex trafficking scheme.Rep. Jamie Raskin (D-Md.), the top Democrat on the House Judiciary Committee, said the administration's top brass – Attorney General Pam Bondi and her deputy Todd Blanche, as well as FBI Director Kash Patel and his deputy Dan Bongino – should all testify on the matter, adding the panel should also subpoena them “if necessary.”“President Trump and his top appointees at the DOJ and FBI have spent years advancing theories that ‘the Deep State’ has been suppressing the true magnitude of the child sex trafficking and abuse ring created by Jeffrey Epstein and his associates,” Raskin wrote in a letter to Chair Jim Jordan (R-Ohio), saying conspiracy theories about the matter were used to “energize President Trump’s supporters.” “The Trump DOJ and FBI’s handling of the Jeffrey Epstein matter, and President Trump’s suddenly shifting positions, have not restored anyone’s trust in the government but have rather raised profound new questions about their own conduct while increasing public paranoia related to the investigation. Only a bipartisan...

title: Impuesto al jitomate mexicano afectará más a la economía de EU: Salomón Jara
creator: Milenio
content: Oaxaca.- El gobernador de Oaxaca, Salomón Jara, consideró como un desacierto la imposición de una cuota compensatoria del 17 por ciento al jitomate mexicano que se exporta a los Estados Unidos, al referir qué no solo afectará a los productores sino también al consumidor estadounidense. En conferencia de prensa, el mandatario estatal avaló la determinación de la presidenta Claudia Sheinbaum para continuar con el diálogo y negociaciones con la administración de Donald Trump. “ Este tipo de medidas unilaterales constituyen un error porque encarecen la importación de productos, que de todos modos van a llegar al mercado del país vecino porque no son autosuficientes, hasta la catsup subirá de precio. Vamos a seguir insistiendo en la necesidad de que México y Estados Unidos permanezcan en la ruta del diálogo y la concertación bilateral”. “ Nuestras economías están profundamente integradas , por ello somos su principal socio comercial, y este tipo de acciones generan efectos negativos en ambos lados de la frontera”, añadió. Jara también hizo referencia a las críticas que la oposición ha lanzado contra la postura del gobierno federal en este tema. “ Quisieran que el gobierno del pueblo fracase , pero se van a quedar chatos, la presidenta representa con dignidad y firmeza los intereses de las y los mexicanos ante cualquier nación del mundo”. Asimismo, el gobernador de Oaxaca mencionó que se continúa trabajando para colocar al estado en la ruta del Plan...

title: Ténis de Mesa: Portugal fica em segundo lugar no Europeu sub-19
content: Portugal sagrou-se esta terça-feira vice-campeão da Europa de equipas em ténis de mesa. A seleção portuguesa perdeu na final contra a tetracampeã Roménia, por 3-2, nos Europeus jovens de Ostrava, na República Checa. Iulian Chirita colocou a Roménia a vencer logo no primeiro jogo, depois de bater o luso-francês Clemet Campino por 3-0. Tiago Abiodun empatou a partida ao vencer Dragos Bujor por 3-2. Posteriormente, Rafael Kong derrotou o romeno Robert Alexandru Istrate por 3-1. No entanto, a Roménia conseguiu empatar a partida, com Iulian Chirita a vencer Tiago Abiodun. Na última partida, Dragos Bujor sorriu frente a Clement Campino. Este é o segundo pódio de Portugal em Ostrava, depois da equipa feminina sub-19 ter terminado em terceiro lugar.

title: Los Cabos se consolida como destino líder en turismo deportivo a nivel mundial
creator: Luis Castrejón
content: El turismo deportivo en Los Cabos se ha consolidado como uno de los motores clave para el crecimiento turístico del destino. Eventos de clase mundial como el Bisbee’s Black and Blue, el World Wide Technology Championship de la PGA Tour y el Abierto de Tenis ATP 250 de Los Cabos han atraído a miles de visitantes nacionales e internacionales, fortaleciendo la imagen del municipio como un destino deportivo internacional.De acuerdo con el director del Fideicomiso de Turismo de Los Cabos (Fiturca), Rodrigo Esponda Cascajares, este tipo de turismo no solo impulsa la ocupación hotelera, sino que también genera un alto nivel de satisfacción en los viajeros. Cifras clave del turismo deportivo en Los Cabos:La pesca deportiva representa alrededor del 30% del turismo que llega al destino.El golf atrae al 3% de los visitantes totales.El torneo ATP 250 genera un incremento del 8% en la ocupación hotelera.La derrama económica estimada por el Abierto de Mexicano de Tenis Los Cabos 250 supera los 100 millones de dólares.Lee más: Alex Hernández avanza en el Abierto de Tenis Los Cabos; Rodrigo Pacheco cae en dobles“El turismo deportivo, o venir a Los Cabos con la motivación de realizar actividades físicas, es donde vemos mayor nivel de satisfacción. Quienes practican deportes como golf, pesca o actividades en contacto con la naturaleza son los que regresan más contentos”, señaló Esponda.También destacó el creciente interés en deportes emergentes como el pickleball, que ha...

title: Now, Ultra Low Cost US Carrier Avelo Airlines Closing Southern California Base and Expanding Operations in Hollywood Burbank Airport, Adding Flights to Northern California, Oregon and Montana, Here is the Latest Update
content: Now, Ultra Low Cost US Carrier Avelo Airlines Closing Southern California Base and Expanding Operations in Hollywood Burbank Airport, Adding Flights to Northern California, Oregon and Montana, Here is the Latest UpdateAvelo Airlines, America’s ultra-low-cost carrier that soared into the skies during the pandemic, is shaking up its flight map yet again. In a dramatic move, the airline has announced plans to shut down its Southern California base while simultaneously expanding its presence in Burbank.For travelers who’ve grown fond of Avelo’s budget-friendly fares and quick routes, the news comes as a mix of surprise and curiosity. While one door closes, another swings wide open. Burbank is set to become a new powerhouse hub, with fresh flights launching to Northern California, Oregon, and even Montana.Behind these changes lies Avelo’s drive to stay agile in a fiercely competitive market, seeking stronger returns and new opportunities. As California’s skies shift, passengers wonder what this bold realignment means for their travel plans, and whether Avelo’s bet on Burbank will pay off in the long run.Avelo Airlines, once hailed as a budget hero in the Golden State, has stunned travelers and airport officials alike with news that it’s closing its entire West Coast operation. By December 2, 2025, the carrier will have flown its final flights from Hollywood Burbank Airport, a base that once symbolized hope for affordable, flexible travel across the region.Burbank Airport Loses a...

title: Orman Yangını Çanakkale'ye Sıçradı
content: TEKİRDAĞ VALİSİ SOYTÜRK: YANGIN ÇANAKKALE SINIRINA GEÇTİ Tekirdağ 'ın Şarköy ilçesinde çıkan ve 3 mahallenin boşatıldığı orman yangınında alevler Çanakkale sınırını geçti. Tekirdağ Valisi Recep Soytürk , söndürme çalışmalarını devam ettiğini belirterek, "Şarköy Kocaali mevkii etrafında bir yangınımız meydana geldi. Orman Genel Müdürlüğümüz tarafından yaklaşık 11 tane aracımız derhal müdahale etti. Çevre illerden ve ilçelerden yaklaşık 104 araçla müdahale ettik ancak yangın özellikle sert esen ve zaman zaman yönünü değiştiren rüzgardan kaynaklı olarak yayıldı. Önce Kocaali köyümüzü tahliye ettik ardından Şenköy'ü tahliye ettik. Arkasından Kızılcaterzi köyünü de sirayet etme ihtimaline karşı tahliye kararı aldık. Gece saatlerinde hava araçlarımız çalışmalarını durdurdu, çevre il ve ilçelerden ek dozer ve greyderler talep ettik, onlar yola çıktı. Edirne 'den, kendi ilimizden, çevre illerden ek TOMA'lar geliyor. Özellikle köylerin yangından korunması anlamında onlara iş düşecek. Yeni aldığımız bilgiye göre de yangın Çanakkale sınırlarına doğru geçti. Çanakkale Valiliği de yangına müdahale ediyor, ekiplerini orada tutuyor. Ayrıca bildiğimiz kadarıyla Ayvacık 'ta da bir yangın var. Çanakkale Valiliği her iki yangına da müdahale ediyor" diye konuştu. Abdullah YALÇIN/TEKİRDAĞ,

title: Perú y Chile en conversaciones con India para abastecerla de cobre y otros minerales importantes
creator: Alejandro Delgado Tong
content: India mantiene negociaciones con Chile y Perú para obtener minerales estratégicos, aprovechando las conversaciones vigentes sobre tratados de libre comercio, según indicó este martes una fuente del Ministerio de Comercio a Reuters.El país asiático, altamente dependiente de las importaciones para satisfacer su demanda interna, ya contemplaba incluir un apartado especial sobre cobre en estas negociaciones con ambas naciones sudamericanas. El objetivo sería asegurar un volumen determinado de concentrado de cobre, según un documento gubernamental difundido previamente este mes.Dependencia del cobre por parte de la IndiaActualmente, India cubre mediante importaciones más del 90% de sus necesidades de concentrado de cobre, y según proyecciones oficiales, esta dependencia podría aumentar hasta un 97% hacia el año 2047.La misma fuente ministerial señaló que India también está trabajando con diversos socios comerciales para reducir su actual dependencia de China en minerales críticos.China, responsable de cerca del 90% de la producción mundial de imanes de tierras raras, estableció en abril restricciones a la exportación de estos productos, como parte de una respuesta a las tarifas impuestas por Estados Unidos.India, que ocupa el tercer lugar mundial en el mercado automotriz y posee la quinta reserva más grande del mundo en tierras raras, ha iniciado recientemente un programa orientado a estimular la fabricación local de imanes, según informó Reuters el mes...

title: El Tour de Francia retoma la acción con un trazado “rompe piernas” en las cercanías de Toulouse
content: La undécima etapa del Tour de Francia propone este miércoles un recorrido de 156 kilómetros alrededor de Toulouse , ciudad que normalmente es propicia a los velocistas, pero que este año presenta un terreno exigente. El día después de la primera jornada de reposo , el pelotón vuelve a la carga, empezando por las laderas del sur de la capital de Occitania con una sucesión de suaves colinas. “Toulouse es una de las etapas en las que hemos vuelto a trabajar desde el último Tour. Tradicionalmente, en Toulouse hay llegada al esprint. Pero aquí, visto el lado monótono de las etapas de sprinters, hemos decidido modificar el recorrido ”, explicó Thierry Gouvenou, el arquitecto del recorrido, a la agencia AFP. En los últimos cincuenta kilómetros la ruta se vuelve en “ tramo rompe piernas , primero con tres ascensos de cuarta categoría antes del famoso muro a ocho kilómetros de la llegada, el puerto de Pech David, que tiene 12,5% de media en 800 metros con casi 20% a los pies”. Una dificultad que podría eliminar a gran parte de los velocistas. 📊 TOP 10 AFTER TEN STAGES 🤍 #TDF2025 l @opticiens_krys pic.twitter.com/RRUDZ01GQH “Realmente hará falta tener buenas piernas para pasar esa pendiente . En la cima, hay un descenso técnico seguido de 5 kilómetros de llano. Será muy difícil volver a posicionarse si se ha perdido posiciones en Pech David”, insistió Gouvenou. Durante la primera semana del Tour, el responsable del recorrido trató de colocar algún repecho que...

title: Fiscalía investiga liberación del acusado por asesinato del Rey de Meiggs: Incautaron celulares y computadores
creator: Carmen Marfon
content: Este martes, el fiscal Marcos Pastén entregó nuevos antecedentes sobre la insólita liberación del ciudadano venezolano acusado de asesinar al conocido empresario conocido como el “Rey de Meiggs”. Vale remarcar que Osmar Ferrer había sido enviado a prisión preventiva hacía menos de 24 horas antes de su liberación. Según explicó el propio fiscal Pastén, el imputado no debió haber quedado libre: “la única resolución vigente era la de prisión preventiva”. Todo lo demás (los supuestos papeles, correos o mensajes) no tenían validez legal. Mientras tanto, la Fiscalía ya se puso manos a la obra. El fiscal Pastén confirmó que tomaron declaración a la jueza Irene Rodríguez Chávez y a funcionarios del tribunal, que además entregaron voluntariamente sus celulares , los que se encuentran siendo periciados. También, fueron incautados computadores desde los que se hicieron las comunicaciones clave . Algunos medios hablaron incluso de una posible extorsión contra la magistrada, conjetura que Pastén no lo afirma, pero tampoco la descarta del todo. Lo que sí aclaró es que hasta ahora, en las primeras diligencias, no hay indicios concretos de amenazas ni chantajes . Sobre las presuntas causas del error, el fiscal fue bien prudente: “El hackeo no lo puedo descartar, pero tampoco se descarta que haya sido un error humano o alguna otra motivación”, dijo. Todos quienes declararon hasta el momento están en calidad de testigos .

title: The Cookers sirven un café para muy cafeteros en el arranque del Universijazz
creator: Samuel Regueira
content: Valladolid Martes, 15 de julio 2025, 23:14 Tras el paréntesis que supuso el pasado año del Universijazz desde el patio del colegio San José, el Festival Internacional de Jazz de la Universidad de Valladolid regresa a su enclave habitual, el Patio de la Hospedería de San Benito, donde este martes arrancan cuatro veladas de jazz (a veces puro y a veces mestizo) para neófitos y melómanos recalcitrantes. Publicidad Para estos últimos fue, paradójicamente, el primero de los conciertos de este año, la propuesta de hard bop de The Cookers, que el conjunto estadounidense supo hacer más accesible en su concierto en vivo que en sus trabajos de estudio, más orientados a convencidos y entusiastas de esta corriente del género en particular, para un patio prácticamente lleno y con públicos de todas las edades y pelajes. The Cookers, cuyo nombre procede de uno de los discos canónicos del jazz lanzado en la sonada evolución que experimentó en la década de los cincuenta ('The night of the cookers', de Freddie Hubbard y Lee Morgan), jugó así a moverse en la frontera entre la sofisticación del género y los últimos albores en los que aún podía considerarse un arte popular. Noticias relacionadas La banda, claramente escorada en la primera dirección, desarrolló con precisión casi matematica el devenir de toda melodía de jazz procedente de una big band moderna: establecimiento del tema base, diálogo melódico, momentos para lucimiento personal, y gran final con ecos...

title: America’s only rare earth producer gets a boost from Apple and Pentagon agreements
creator: Associated Press
content: By JOSH FUNK, Associated PressMP Materials, which runs the only American rare earths mine, announced a new $500 million agreement with tech giant Apple on Tuesday to produce more of the powerful magnets used in iPhones as well as other high-tech products like electric vehicles.This news comes on the heels of last week’s announcement that the U.S. Defense Department agreed to invest $400 million in shares of the Las Vegas-based company, establish a floor for the price of key elements and ensure that all of the magnets made at a new plant in the first 10 years are purchased.That unusual direct investment in the company makes the government the largest shareholder in MP Materials.“This is the kind of long-term commitment needed to reshape global rare earth supply chains,” Neha Mukherjee, a rare earths analyst with Benchmark Mineral Intelligence, said in a research note on the Pentagon deal.Related ArticlesFire crews along Grand Canyon are trying to save cabins after loss of historic lodgeFederal grand jury indicts man accused of killing former Minnesota House Speaker Melissa HortmanUniversity of Michigan faces federal investigation after arrest of 2 Chinese scientistsInfluential evangelical preacher John MacArthur dies at 86Former MLB pitcher Dan Serafini is convicted of murder in the 2021 shootings of his wife’s parentsRare earths are a key concern in ongoing U.S. trade talks. China dominates the market and imposed new limits on exports after President Donald Trump announced...

title: America’s only rare earth producer gets a boost from Apple and Pentagon agreements

content: By JOSH FUNK, Associated PressMP Materials, which runs the only American rare earths mine, announced a new $500 million agreement with tech giant Apple on Tuesday to produce more of the powerful magnets used in iPhones as well as other high-tech products like electric vehicles.This news comes on the heels of last week’s announcement that the U.S. Defense Department agreed to invest $400 million in shares of the Las Vegas-based company, establish a floor for the price of key elements and ensure that all of the magnets made at a new plant in the first 10 years are purchased.That unusual direct investment in the company makes the government the largest shareholder in MP Materials.“This is the kind of long-term commitment needed to reshape global rare earth supply chains,” Neha Mukherjee, a rare earths analyst with Benchmark Mineral Intelligence, said in a research note on the Pentagon deal.Related ArticlesFire crews along Grand Canyon are trying to save cabins after loss of historic lodgeFederal grand jury indicts man accused of killing former Minnesota House Speaker Melissa HortmanUniversity of Michigan faces federal investigation after arrest of 2 Chinese scientistsInfluential evangelical preacher John MacArthur dies at 86Former MLB pitcher Dan Serafini is convicted of murder in the 2021 shootings of his wife’s parentsRare earths are a key concern in ongoing U.S. trade talks. China dominates the market and imposed new limits on exports after President Donald Trump announced...

title: No, este video no prueba que Carrefour se va de Argentina: muestra el cierre de la sucursal en Boedo en 2019
creator: Reverso
content: “CARREFOUR SE VA DEL PAIS... AQUI EL CEO EXPLICANDO A LA GENTE PORQUE... PATETICO EL EFECTO DEL GOBIERNO DEL DESQUICIADO” , escribe un usuario en X que comparte una filmación donde se escucha a un hombre anunciar a sus empleados el cierre del supermercado. “Hoy no tengo un mensaje agradable, pero es con mucha sinceridad. No es una decisión que ustedes tomaron, ni que yo tomé. A mí me cuesta mucho cerrar una tienda. Mi trabajo es abrir tiendas, crear puestos de trabajo y atender a los clientes. Ahora tenemos una situación donde no tenemos otra opción” , se escucha al comienzo del video que también se ha compartido en Facebook y Threads . Desde el 8 de julio, varios medios ( 1 , 2 , 3 ) informaron que Carrefour inició la búsqueda de un posible comprador o socio para su negocio en la Argentina, después de cuatro décadas de presencia en el país. Consultado por los rumores del cierre, el equipo de prensa del Grupo Carrefour en Francia explicó el 14 de julio a través de un correo electrónico a AFP Factual —medio que junto a Chequeado coordina la alianza Reverso — que, en el marco del plan estratégico Carrefour 2026 y ante cambios en el mercado, la empresa “ ha iniciado una profunda revisión estratégica de su cartera de negocios”. Además, aclararon que el proceso recién comienza y que no realizan comentarios sobre rumores de mercado. A la fecha de publicación de este artículo no hay anuncios oficiales sobre el retiro del país. Una búsqueda inversa de un...

title: America’s only rare earth producer gets a boost from Apple and Pentagon agreements
creator: Associated Press
content: By JOSH FUNK, Associated PressMP Materials, which runs the only American rare earths mine, announced a new $500 million agreement with tech giant Apple on Tuesday to produce more of the powerful magnets used in iPhones as well as other high-tech products like electric vehicles.This news comes on the heels of last week’s announcement that the U.S. Defense Department agreed to invest $400 million in shares of the Las Vegas-based company, establish a floor for the price of key elements and ensure that all of the magnets made at a new plant in the first 10 years are purchased.That unusual direct investment in the company makes the government the largest shareholder in MP Materials.“This is the kind of long-term commitment needed to reshape global rare earth supply chains,” Neha Mukherjee, a rare earths analyst with Benchmark Mineral Intelligence, said in a research note on the Pentagon deal.Related ArticlesFire crews along Grand Canyon are trying to save cabins after loss of historic lodgeFederal grand jury indicts man accused of killing former Minnesota House Speaker Melissa HortmanUniversity of Michigan faces federal investigation after arrest of 2 Chinese scientistsInfluential evangelical preacher John MacArthur dies at 86Former MLB pitcher Dan Serafini is convicted of murder in the 2021 shootings of his wife’s parentsRare earths are a key concern in ongoing U.S. trade talks. China dominates the market and imposed new limits on exports after President Donald Trump announced...

title: America’s only rare earth producer gets a boost from Apple and Pentagon agreements
creator: Associated Press
content: By JOSH FUNK, Associated Press MP Materials, which runs the only American rare earths mine , announced a new $500 million agreement with tech giant Apple on Tuesday to produce more of the powerful magnets used in iPhones as well as other high-tech products like electric vehicles. This news comes on the heels of last week’s announcement that the U.S. Defense Department agreed to invest $400 million in shares of the Las Vegas-based company, establish a floor for the price of key elements and ensure that all of the magnets made at a new plant in the first 10 years are purchased. That unusual direct investment in the company makes the government the largest shareholder in MP Materials. “This is the kind of long-term commitment needed to reshape global rare earth supply chains,” Neha Mukherjee, a rare earths analyst with Benchmark Mineral Intelligence, said in a research note on the Pentagon deal. Related Articles ICE flexes authority to sharply expand detention without bond hearing American Idol music supervisor and husband both found dead at LA home Pentagon ends deployment of 2,000 National Guard troops in Los Angeles State prosecution in firebombing attack on demonstration for Israeli hostages moves ahead Nvidia to resume sales of highly desired AI computer chips to China Rare earths are a key concern in ongoing U.S. trade talks . title: State regulators crack down on Oakland County over sewage discharge dispute
creator: Lauren Kostiuk
content: Michigan environmental regulators threatened Oakland County with fines and penalties over repeated raw sewage discharges into the Red Run Drain, escalating a long-running dispute between Oakland and Macomb counties over water management. The Michigan Department of Environment, Great Lakes and Energy (EGLE) issued an enforcement notice citing Oakland County for violating state environmental laws.The notice specifically referenced two incidents: an April 2025 discharge of 1.18 million gallons and an August 2023 release of 2.2 million gallons of untreated or partially treated sewage.Environmental Impact and Infrastructure ChallengesThe controversy centers on the Red Run Drain in Madison Heights, where outdated infrastructure struggles to handle heavy rainfall.During severe weather events, the system releases excess water and sewage to prevent basement flooding in Oakland County, but the discharge flows into Macomb County’s Clinton River and Lake St. Clair.Macomb County Public Works Commissioner Candice Miller discovered evidence of the environmental impact years ago.“We found sanitary wipes, condoms and tampons in shrubs and trees along the banks of the Red Run,” Miller told Local 4 in May. Regulatory InterventionEGLE’s June 27 enforcement notice demands immediate action from Oakland County. The state agency requires the county to:Review hydraulic models to identify high-infiltration areasEvaluate system capacities and limitationsAssess operational changes in the George W. Kuhn...

title: Постпред при НАТО Уитакер: Европа не может производить нужное Киеву оружие
creator: (Юлия Курганова)
content: Европейские страны не в состоянии производить оружие, которое требуется ВСУ на поле боя или может понадобиться в случае потенциальной войны в регионе. Об этом высказался постоянный представитель Соединенных Штатов при Североатлантическом альянсе Мэттью Уитакер. — Сейчас Европа не может производить вооружения, которые необходимы Украине на поле боя или в случае потенциальной войны в Европе. Поэтому США являются ведущим производителем таких систем вооружения и будут поставлять их в Европу. Она заплатит за них. Это разумный подход, — сказал он в интервью каналу Fox News. По его словам, американский президент Дональд Трамп не требовал от европейских союзников брать на себя расходы на военную помощь Киеву, поскольку этого, якобы, хотят в самой Европе, передает РИА Новости . Закончился период, когда Штаты тратили неограниченные средства своих налогоплательщиков на поддержку киевского режима, заявил 14 июля Мэттью Уитакер. Он выразил мнение, что Дональд Трамп принял «очень разумное решение» и заключил соглашение с НАТО. Согласно ему, страны Европы и Канада будут оплачивать поставки оружия ВСУ, а Америка производить его.

title: CNC Class Action Alert: Robbins LLP Reminds Centene Corporation Stockholders of the Lead Plaintiff Deadline in the Class Action Against CNC
creator: Globe Newswire
content: SAN DIEGO, July 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Robbins LLP reminds stockholders that a class action was filed on behalf of investors who purchased or otherwise acquired Centene Corporation CNC securities between December 12, 2024 and June 30, 2025. Centene describes itself as a leading healthcare enterprise that is committed to helping people live healthier lives. For more information, submit a form , email attorney Aaron Dumas, Jr., or give us a call at (800) 350-6003. The Allegations: Robbins LLP is Investigating Allegations that Centene Corporation (CNC) Misled Investors Regarding its Business Prospects According to the complaint, defendants created the false impression that they possessed reliable information pertaining to the Company's projected revenue outlook and anticipated growth while also touting enrollment rates and low morbidity. In truth, Centene's optimistic reports and promises regarding the Company's inflated guidance fell short of reality when a preliminary analysis of over two-thirds of Centene's marketplace share showed lower-than-anticipated enrollment and increased aggregate market morbidity. Plaintiff alleges that on July 1, 2025, Centene issued a press release withdrawing 2025 guidance. Specifically, following an analysis of the 2025 Health Insurance Marketplace, Centene's overall market growth across 22 states, or 72% of the Company's marketplace membership, was lower than expected. In pertinent part, the Company stated that this preliminary analysis...

title: Former defence secretary makes ‘no apology’ for Afghan injunction
creator: Caitlin Doherty
content: The former Conservative defence secretary who applied for an injunction blocking reporting about the Afghan data leak has said he makes “no apology”. Thousands of people are being relocated to the UK as part of a secret £850 million scheme set up in the wake of the breach. Sir Ben Wallace has said that the decision to apply for the gagging order was “not as some are childishly trying to claim, a cover up” and that he believed that if the leak had been reported it would have “put in peril those we needed to help out”. It came as Defence Secretary John Healey said that the person involved was “no longer doing the same job”. A dataset containing the personal information of nearly 19,000 people who applied for the Afghan Relocations and Assistance Policy (Arap) was released “in error” in February 2022 by a defence official. The Ministry of Defence only became aware of the breach when excerpts from the dataset were posted anonymously on a Facebook group in August 2023, and a superinjunction was made at the High Court in an attempt to prevent the Taliban finding out about the leak. Writing in the Telegraph, Sir Ben said that when he was informed of the “error” he was “determined that the first priority was to protect all those that might be at risk”. “I make no apology for applying to the court for an injunction at the time. It was not, as some are childishly trying to claim, a cover up,” he said. “I took the view that if this leak was reported at the time, the existence of the...

title: Shootout at high school alumni event injures 1, Alabama cops say. 4 charged
Dominado fogo no concelho de Aljustrel. Fumo obrigou a corte da A2
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: A fonte do Comando Sub-Regional de Emergência e Proteção Civil do Baixo Alentejo indicou que o fogo deflagrou na zona de Senhora da Assunção, na freguesia de Messejana, tendo o alerta sido dado às 18h10. O fogo consumiu uma área de mata de eucaliptos, olival e pasto e não houve registo de feridos nem de habitações afetadas, adiantou. Fonte da GNR afirmou que a Autoestrada 2 (A2) esteve cortada temporariamente nos nós de Castro Verde e de Aljustrel, no distrito de Beja, devido ao fumo do incêndio. Segundo o comando sub-regional, estiveram envolvidos no combate às chamas 144 operacionais, apoiados por 44 veículos e seis meios aéreos. Leia Também: Já foi retomada a circulação na A2 (cortada devido a fogo em Aljustrel)

title: A look at the blockbuster deals announced at the Pa. Energy and Innovation Summit
creator: Tom Fontaine
content: U.S. Sen. Dave McCormick said Tuesday during the Pennsylvania Energy and Innovation Summit in Pittsburgh that companies are planning to invest more than $90 billion in data centers, energy and power infrastructure, and workforce and AI training projects across Pennsylvania. Fifteen of the companies plan to invest at least $1 billion in Pennsylvania, according to a fact sheet provided by McCormick’s office. Here’s a look at those planned investments: Blackstone Blackstone, the world’s largest alternative investment firm with more than $1 trillion in assets under management, announced a $25 billion investment to develop data centers and natural gas plants in Northeast Pennsylvania, along with a joint venture with PPL Corporation for power generation. The investment is expected to create 6,000 construction jobs and 3,000 permanent jobs, McCormick’s office said. “What we’re thinking about and what makes us so excited about the area is the idea you can co-locate the data centers right next to the source of power,” Blackstone President and Chief Operating Officer Jon Gray said. “And that’s really the special sauce here.” Homer City Redevelopment Group McCormick’s office said Homer City Redevelopment Group has reached an agreement in principle to buy $15 billion of natural gas produced in Pennsylvania to support over 4 gigawatts of power generation at a proposed redevelopment site in Indiana County. TribLive reported Tuesday that developers will present plans Wednesday for a $10...

title: Premio 'Orgullo Rural' a una vida dedicada al tabaco
Olimpija Ljubljana, de Jorge Simão, eliminado da Liga dos Campeões
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: U ma semana depois do empate caseiro (1-1), o campeão esloveno foi derrotado com golos do português Jorginho, assistido pelo compatriota Luís Mata, logo ao quinto minuto, e de Aleksandr Mrynskiy, aos 31, tendo utilizado de início os lusos Diga e Diogo Pinto. O Kairat rumou à segunda pré-eliminatória da Liga dos Campeões, enquanto o Olimpija foi relegado para as rondas de acesso à fase principal da Liga Conferência, a exemplo dos luxemburgueses do Differdange, comandados por Pedro Silva, que foram batidos em casa pelo Drita (3-2) e repetiram a derrota pela diferença mínima averbada no Kosovo (1-0). Nos outros jogos da primeira fase de acesso à fase de liga da 71.a edição da principal competição europeia de clubes, o capitão Bernardo Lopes ajudou os gibraltinos do Lincoln Red Imps a ganharem na receção ao Vikingur (1-0), após o triunfo nas Ilhas Faroé (3-2). A primeira ronda preliminar da Liga dos Campeões apura 14 clubes para a fase seguinte e encerrará na quarta-feira, com mais dois encontros, incluindo a visita dos búlgaros do Ludogorets Razgrad, comandados por Rui Mota, aos bielorrussos do Dinamo Minsk. Leia Também: Olimpija, de Jorge Simão, empata no caminho para a Champions

title: Comissão de financiamento e controlo económico da FPF reúne-se
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: "Q ueremos perceber a realidade atual e apresentar propostas, no sentido de melhorar matérias tão importantes para a sustentabilidade do futebol. Temos um grande objetivo, que é apresentar no Congresso do Futebol, em janeiro de 2026], um raio-X e algumas medidas", explicou o líder daquele órgão consultivo, em declarações citadas pela FPF. Além de Joaquim Sousa Marques, a comissão de financiamento e controlo económico juntou Vasco Pinho e Manuel Nunes, diretor executivo e coordenador das comissões do organismo federativo, respetivamente, bem como Vítor Calado e Frederico Fernandes. "A ideia é trazer para a discussão um conjunto de elementos de várias sensibilidades do futebol para que, em conjunto, possamos trabalhar. Cada 'stakeholder' tem a sua realidade e precisamos ter uma visão 360 de todas, para, depois, propormos as medidas mais adequadas para melhorarmos e continuarmos a ter êxitos desportivos", detalhou. O órgão voltará a reunir no final de julho e, ao longo dos trabalhos, pretende abrir as portas a peritos que possam enriquecer a discussão, tal como sucederá com as demais comissões da FPF, criadas para encetar um novo modelo de governação no organismo. "A realidade das comissões é discutir os temas mais importantes para o futebol nacional, contribuindo para melhorarmos, irmos mais longe, sermos mais fortes e continuarmos na senda de êxitos que o futebol português tem tido", adicionou Joaquim Sousa Marques. A FPF lançou recentemente 19...

title: En lo que va del 2025, ya son 14 víctimas mortales de peatones en Cartagena: la estrategia del DATT para los accidentes de tránsito con transeúntes
content: El Departamento Administrativo de Tránsito y Transporte (DATT) intensifica una campaña de sensibilización para prevenir accidentes de peatones en Cartagena. LEA TAMBIÉN El Caribe colombiano se sofoca al máximo: el aire seco del Sáhara llega a aumentar la temperatura en toda la región Redacción Tiempo Durante los primeros siete meses del 2025, la ciudad de Cartagena ha experimentado un preocupante incremento en los incidentes viales , lo que ha encendido las alarmas del DATT. Hasta ahora, se han reportado 677 accidentes de tránsito, de los cuales han resultado 55 personas fallecidas y 1.065 lesionadas. En este panorama, hay un índice de 99 casos registrados en los que esta vez ha sido particularmente vulnerable el peatón, con un total de 14 muertes en lo que va del año . Esta circunstancia motivó la campaña ‘Pasos seguros’ para crear conciencia y cultura vial en la ciudad. Las autoridades en Cartagena incrementaron los operativos de seguridad. Foto: Tránsito de Cartagena: DAAT Las motocicletas protagonizan la mayoría de los siniestros La mayoría de estos siniestros involucran motocicletas , que participan en el 85% de los casos, consolidándose como el principal vehículo asociado a la accidentalidad . Ante esta situación alarmante, el DATT ha intensificado su labor educativa , ejecutando ‘Pasos seguros’, una campaña que pretende cambiar comportamientos y promover una cultura vial responsable mediante educación y sanciones pertinentes. Estas iniciativas...

title: Autoamnistía

title: Guterres insta al Gobierno de Siria y a los líderes locales a reducir las tensiones y restablecer la calma
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: El secretario general de la ONU, António Guterres, ha instado este martes al Gobierno de transición de Siria y a los líderes locales a reducir las tensiones y restablecer la calma tras los enfrentamientos registrados en la gobernación de Sueida, en el sur del país, que se ha saldado por el momento con más de 200 víctimas mortales. "Insta a las autoridades interinas y a los líderes locales a reducir inmediatamente la tensión, proteger a la población civil, restablecer la calma y, por supuesto, prevenir nuevas incitaciones. Insta además a las autoridades interinas a investigar de forma transparente y abierta, y a exigir rendición de cuentas a los responsables", ha dicho el portavoz de Guterres, Stéphane Dujarric. El jefe de la ONU se ha mostrado "profundamente preocupado por la continua violencia" en Sueida, "que ha causado decenas de víctimas, incluso entre la población civil", y ha dicho que le "preocupan los informes sobre asesinatos arbitrarios de civiles, incitación sectaria y saqueo de la propiedad privada". "Condena toda violencia contra población civil, especialmente los actos que exacerben las tensiones sectarias", ha subrayado, al tiempo que ha criticado los ataques aéreos de Israel en territorio sirio. Así, ha instado a las autoridades israelíes a "abstenerse de violar la independencia, la soberanía y la integridad territorial de Siria". La Comisión Internacional Independiente de Investigación sobre Siria, establecida en 2011 con el mandato de...

title: Bre-B on the Horizon: Cobre Prepares for Greater Business Digital Financial Inclusion
creator: Republished By Echobase.ai
content: In September 2025, Colombia will be joining its Latin American (LatAm) neighbours in the digital payments world, as the Central Bank of Colombia (Banco de la República) will make Bre-B, the new payment system for individuals and businesses, operational. Gearing up for this launch, Cobre, the business payment firm in LatAm, has revealed that it will now be able to offer instant interbank payments for businesses through the payment network.Bre-B, Colombia’s payment network, which is anticipated to bring the same success that PIX has brought Brazil, Transferencias 3.0 has brought Argentina, and SINPE has brought Chile, will move the country away from being cash-first and into the digital era. According to the Central Bank of Colombia, digital payments currently represent less than 15 per cent of all payments across the nation, while cash is used by 70 per cent. Bre-B looks to change this.Utilising the framework, Cobre will allow companies to use payment aliases (keys) to receive instant and interoperable transfers without altering their existing accounting flows or payment systems. This will eliminate operational friction and make it easier to adopt this new financial infrastructure. They will also be able to receive payments from corporate clients around the clock — 24/7, including weekends and holidays, which will significantly improve cash flow and accelerate accounting cycles.José Gedeón, CEO and co-founder of CobreCobre plans to grant early access to its customers, a...

title: Na rynkach akcji w USA wyprzedaż, ale Nasdaq z nowym rekordem
content: Na amerykańskich rynkach akcji staniało we wtorek prawie trzy czwarte spółek. Były to jednak głównie te o średniej (-1,8 proc.) i małej (-2,1 proc.) kapitalizacji oraz „value” (-1,0 proc.). Drożały natomiast te o najwyższej wartości rynkowej i wzrostowe. Zwiększona podaż akcji tłumaczona była reakcją na opublikowane przed sesją dane o inflacji w czerwcu. Choć okazała się zgodna z oczekiwaniami, to wzrosła drugi miesiąc z rzędu, co ma być skutkiem ceł wprowadzanych przez prezydenta Donalda Trumpa. Reakcją był wzrost rentowności obligacji USA. W przypadku 30-letnich przekroczyła 5 proc. po raz pierwszy od maja, co miało skłonić inwestorów do realizacji zysków na akcjach. Mieszane reakcje wywołały opublikowane przed sesją wyniki banków. Wyraźnie spadła wartość Wells Fargo (-5,5 proc.). Choć miał wyższy niż oczekiwano zysk i przychody, to inwestorów rozczarowało obniżenie prognozy rocznego wyniku odsetkowego. W przeciwnym kierunku potoczyły się natomiast notowania Citigroup (3,7 proc.). Jego kurs wzrósł w trakcie sesji najwyżej od 2008 roku po tym jak bank zapowiedział zwiększenie buybacku dzięki dobrym wynikom kwartalnym. Spadł kurs JP Morgan (-0,75 proc.), największego amerykańskiego banku. Choć jego wyniki w minionym kwartale okazały się lepsze niż oczekiwano, to były gorsze niż rok wcześniej. Generalnie branżowy indeks KBW spadł o 2,4 proc., najmocniej od ośmiu tygodni. W środę opublikują raporty kolejne banki: Morgan Stanley...

title: CHRIS HUGHES: 'Afghans who helped our troops deserve loyalty - they were betrayed'
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Chris Hughes)
content: Brave Afghan colleagues gave British troops invaluable eyes and ears on the ground over many years of war, saving countless lives - but they were betrayed when Kabul fell to the Taliban Chris Hughes is the Daily Mirror Defence and Security Editor. Chris won specialist journalist of the year in 2013 at the UK Press Awards. He has reported from frontlines in Afghanistan, Iraq, Syria, Lebanon, Israel and Ukraine and terror attacks globally including 9-11 in the US. For exclusive analysis you can follow him on Substack here - https://hostileworld.substack.com/ British troops who spent years on the Afghan frontline know first-hand many of their Afghan colleagues and friends were invaluable. Of course many of the Afghans allowed to come to the UK because of their UK associations had jobs outside translating or working with the military. There were civilian contractors throughout from Helmand Province to Kabul , employing hundreds of locals for a variety of jobs. Embassies, consular buildings, charities, foreign office schemes all had the opportunity to employ or have links to local Afghans. They felt safe and committed to the coalition project to dispense democracy, education, security, investing in a future vibrant and bustling economy. In 2021 that all fell to dust as the Taliban stormed Kabul, surprising everyone even though they had been bragging this was what they planned to do for a decade. In 2013 in Peshawar, Pakistan veteran Taliban commander Qari Nasrullah met me and...

title: Panipat News: बीए, बीएससी व बीकॉम प्रथम वर्ष की सीटें अभी खाली
content: मतलौडा। राजकीय महिला महाविद्यालय में बीए, बीएससी व बीकॉम प्रथम वर्ष के लिए सीटें खाली हैं। जो छात्रा किसी कारणवश दाखिला नहीं ले पाई हैं, वह दाखिला ले सकती हैं। प्राचार्य डॉ. प्रदीप कुमार ने बताया कि छात्राओं को महाविद्यालय में आने-जाने के लिए मुफ्त बस सुविधा हरियाणा सरकार की ओ से उपलब्ध कराई गई है। हरियाणा व केंद्रीय सरकार द्वारा महाविद्यालय की सभी वर्ग की छात्राओं के लिए अनेक प्रकार की स्कॉलरशिप दी जा रही हैं। जिससे छात्राओं को पढ़ने में आने वाली परेशानियों के समाधान के लिए आर्थिक सहायता प्रदान की जाती है। अर्न व्हाइल यू लर्न स्कीम के तहत भी छात्रा पढ़ते हुए भी कुछ पैसे कमा सकती है। इससे छात्राओं को आर्थिक मदद मिलती है। महाविद्यालय में विश्वविद्यालय स्तर के खेल में हिस्सा लेने के लिए छात्राओं को तैयारी भी करवाई जाती है। संवाद

title: Caixa: Apostas de Jacareí e Taubaté faturam, juntas, R$ 327,8 mil em sorteios da loteria
content: Segundo a Caixa, os premiados da região foram contemplados nos concursos da Lotofácil e Lotomania. A aposta de acertou os 15 números da Lotofácil e faturou o prêmio principal de R$ 265.606,19. A aposta de Jacareí foi simples, com 15 números apostados. Ela foi realizada na Mega Sorte Loterias, localizada dentro de um supermercado na região central da cidade. Além da aposta de Jacareí, outras três também faturaram o mesmo valor no prêmio principal. Na Lotomania, também nesta segunda-feira (14), uma aposta de acertou 19 dos 20 números sorteados e faturou um total de R$ 62.217,75. Além dela, outras quatro de outras cidades também faturaram o mesmo valor. A aposta taubateana foi realizada na Lotérica Nova, também localizada em um supermercado, no bairro Jardim Maria Augusta. Ela foi simples, com 50 números apostados. O próximo concurso da Lotofácil acontece nesta terça (15), enquanto o próximo sorteio da Lotomania será realizado nesta quarta-feira (16), ambos no Espaço da Sorte, em São Paulo. С какими запретами столкнулись россияне на чемпионате мира по плаванию
creator: Альвина Цаканян
content: Чемпионат мира по водным видам спорта проходит с 11 июля по 3 августа в Сингапуре. Российские спортсмены представлены во всех видах спорта, кроме хайдайвинга и водного поло. Всего около 100 российских и белорусских спортсменов допущены к участию на ЧМ в качестве представителей команд — Нейтральных атлетов «Б» (NAB) и Нейтральных атлетов «А» (NAA). На чемпионате мира по водным видам спорта проходят соревнования по шести видам спорта: Водное поло — с 11 по 25 июля. Плавание на открытой воде — с 15 по 20 июля. Синхронное плавание — с 18 по 25 июля. Хайдайвинг — с 24 по 27 июля. Прыжки в воду — с 26 июля по 3 августа. Плавание — с 27 июля по 3 августа. Прямые эфиры чемпионата мира по водным видам спорта 2025 года будут показывать на телеканале «Матч ТВ». В World Aquatics говорили , что российским и белорусским спортсменам, выступающим на чемпионате мира по водным видам спорта, запрещено демонстрировать национальную символику в социальных сетях. Там также подчеркнули, что спортсменам запрещено высказываться или давать комментарии по поводу «какого-либо конфликта» между странами. World Aquatics запретила Федерации водных видов спорта России публиковать на своих ресурсах результаты россиян и белорусов на чемпионате мира в Сингапуре. «Федерация не может публиковать результаты этих спортсменов на своем веб-сайте, поскольку это противоречило бы статье 8.2 правил, в которых говорится: нейтральным спортсменам, их вспомогательному персоналу и их национальной федерации не...

title: Let's talk about tax: Treasury's error does the government a favour
creator: Michael Janda
content: "Tax should be raised as part of broader tax reform." It's the kind of headline that typically has treasurers ducking and weaving. It certainly had the opposition salivating over an early opportunity to draw some political blood after its own crushing election defeat. "What Mr Albanese needs to explain to the Australian people is what those higher taxes are," Liberal Leader Sussan Ley opined. But, confronted with the accidental release of typically confidential parts of his department's Incoming Government Brief, the treasurer didn't flinch. "I'm pretty relaxed about it, to be honest," was Jim Chalmers' response. No denial, and not even really any concerted attempt to distance the government from what is as close to independent as Treasury advice ever gets (although the treasurer is decamping this week to the G20 meetings in South Africa). Chalmers instead chose to own the leaked advice on tax reform. "We have made it clear that we need to build on the progress we've made in repairing the budget so that we can make the budget even more sustainable," he told reporters. "So, the priorities which are being reported today are the sorts of things that I have mentioned before, including at the National Press Club." The treasurer used a National Press Club address to declare he had an open mind on including tax changes as part of a package of reforms considered in August's round table. For those who missed it, having emerged from an election campaign where Labor played small target...

title: Children at risk of being recruited by hostile states, police warn
content: Counter-terror police have warned the activity of hostile states on British soil is posing a growing threat and urged families to watch for signs their children are being manipulated. Teenagers, along with petty criminals and disillusioned people, may be more vulnerable to recruitment by Russia, Iran and China, they warned. Hostile states are increasingly using proxies to carry out acts of sabotage and targeted violence in the UK, counter-terror police said, adding that investigating such activity now accounts for about 20% of their workload. Parents and teachers should "be inquisitive" and "seek help" if they think a child is at risk, police advised. Since the Salisbury poisonings in 2018 – which targeted Russian double agent Sergei Skripal – there has been a five-fold increase in police work to tackle hostile activity, commanders said. "The breadth, complexity and volume of these operations has continued to grow at a rate that I'm not sure that us, or our partners internationally, or any intelligence community predicted," Dominic Murphy, head of the Metropolitan Police's Counter-Terrorism Command, told reporters. "We are increasingly seeing these three states, but not just these three states, undertaking threat to life operations in the United Kingdom." The youngest person arrested or investigated on suspicion of involvement is aged in their "mid-teens", he added. Vicki Evans, Counter Terrorism Policing's senior national co-ordinator, expressed concern other children may...

title: Gold Reserve Wins Appeal at Portugal Supreme Court
creator: Business Wire
content: PEMBROKE, Bermuda — Gold Reserve Ltd. (TSX.V: GRZ) (OTCQX: GDRZF) (“Gold Reserve” or the “Company”) is pleased to announce that in a recently published decision, Portugal’s Supreme Court upheld a decision recognizing the Company’s 2014 international arbitration award (the “Award”) against the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela (“Venezuela”) and rejecting the state’s sovereign immunity and public policy defenses. The total amount owed by Venezuela under the Award, inclusive of interest, exceeds $1.1 billion. In February 2025, the Lisbon Court of Appeal issued an order granting the Company’s application to confirm the Award in Portugal and entered judgment for the Company against Venezuela in the amount of the Award. In the present decision, the Supreme Court of Justice affirmed the Court of Appeal’s decision. Venezuela also was ordered to pay costs. We apologize, but this video has failed to load. title: Programa FIFA primera etapa de la venta de boletos para el Mundial 2026
creator: Axel Sierra/Quadratín Michoacán
content: MORELIA, Mich., 15 de julio de 2025.- La FIFA anunció que el miércoles 10 de septiembre será la fecha para la primera fase de varias que formarán parte de la venta de boletos para la Copa del Mundo de la FIFA 2026. La dinámica será a través del portal FIFA.com/tickets, mediante FIFA ID. En un comunicado, la FIFA dio a conocer que será mediante diferentes fases de ventas de entradas, que abarcarán desde el 10 de septiembre (el principio de las ventas) hasta el domingo 19 de julio de 2026, día del partido final, las dinámicas para que los aficionados puedan adquirir boletos para los partidos del tan esperado torneo. Las fases podrán variar en cuanto a los procesos de compra, los métodos de pago y los tipos de entradas. En los próximos meses se publicará información sobre cada fase. Se anima a los aficionados a visitar FIFA.com/tickets y manifestar su interés, así como crear una FIFA ID", explicó la FIFA. El Mundial arrancará el jueves 11 de junio de 2026 en la Ciudad de México y finalizará el domingo 19 de julio del mismo año en Nueva York/Nueva Jersey, el mismo lugar que acogió la final del Mundial de Clubes FIFA el pasado domingo. La Copa del Mundo será la edición más grande de la competición hasta el momento, con la participación de 48 selecciones, que darán paso a 104 partidos en tres países anfitriones, y se prevé que asistan 6.5 millones de aficionados. El sorteo de la máxima fiesta del futbol se celebrará en diciembre y, una vez...

title: ¿Qué estados serán más afectados por recortes de la Big Beautiful Bill a los Beneficios SNAP?
creator: José Luis Martínez
content: Este 4 de julio, el presidente Donald Trump promulgó su reforma presupuestaria conocida simplemente como la Ley One Big Beautiful Bill (OBBBA) , luego de un intenso debate en el Congreso para su aprobación, por un escaso margen. La OBBBA implica cambios radicales en todo el sistema de inmigración de EE.UU., en la aplicación de diversas leyes, autorizaciones para trabajar de manera legal en el país y acceso a servicios de asistencia como Medicaid y SNAP. Hasta antes de la promulgación de la OBBBA, ciertos grupos de migrantes con residencia legal en el país eran elegibles para programas de asistencia como los Beneficios SNAP siempre que cumplieran con ciertos requisitos de ingreso y financieros para el programa. Entre ellos beneficiaba a: refugiados, asilados, víctimas de trata, amerasians, participantes cubanos y haitianos, titulares de visas especiales de inmigrante (SIV) iraquíes y afganos y Ciudadanos del Pacto de Libre Asociación (COFA) de las Islas Marshall, Micronesia y Palaos. Sin embargo, SNAP nunca ha estado disponible para ciudadanos indocumentado s. De acuerdo con la Sección 10108, titulada ‘Elegibilidad para extranjeros en el SNAP’ , de la OBBBA se reduce la lista de poblaciones elegibles para el SNAP y queda restringida solo para ciudadanos estadounidenses, ciertos residentes permanentes legales en EE.UU., inmigrantes cubanos y haitianos, y los ciudadanos del Pacto COFA. SNAP helps 42 million people afford food. That includes older adults, disabled...

title: Classified, The Stanfields and local youth to perform at Trunk 7 Music Festival
creator: CTVNews
content: Classified, The Stanfields, Charlie A’Court, The Royal Volts, and Jenn Grant are set to headline this year’s Trunk 7 Music Festival, happening this Friday and Saturday in Porters Lake, N.S. The not-for-profit festival, launched in 2015 by local educators, was created to promote Nova Scotia’s homegrown music scene as well as help young artists get a real taste of the industry. Download the CTV News App for breaking news alerts and video on all the top stories “We try to have a diverse lineup and accommodate as many different types of musical acts,” said festival founder Nick Pettipas. “People can usually find something to enjoy.” Award-winning artist Jenn Grant, who has called Lake Echo home for more than a decade, says the festival’s community spirit hits close to home. “I love being part of this community and it’s so important that there’s a festival down here... it really does bring everyone together,” said Grant. But what truly sets Trunk 7 apart is its Youth Showcase. It gives young performers a shot at the big stage – including 15-year-old Brooklyn King from West Chezzetcook. “I think music is very powerful,” King said. “When I perform, to see smiles on people’s faces makes me feel good too.” Pettipas says watching young artists gain experience year after year is one of the best parts. “They get more comfortable and really put on a nice show. It’s their hard work that gets them up on that stage.” Grant says she knows first-hand how valuable that early experience can be....

title: Los Memphis Grizzlies renuevan el contrato multianual del ala-pívot español Santi Aldama
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: Los Memphis Grizzlies han anunciado este martes la renovación del contrato multianual del ala-pívot español Santi Aldama, de 24 años y 2,08 metros de estatura, pero sin revelar los términos del acuerdo por "la política del equipo", algo común en la NBA. Aldama disputó la temporada pasada con los Grizzlies 65 partidos (16 como titular) y estableció récords personales al promediar 12,5 puntos, 6,4 rebotes y 2,9 asistencias en 25,5 minutos, con un 48,3 % de acierto en tiros de campo y un 36,8% en triples, según indicó el club de Memphis. "Ha aumentado sus promedios de anotación, rebotes y asistencias año tras año en las cuatro temporadas desde que los Grizzlies lo adquirieron con la selección no 30 del Draft de la NBA de 2021", añadió la franquicia de Tennessee en su comunicado oficial. "Anotó al menos 20 puntos en 10 ocasiones la temporada pasada, incluyendo un récord personal de 29 puntos el 17 de enero de 2025 en San Antonio. También registró sus mejores marcas personales en un solo partido con 17 rebotes el 25 de noviembre de 2024 contra Portland y 11 asistencias el 1 de marzo de 2025 contra San Antonio", subrayó la nota de prensa. Ese texto agregó sobre el jugador grancanario que "sus 10 dobles-dobles establecieron la mejor marca de su carrera en una sola temporada" y que "sus seis dobles-dobles saliendo desde el banquillo igualaron la tercera mayor cantidad de un jugador reserva de la NBA en la temporada pasada".
