title: המשטרה הודיעה: פיצוץ נשמע מחוץ לאצטדיון גרונדמן ברמת השרון, אין נפגעים
content: דיווח במוקד המשטרה התקבל אמש (שלישי) בדבר שמיעת הדי פיצוץ עז באזור ציבורי ברמת השרון, כאשר מדובר על האצטדיון ברמת השרון – אצטדיון גרונדמן. בתוך כך, לא נראה שזה היה כדי לפגוע במקום אליו נזרק האובייקט שיצר את הפיצוץ. כוחות משטרה מתחנת גלילות, חבלני משטרה וחוקרי הזיהוי הפלילי של מרחב ירקון הגיעו לזירה, החלו באיסוף ממצאים ובביצוע פעולות חקירה ראשוניות. המשטרה בודקת את הכיוונים. אין נפגעים ולא נגרם נזק, נסיבות האירוע נבדקות. עיריית רמת השרון שלחה לתושבים על האירוע: “תושבים ותושבות יקרים, בשעה האחרונה נשמע פיצוץ עז באזור מורשה, ככל הנראה כתוצאה מאירוע פלילי. אין נפגעים ואין חשש לאירוע לאומני. הנושא בבדיקה”. אצטדיון גרונדמן הוקם בשנת 1998 ונקרא על שם יעקב גרונדמן ז”ל, שחקן העבר של בני יהודה ונבחרת ישראל, שאימן גם כמה קבוצות בארץ ובניהן מכבי פתח תקווה, הפועל חיפה, מכבי תל אביב, מכבי נתניה, הפועל ת”א ובני יהודה. יש לציין כי הפועל רמת השרון מהליגה הלאומית, משחקת בגרונדמן.

title: Polícia investiga áudio com suposta trama para incriminar prefeito de Itaguaí com drogas
content: A gravação revela uma conversa com as vozes do atual presidente da Câmara Municipal de Itaguaí, Haroldo Rodrigues Jesus Neto, o , e o ex-secretário de Segurança Pública, Defesa Civil e Trânsito da cidade, , o . Segundo o delegado Rodrigo Bichara Moreira, titular da 50o DP (Itaguaí), os envolvidos devem ser chamados para prestar depoimento. 'Enfiar cocaína no carro dele' No papo, que teria sido gravado no último dia 2 de julho, durante reunião entre os dois e outros aliados do presidente da Câmara, no gabinete de Robertinho, . O áudio foi divulgado pelo site e obtido pelo . Impasse em Itaguaí Dr. Rubão — Foto: Reprodução/TV Globo A cidade de Itaguaí vive um impasse político e jurídico sobre quem deve ocupar o cargo de prefeito. Rubão venceu as eleições municipais de 2024, mas foi impedido de tomar posse pelo Tribunal Regional Eleitoral do Rio (TRE-RJ). A Justiça entendeu que a candidatura dele poderia configurar um — algo proibido pela legislação eleitoral. O questionamento tem origem em 2020. Na época, como presidente da Câmara de Vereadores, Rubão assumiu interinamente a Prefeitura entre julho e dezembro, após o afastamento do então prefeito. Depois disso, foi eleito nas eleições de 2020 e governou até 2024. Na visão do TRE, a tentativa de reeleição em 2024 seria, na prática, uma terceira gestão. Com o impedimento de Rubão, quem assumiu o comando do Executivo municipal foi o presidente da Câmara, Haroldinho, de forma provisória....

title: 'Outback killer' who murdered Yorkshire backpacker takes details of his death to his grave
creator: newsdesk@men-news.co.uk (James Holt, Anders Anglesey)
content: Bradley John Murdoch, better known as the 'Outback killer' has died aged 67, taking details of murder victim Peter Falconio to his grave. Murdoch was previously diagnosed with terminal throat cancer in 2019 and was transferred to a palliative care unit in Alice Springs Correctional Centre, in Northern Territory, Australia. Murdoch shot and killed Brit backpacker Peter and his body has not been found in the years since. Murdoch died overnight at Alice Springs Hospital having previously been service a life sentence for Peter's murder following a guilty verdict in December 2005. Never miss a story with the MEN's daily Catch Up newsletter - get it in your inbox by signing up here Bradley John Murdoch was convicted in 2005 of murdering Mr Falconio, 28, from Hepworth in West Yorkshire, and assaulting his girlfriend Joanne Lees , from Huddersfield, at gunpoint on a remote stretch of road near Barrow Creek in Australia’s Northern Territory on July 14 2001. Mr Falconio and Ms Lees had been travelling across the country in a camper van when they were ambushed by Murdoch on the Stuart Highway, an isolated road that runs through the centre of Australia. Ms Lees was bound with cable ties by Murdoch, although she managed to escape and hid in the bush for five hours before she managed to wave down a passing vehicle to seek help. Murdoch had always denied murdering Peter. Peter's dad Luciano gave an interview on the 24th anniversary of the day his son was killed - July 14, 2001, the Mirror...

title: El jefe de Nvidia dice que tiene aprobación de EEUU para vender sus chips H20 de IA en China
creator: Redacción La Calle
content: Por The Associated Press undefinedBEIJING (AP) — Nvidia ha obtenido la aprobación del gobierno de Estados Unidos para venderle a China sus avanzados chips de inteligencia artificial H20 para computadoras, según anunció el director general del gigante tecnológico, Jensen Huang.La noticia se dio a conocer en un blog de la compañía el lunes por la noche. Huang también habló sobre el logro en la cadena de televisión estatal china CGTN, en declaraciones mostradas en la red social X.«El gobierno de Estados Unidos le ha asegurado a Nvidia que se otorgarán licencias, y Nvidia espera comenzar las entregas pronto», decía el blog.«Hoy anuncio que el gobierno de Estados Unidos ha aprobado que presentemos licencias para comenzar a enviar los H20», dijo Huang a los periodistas en Beijing. Señaló que la mitad de los investigadores de IA del mundo están en China.«Es tan innovador y dinámico aquí en China que es realmente importante que las empresas estadounidenses puedan competir y servir al mercado aquí en China», expresó.Huang se reunió recientemente con el presiente, Donald Trump y otros responsables políticos de Estados Unidos, y esta semana se encuentra en Beijing para asistir a una conferencia sobre la cadena de suministro y hablar con funcionarios chinos.La televisora mostró a Huang reuniéndose con Ren Hongbin, el jefe del Consejo Chino para la Promoción del Comercio Internacional, anfitrión de la Exposición Internacional de la Cadena de Suministro de China,...

title: 'Tuca' Ferretti arremete contra joven portero de Pumas
creator: enrique.lopez
content: Rodrigo Parra vivió un debut agridulce en la Liga MX . El joven guardameta de 17 años y 7 meses , el más joven en estrenarse en torneos cortos y lo hizo en la portería de Pumas de la UNAM , donde fue protagonista el pasado fin de semana en la Jornada 1 del Apertura 2025 , pero no por las razones que habría querido. TAMBIÉN PUEDES LEER: Santos golea a Pumas y triunfa en Jornada 1 tras cinco torneos Durante la visita del conjunto auriazul a Santos Laguna en el Estadio TSM, Parra cometió un par de errores que derivaron en goles del rival , en un partido que terminó con una contundente derrota de 3-0 . La presión y el impacto emocional del momento fueron demasiado para el juvenil, quien rompió en llanto tras el silbatazo final . Su reacción generó debate en redes sociales y en el entorno del futbol mexicano , dividiendo opiniones sobre si el arquero fue arrojado al ruedo demasiado pronto . FERRETTI: “CHAMACO CHILLÓN, LA RIEGA Y SE PONE A LLORAR” Uno de los que no se contuvo fue Ricardo ‘Tuca’ Ferretti . El veterano entrenador, conocido por su carácter fuerte y su estilo directo , lanzó una crítica sin filtros contra Parra durante su intervención en el programa Generación F de ESPN . KEYLOR NAVAS, CADA VEZ MÁS CERCA Mientras tanto, Pumas intenta dar vuelta a la página . El equipo dirigido por Efraín Juárez se alista para enfrentar este domingo a los Tuzos del Pachuca en el Estadio Olímpico Universitario, con la esperanza de cerrar la contratación del...

title: Ruhsatsız Silah Kazası: Zeki Akbulut Hayatını Kaybetti
content: TOKAT'ın Erbaa ilçesinde iddiaya göre ruhsatsız tabancasını kurcalarken silahın kazara ateş alması sonucu vurulan Zeki Akbulut (59) hayatını kaybetti. Olay, saat 18.00 sıralarında ilçeye bağlı Beykaya köyünde meydana geldi. Köyde yaşayan Zeki Akbulut, ruhsatsız tabancasını kontrol ettiği sırada iddiaya göre silah kazara ateş aldı. Akbulut, tabancadan çıkan kurşunun göğsüne isabet etmesiyle yaralandı. İhbar üzerine olay yerine sağlık ve jandarma ekipleri sevk edildi. Sağlık ekiplerinin yaptığı kontrolde Akbulut'un hayatını kaybettiği belirlendi. Olayla ilgili soruşturma başlatıldı.

title: Produtores rurais recebem título definitivo de propriedade para o cultivo de soja no Amapá
content: Igor Miotto, que é agricultor com propriedade em , foi um dos contemplados. Ele disse que o título de propriedade vai mudar a realidade. Com a novidade, os produtores poderão obter créditos para elevar a produção Igor Miotto foi contemplado com a regularização do cultivo de soja — Foto: Maksuel Martins/GEA O casal de produtores rurais, Noemia Pantoja Oliveira e Solano Barbosa também integram os novos regularizados. Noemia disse que após a devida valorização, a tendência é expandir os negócios. "Só tenho gratidão. Vai mudar muita coisa, valoriza mais o nosso terreno. Sem documento, parece que não vale nada, né? Com ele, já melhora bastante. Agora podemos fazer projetos. Vai ajudar muito na nossa agricultura”, contou. Noemia e o marido querem expandir os negócios após a regularização — Foto: Maksuel Martins/GEA O presidente da Cooperativa Agroindustrial Amapaense (Uniagro), Roberto Arroyo, disse que produz soja no estado à cerca de uma década. Apenas em 2025, ele e os outros tiveram a devida regularização. "Estamos com uma produção muito boa e o Governo do Estado vem apoiando o agronegócio, liberando essa documentação", reforçou. Diversas autoridades políticas estiveram presentes no evento, o que mostra o consenso para o desenvolvimento do agronegócio no Amapá, que é um potencial. Segundo Roberto, a produção local de grão se assemelha a do Centro-Norte e Centro-Oeste do Brasil. Cem agricultores receberam regularização do plantio de...

title: Yüzde 42'si yok olacak, 39 trilyon dolar kayba yol açacak
content: Ramsar Sözleşmesi olarak da anılan Sulak Alanların Korunması Sözleşmesi Sekretaryası, "2025 Sulak Alanların Küresel Durumu: Sulak Alanların Değeri, Korunması ve Finansmanı" başlıklı rapor yayımladı. Sulak alan kaybı ile bu eğilimi tersine çevirmek için gereken önlemlere ilişkin güncel bilimsel ve ekonomik veriler sunulan raporda, su, gıda, geçim kaynakları ve iklim direnci sağlayan sulak alanların endişe verici hızda yok olduğu belirtildi. YÜZDE 22'Sİ YOK OLDU Raporda, 1970'ten bu yana, turbalık alan, nehir ve göl gibi tatlı su ekosistemleri ile mangrov ve mercan resifleri gibi kıyı deniz ekosistemlerini barındıran sulak alanların yaklaşık yüzde 22'sinin yok olduğu aktarıldı. Dünya genelindeki sulak alan kaybının 411 milyon hektara ulaştığı vurgulanan raporda, kalan sulak alanların dörtte birinin ise "bozulmuş durumda" olduğu kaydedildi. 2050'DE YÜZDE 42'YE ULAŞACAK Mevcut kaybın hızla sürmesi halinde, 2050'ye kadar kalan sulak alanların yüzde 20'sinin daha yok olabileceği aktarılan raporda, bunun yaklaşık 39 trilyon dolarlık ekonomik kayba neden olacağı vurgulandı. Raporda, sulak alanların kaybının başlıca nedenleri arasında tarım alanlarının genişletilmesi, kirlilik, istilacı türler ve iklim değişikliğinin kuraklık ile deniz seviyesinin yükselmesi gibi etkilerinin yer aldığı belirtildi. SULAK ALANLARIN İŞLEVİ Dünya kara yüzeyinin yalnızca yüzde 6 ila 7'sini kaplayan sulak alanlar, tüm bitki ve hayvan türlerinin yaklaşık...

title: Jane Austen's books top five booked - Mansfield Park misses out
creator: Molly Toolan
content: Jane Austen's works are hugely celebrated throughout the globe and show no signs of slowing down. The last of her books, Persuasion and Northhanger Abbey were published in 1817. Since then, many of her books have been adapted for TV and film adaptations as well as reworked versions of her novels. Here are her top five books as voted for by fans on Goodreads. One of Austen's last works to be published, Northanger Abbey follows Catherine Morland as she navigates society in Bath and visits the Tilney family's estate - Northanger Abbey. Catherine's imagination and her love for Gothic literature, lead her to misinterpret events in respect to the Tilney family. She learns the hard way that she must distinguish between fiction and reality. Emma follows a wealthy and clever young woman living in the English countryside. She enjoys spending her time matchmaking and meddling in the lives of her friends and neighbours but this can often end in trouble and leads on to a journey of self-discovery and multiple marriages. Sense and Sensibility follows contrasting romantic journeys between sisters Elinor and Marianne Dashwood after their father's death leaves them in a scarce financial postion. Elinor, representing "sense," navigates her feelings for Edward Ferrars with weariness, while Marianne, embodying "sensibility," experiences passionate but painful relationships with John Willoughby and later, Colonel Brandon. Persuasion is Austen's final completed novel. It tells the story of Anne...

title: CNC Class Action Alert: Robbins LLP Reminds Centene Corporation Stockholders of the Lead Plaintiff Deadline in the Class Action Against CNC
content: SAN DIEGO, July 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Robbins LLP reminds stockholders that a class action was filed on behalf of investors who purchased or otherwise acquired Centene Corporation (NYSE: CNC) securities between December 12, 2024 and June 30, 2025. Centene describes itself as a leading healthcare enterprise that is committed to helping people live healthier lives. For more information, submit a form , email attorney Aaron Dumas, Jr., or give us a call at (800) 350-6003. The Allegations: Robbins LLP is Investigating Allegations that Centene Corporation (CNC) Misled Investors Regarding its Business Prospects According to the complaint, defendants created the false impression that they possessed reliable information pertaining to the Company’s projected revenue outlook and anticipated growth while also touting enrollment rates and low morbidity. In truth, Centene’s optimistic reports and promises regarding the Company’s inflated guidance fell short of reality when a preliminary analysis of over two-thirds of Centene’s marketplace share showed lower-than-anticipated enrollment and increased aggregate market morbidity. Plaintiff alleges that on July 1, 2025, Centene issued a press release withdrawing 2025 guidance. Specifically, following an analysis of the 2025 Health Insurance Marketplace, Centene’s overall market growth across 22 states, or 72% of the Company’s marketplace membership, was lower than expected. title: Tekirdağ alev alev! Orman yangın büyüdü, yerleşim yerlerine sıçradı
content: İstiklal Mahallesi Kaytan mevkisinde başlayan anız yangını, rüzgarın etkisiyle kısa sürede büyüyerek ormanlık alana sıçradı.Vatandaşların ihbarı üzerine bölgeye Orman İşletme, itfaiye ve jandarma ekipleri yönlendirildi.Yangına 2 uçak ve 4 helikopterin yanı sıra arazözler ve iş makineleriyle müdahale ediliyor.BAZI EVLERE SIÇRADI, YERLEŞİM YERLERİ BOŞALTILDIAlevler, Şenköy Mahallesi'nde bazı evlere sıçrarken, bu mahalledeki yerleşim yerleri boşaltıldı. Vatandaşlar, büyükbaş ve küçükbaş hayvanlarını yerleşim yerlerinden uzaklaştırmaya çalışıyor.Bölgeye gelen, CHP Tekirdağ Milletvekili İlhami Özcan Aygun, Şarköy Kaymakamı Ahmet Naci Helvacı, Büyükşehir Belediyesi Genel Sekreteri Arzu Çebi Topçu, Şarköy Belediye Başkanı Alpay Var ve İl Jandarma Komutanı Albay Ahmet Çetin çalışmaları takip etti.Yangının sıçradığı Kocaali Mahallesi'nde bir ev ve ahır yandı. Alandaki yerleşim yerleri boşaltıldı.Kocaali Mahallesi'nde hayvan gübresinin içinde kalan bir inek, zabıta ekipleri ve mahalle sakinleri tarafından kurtarıldı.Yangına, 2 uçak ve 4 helikopterin yanı sıra 30 arazöz, 30 itfaiye aracı, iş makineleri ve çok sayıda jandarma personeliyle müdahale ediliyor.Tekirdağ Valiliğinden sosyal medya hesabından yangına karşı vatandaşlara tedbirli olmaları yönünde açıklama yapıldı.TEKİRDAĞ VALİLİĞİ: VATANDAŞLARIMIZIN YANGIN BÖLGESİNE YAKLAŞMAMALARI RİCA OLUNURGörevlilerin uyarılarının dikkate alınması istenen...

title: Caitlin Clark to face Liberty in Brooklyn, then compete against Sabrina Ionescu in 3-point contest
creator: NY Daily News
content: Caitlin Clark ’s previous visit to Barclays Center marked a rare low point in her young career. Then a rookie, Clark managed only three points on 1-of-10 shooting in her Indiana Fever’s blowout loss to the Liberty on June 2, 2024 . “As a team, we understand who the head of the monster is on that team,” Liberty guard Sabrina Ionescu said at the time, “and we are trying to just make everything tough and difficult.” That was the 11th game of Clark’s WNBA career, and more than a year later, it remains her lowest-scoring performance and her worst shooting effort. Clark returns to Barclays Center for the first time since then on Wednesday night to face the Liberty under different circumstances. The sharp-shooting phenom is a far more established player now, having lived up to the sky-high hype last season by winning Rookie of the Year and leading the Fever to their first playoff berth since 2016. Clark’s second season has featured incredible highs, including a 32-point, nine-assist, eight-rebound eruption against the Liberty in Indianapolis on June 14 to deal the defending champions their first loss. But this year has also come with a new set of challenges for Clark. She missed five games with a left quad injury toward the beginning of the season, then another five due to a left groin injury. After returning from the latter last week, Clark was averaging 12.0 points on 34.1% shooting in the three games before Tuesday night’s meeting with the Sun in Connecticut. “I’m not worried...

title: Dlatego właśnie Świątek została mistrzynią Wimbledonu. Szczęka opada
creator: Paweł Matys
content: O Idze Świątek (3. WTA ) znów w ostatnich dniach było bardzo głośno na całym świecie. To efekt tego, że była liderka światowego rankingu sięgnęła po szósty w karierze tytuł wielkoszlemowy. 24-letnia zawodniczka triumfowała na Wimbledonie, w finale nie dając żadnych szans Amerykance Amandzie Anisimowej (USA, 7. WTA), wygrywając 6:0, 6:0. Niesamowite statystyki Igi Świątek na Wimbledonie Iga Świątek miała niesamowite statystyki meczowe na Wimbledonie. Polka królowała w kilku statystycznych zestawieniach. Można je zobaczyć w serwisie X. Okazuje się, że Świątek m.in. wykorzystała najwięcej break pointów ze wszystkich zawodniczek w całym turnieju - aż 33 (najwięcej - 6 w finale, a w aż czterech meczach po 5.). Druga w tym zestawieniu Amerykanka Amanda Anisimowa zdobyła 28 breaków, a liderka światowego rankingu WTA - Białorusinka Aryna Sabalenka aż dziesięć mniej od Świątek. Oprócz tego Polka wygrała aż 90,6 proc. swoich gemów serwisowych (wraz z Włoszką Cocciaretto najlepszy wynik na Wimbledonie) i zdobyła aż 53,2 proc. gemów przy serwisach rywalek (najwięcej ze wszystkich tenisistek). To jednak nie koniec znakomitych liczb Polki. Świątek miała też najlepszy proc. wygranych punktów po 1 serwisie (77,6 proc.) i w ogóle punktów zdobytych po serwisach (68,6 proc.). Zwyciężyła też w zestawieniu z największym procentem zdobytych punktów (59,3 proc.) w Londynie. Zobacz także: Anglik wylał wiadro pomyj na Igę Świątek. "Nie...

title: Amazon Names MyFBAPrep a Recommended FBA Prep Service Provider
content: Selection Signals Trust in MyFBAPrep's Scale, Operational Excellence, and Compliance Rigor CORAL SPRINGS, Fla. , July 15, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- MyFBAPrep , the leading global eCommerce warehouse network, has been selected by Amazon as a Recommended Prep Service Provider for Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA), following Amazon's most extensive national vetting process to date. The rigorous evaluation spanned hundreds of performance, compliance, and scalability data points aimed at identifying logistics partners capable of delivering Amazon-grade prep services to its 1.1 million active marketplace sellers in The United States . The program is designed to spotlight a curated handful of logistics providers that can reliably execute prep to meet more than 1 billion units of projected annual demand across the U.S., in accordance with detailed Amazon FBA standards. The program is not only a signal of operational excellence—it positions selected partners to receive inbound prep demand directly from Amazon's Seller Central platform and partner network. To become a Recommended FBA Prep Service Provider, MyFBAPrep had to prove its excellence in the following categories: Execution of Core Prep Services – Providers were required to offer all seven of Amazon's critical prep activities: item labeling, bagging, bubble wrap, cap sealing, boxing, opaque bagging, and set creation. Each service needed to be executed per Amazon's official documentation, including drop-test requirements, suffocation...

title: Tras el telón de 'Busco al hombre de mi vida, esposo ya tuve': una obra de teatro que habla de cómo las mujeres transitan la tusa y la soledad
content: Después de los 40, entrar al "mercado del usado", como se le dice popularmente a los divorciados, puede ser complejo. Y Ana, la protagonista de la obra Busco al hombre de mi vida, marido ya tuve, es un ejemplo de ello. Mary Grueso y Barbara Muelas: las mujeres que aportarán diversidad a la Academia Colombiana de la Lengua Delirio, Lucrecia Martel y más: lo imperdible del Bogotá Audiovisual Market 2025 El Hay Festival celebrará los 500 años de Santa Marta: conozca los escritores y las actividades programadas Este personaje es encarnado por las actric es Diana Belmonte, Sandra Serrato y Judith Segura y cada una corresponde a una versión distinta de Ana, quien intenta rehacer su vida amorosa, y reconstruirse después de su divorcio, enfocándose en hallar al hombre ideal. Con un humor épico, e sta producción dirigida por Jimmy Vásquez lleva a los espectadores de la risa al llanto de una escena a otra, como resultado de un guion perfectamente adaptado al contexto colombiano y la perspectiva femenina pues, la historia se basa en un libro que tiene el mismo nombre y que fue escrito por Daniela Di Segni. Busco al hombre de mi vida, marido ya tuve Foto: Casa E Borrero Cuando la posibilidad de llevar esta historia a las tablas apareció, a Jimmy le dio pereza meterse en el proyecto solo, porque también implicaba cierto riesgo. "Cuando leí la obra, aunque era muy entretenida para leer, la sentí bastante anacrónica y metida en un contexto muy distinto al que vivimos ahora...

title: Пока не приелись: новые адреса высокой кухни Петербурга
content: За первое полугодие на основных центральных улицах Петербурга, по данным NF Group, открылось 130 заведений и закрылось 110. Для сравнения: в Москве за этот же период — 102 открытия и 116 закрытий. "В Петербурге заметен рост качественных концепций ресторанов и баров, особенно в уже популярных кластерах. Это говорит о постепенном укреплении гастрономической инфраструктуры и продолжении тренда на создание локальных точек притяжения для жителей и туристов", — отмечает руководитель департамента торговой недвижимости NF Group Анна Лапченко. Исторически самая известная ресторанная улица Петербурга — Рубинштейна. В последние годы общепит активно развивался в "квартале писателей" — на улицах Некрасова, Маяковского, Жуковского, Белинского. По данным NF Group, на всех основных улицах Петербурга сегодня общепит — это лидирующий профиль. Его доля превышает 30%, но на улице Рубинштейна под него используется 77% площадей. На втором месте — улица Некрасова (50%), на третьем — улица Восстания (49%). По данным геосервиса 2ГИС на середину июля 2025 года, на улице Рубинштейна расположено 84 заведения общественного питания, включая бары, рестораны, рюмочные, кафе и пекарни. На улице Восстания — 78, на Некрасова — 70. На улице Жуковского насчитывается 50 заведений. Гастрономическая карта Северной столицы постоянно увеличивается. "Среди уже сложившихся зон стоит отметить Большую Конюшенную, Большой проспект Петроградской стороны, а также Большую Зеленину — эта улица уверенно...

title: Andrew Cuomo’s independent run: Letters to the Editor — July 16, 2025
creator: Post readers
content: The Issue: Ex-Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s decision to stay in the New York City mayoral race as an independent. It is incomprehensible that former Gov. Andrew Cuomo would even think about running for political office again at any level ( “Cuo: Hell no, I won’t go,” July 15). Does he think people forgot about the decisions he made during COVID that resulted in the horrible deaths of countless elderly people? His involvement in the bail-reform laws have also contributed mightily to the deaths of innocent people and diminished the quality of life in New York City. This is a man with no conscience or self-awareness who is utterly obsessed with power. He just needs to fade into obscurity so we can forget he was ever in the public eye. Robert DiNardo Farmingdale If voters don’t want Zohran Mamdani, they should rally around a more competent, although flawed, Cuomo. Mayor Adams is a proven failure. Otherwise, don’t complain if Mamdani wins. Robert Berk Manhattan Neither Mamdani nor Cuomo are deserving of the mayorship. However, Adams and Curtis Sliwa need to drop out of the race for mayor and support Cuomo if they truly have the best interests for New Yorkers. Edwin Young The Bronx Why don’t Adams and Cuomo swallow their pride and do the right thing for New York City? They should flip a coin or cut cards and whoever loses should support the other candidate. If they truly want to prevent Zohran Mamdani — who is supported by the dumbest of our city — from becoming mayor and completely...

title: Rescue Shocked After Finding Stray Cat in Michigan, Who Is the Missing Pet of a Person in Germany
creator: People
content: NEED TO KNOW A woman and her cat are set to reunite after being apart for five years; the pet parent just needs to cross an ocean first. According to WZZM13 , about six months ago, a family in Montague, Mich., found a feline living as a stray and took it in. Unfortunately, the new addition did not get along with their current pets, so the family brought the black cat to Oceana County Animal Friends in hopes of finding the pet a new home. The animal welfare nonprofit's director, Amy VanderWilk, told WZZM13 that she took the cat to the veterinary office to be spayed and checked for a microchip. The scan revealed that the mysterious feline did have a microchip, one that showed the cat's name was Trixie and that her owner could be contacted — in Germany. According to VanderWilk, when the shelter heard back from the microchip company and confirmed Trixie's registered owner, Olga Heigis, lived in Germany, they were baffled. Never miss a story — sign up for PEOPLE's free daily newsletter to stay up-to-date on the best of what PEOPLE has to offer​​, from celebrity news to compelling human interest stories. After the nonprofit contacted Heigis, the story of how a cat with a German phone number ended up in Michigan began to make sense. Per WZZM13, Heigis used to live in Montague, Mich., but moved to Germany in 2020 for her husband's job. Trixie, who lived in Michigan with Heigis, disappeared a few months before her owner's big move and wasn't found until five years later. Trixie had...

title: MSHSAA to Schools: Vote ‘Yes’ or Risk Breaking State Law on New Participation Rules
content: JEFFERSON CITY, Mo. — The Missouri State High School Activities Association is calling on all member schools to approve a set of by-law changes this August, saying failure to do so will leave schools out of compliance with newly enacted state law and could put student eligibility at risk. In response to Missouri Senate Bill 63 – which becomes law Aug. 28 – MSHSAA will open a Special Ballot from August 11–22 for member schools to vote on the necessary adjustments. The changes are designed to align the association’s eligibility standards with the new legislation, which expands participation rights for full-time home school, Family Paced Education (FPE), and virtual school students. “This is not a matter of preference but of legality,” MSHSAA Executive Director Dr. Jennifer Rukstad wrote in a July 15 letter to member schools. “Member schools are strongly encouraged to accept the by-law changes to ensure uninterrupted, equitable access to interscholastic athletics and activities and protect student eligibility.” MSHSAA said students who qualify under the law will be known as “resident participant students” and may compete with their local public or charter school in athletics, fine arts, and other integrated co-curricular programs – even if they are not formally enrolled in that school. To meet the new requirements, MSHSAA will add a new category to its eligibility framework: Non-Traditional Option 3. Schools must add resident participant students to their master eligibility...

title: Panipat News: वुशू में जीवीएम के छात्रों ने झटके चार स्वर्ण पदक
content: पानीपत (वि)। समालखा की चांद स्पोर्ट्स एकेडमी में आयोजित पांचवीं पैनिक स्लाॅट जूनियर वुशू चैंपियनशिप में जीवीएम इंटरनेशनल स्कूल के छात्रों ने परचम लहराया। उनकी इस उपलब्धि पर विद्यालय के निदेशक राधेश्याम जांगड़ा ने सभी विजयी विद्यार्थियों को बधाई दी है। विद्यालय के कक्षा 12 के छात्र लक्ष्य, कक्षा 11 के छात्र श्लोक, कक्षा छह की छात्रा दीक्षा व प्रियांशी ने स्वर्ण पदक हासिल किया। वहीं कक्षा सात के छात्र नितिन व कक्षा छह के छात्र रोहन व रौनक ने दूसरा स्थान प्राप्त कर रजत पदक हासिल किया। विजेताओं ने इस सफलता का श्रेय अपनी लगन, कोच रीना व मोहित के मार्गदर्शन तथा जीवीएम इंटरनेशनल स्कूल के सहयोग को दिया। इनमें से चार खिलाड़ियों का चयन हिसार में होने वाली स्टेट लेवल चैंपियनशिप के लिए हुआ है। प्रधानाचार्या पम्मी ठकराल व उप प्रधानाचार्या मीनाक्षी बरतवाल ने कहा कि विद्यालय हर प्रकार से अपने प्रतिभाशाली खिलाड़ियों के साथ खड़ा है।

title: Former Boston Celtics forward signs deal overseas
content: Former Celtics forward Oshae Brissett will continue his pro career overseas after signing a deal with Maccabi Tel Aviv, according to the team. It is a two-year deal with the Israeli EuroLeague squad. The 6-foot-7 forward was a member of the 2024 Boston title team but surprisingly turned down a player option to return to Boston for the 2024-25 season in hopes of finding a bigger role elsewhere. The gamble did not pay off for Brissett as he ended up sitting out the first half of the NBA season with no enticing offers arriving. Brissett eventually joined the Nets G-League affiliate in January and went on to sign a 10-day contract with the 76ers in March. He appeared in six games, averaging 8.7 points and 3.7 rebounds per game but did not catch on with another team after his deal expired. The 27-year-old has played for four NBA teams (Raptors, Pacers, Celtics, 76ers) over his six NBA seasons after going undrafted out of Syracuse in 2019. He was in and out of the rotation during his season in Boston, posting 3.7 points and 2.9 rebounds over 11.5 minutes per game but he struggled with his outside shot (27.3 percent) in the stint. By going overseas, Brissett is likely to get the bigger opportunity he was seeking out last year at the NBA level. “It’s great to bring a former NBA champion to Tel Aviv,” Maccabi Tel Aviv general manager Claudio Coldebella said in a team release announcing the signing. “From the beginning he was our first choice. He’s a player who fits our system and his...

title: Second-Year WNBA Player Sends Message to Fans After Being Released
content: Julie Vanloo's heart is still in San Francisco. The Los Angeles Sparks guard began the season with the Golden State Valkyries, appearing in nine games for Golden State where she averaged 4.6 points, 1.9 rebounds and 4.1 assists per game. Vanloo was controversially cut from the Valkyries after her return from winning the FIBA EuroBasket tournament with the Belgian national team. Vanloo reportedly skipped her team's celebration to make it back to the Valkyries only to find out that she had been cut. The Sparks picked Vanloo up a few days later. In four games so far with Los Angeles, Vanloo has averaged 4.5 points, 1.8 assists and 0.5 rebounds. Vanloo's departure has been one in a growing list of players released by the Valkyries in their first season as a franchise. Valkyries fans have seemed especially hurt by losing Vanloo. Fans have been spotted with signs at Valkyries games calling for her return. Vanloo seems to have no love lost for Golden State, despite the controversial nature of her departure, and shared a message on her Instagram acknowledging the fans of her former team. In the Instagram story post, Vanloo shared a screenshot of Valkyries fans in the crowd during a game wearing purple wigs and holding a sign that read, "Vanboooooo, Bring Back Vanloo" Vanloo appreciated the message because she captioned the story, "Valkyries fans in my heart 💜" The Valkyries and Sparks don't face off again until Saturday, August 9, so Vanloo will have to wait some time before suiting...

title: Jeff Bezos nombra a exdirector de Amazon Alexa para manejar un fondo de 10 mil millones de dólares
creator: Renzo Gonzales
content: Jeff Bezos designó a Tom Taylor como nuevo presidente y director ejecutivo de su Fondo para la Tierra (Bezos Earth Fund), cuya inversión es de 10.000 millones de dólares. Taylor, quien anteriormente estuvo al frente de la división de asistentes de voz Alexa y lideró el área de servicios para vendedores externos en Amazon, sucederá a Andrew Steer, quien dejó el cargo de CEO en febrero de este año.El nombramiento fue anunciado a través de una publicación en LinkedIn de Taylor, donde destacó su entusiasmo ante el reto de buscar soluciones a los desafíos ambientales globales con un enfoque de visión a largo plazo, curiosidad técnica y capacidad de ejecución. Taylor se retiró de Amazon en 2022 tras más de dos décadas en la compañía.El propósito del Bezos Earth Fund es combatir los efectos del cambio climático mediante la entrega de subvenciones a científicos, activistas y organizaciones dedicadas a la conservación de la naturaleza. El objetivo es distribuir todo el capital del fondo antes de 2030.Hasta el momento, el fondo ha canalizado 2.300 millones de dólares en donaciones, según los datos publicados en su página oficial. Desde que dejó la dirección de Amazon en 2021, Jeff Bezos ha estado más involucrado en la gestión del fondo y ha destinado acciones de la empresa tanto a esta iniciativa como a otras causas filantrópicas.La llegada de Tom Taylor representa un relevo en la dirección del fondo y se espera que su gestión mantenga el rumbo hacia...

title: Contingency plans unclear for 2026 World Cup wildfire smoke risks
content: While some organizations have published clear air quality thresholds or contingency protocols for wildfire smoke, FIFA's plans remain unclear less than a year out from the 2026 World Cup. A day after Toronto's air quality was among the worst in the world, the organizing committee for the World Cup in Canada declined to reveal guidelines for postponement or air-quality-related contingencies with FIFA. No policies are posted publicly. The World Cup will run from June 11 to July 19, 2026. Canada will stage 13 games -- seven in Vancouver and six in Toronto. The Air Quality Health Index rating for Toronto was over 10, or "very high risk," on Monday morning, dropping to a "high risk" rating of 8 by late afternoon. In the CFL, meanwhile, games can't be played when the AQHI surpasses a threshold of seven, according to an agreement between the league and its players. CFL stadiums are also equipped with air-quality sensors to provide real-time readings. The CFL postponed the Saskatchewan Roughriders-Calgary Stampeders game in Regina from Friday night to Saturday afternoon this past weekend due to air quality issues, as wildfires from northern Saskatchewan pushed the AQHI above 10. title: VÍDEO – Bolsonaro diz que é “apaixonado” por Trump e pelo povo dos EUA
creator: Augusto de Sousa
content: Jair Bolsonaro em entrevista ao Poder 360°. Foto: reproduçãoO ex-presidente Jair Bolsonaro (PL), que se arroga defensor do patriotismo brasileiro, protagonizou mais um episódio de subserviência aos Estados Unidos nesta terça-feira (15), em entrevista ao Poder 360°. Desesperado após o pedido de prisão apresentado pela Procuradoria-Geral da República (PGR), Bolsonaro declarou ser apaixonado pelo presidente dos Estados Unidos, Donald Trump, embora o considere “imprevisível”.“O que passa na cabeça do Trump eu não sei. Ele é imprevisível. Eu gosto dele, sou apaixonado por ele. Sou apaixonado pelo povo americano, pela política americana, pelo país que é os Estados Unidos. Eu nunca neguei isso desde o meu tempo de garoto, o Trump sempre soube disso e me tratava como um irmão”.Na última quarta-feira (9), Trump defendeu Bolsonaro em uma carta destinada ao presidente Lula (PT) impondo uma sanção com tarifas de 50% aos produtos brasileiros. O gesto foi justificado como uma retaliação à suposta perseguição política e judicial ao líder da extrema-direita.“Ele botou naquela carta, no primeiro parágrafo, na primeira linha, o meu nome. Está sendo ‘caça às bruxas’ ou não?”, questionou Bolsonaro se referindo ao termo utilizado por Trump na carta. “Você acha que eu quebrei alguma coisa aqui em Brasília? Não tem cabimento o que estão fazendo”, emendou interagindo com a entrevistadora.🚨AGORA – Bolsonaro diz que Trump é imprevisível e afirma que é apaixonado...

title: Harsh Climate Leaves Park Bereft Of Butterflies
creator: Paruchuri Saalini
content: Hyderabad: Butterflies have become harder to spot this season at the Butterfly Park in Nehru Zoological Park, as changing weather conditions are disrupting their life cycle. Irregular rainfall and harsh sunlight have affected flowering patterns and egg-laying, leading to fewer butterflies being seen across the five acre enclosure. “There should be sunlight, but not extreme. Rain is needed, but not heavy showers. That balance is missing this year,” said a zoo official. Without flowers, there’s no nectar, which means butterflies neither feed nor breed effectively. Currently, about 25 species can be seen, but only if one looks closely. To improve conditions, park staff have increased plantations of nectar-rich and host plants like curry leaves and lemon trees. Butterfly eggs are already visible on some plants. Each butterfly lays 25 to 35 eggs, and about 25 to 30 per cent survive the full cycle. Officials expect a rebound by September, with 50 to 60 species visible if the weather improves. A full recovery is likely by November. Speaking with Deccan Chronicle, Dr Chitra Shanker, principal scientist at ICAR-IIRR, an active member of Butterfly Conservation Society (BCS) said, “For a butterfly garden to be truly successful, two key things are needed: host plants where butterflies lay eggs and the caterpillars grow, and nectar or alkaloid sources that attract and provide sustenance for adult butterflies.” “But these plants also need the right conditions to thrive: proper sunlight,...

title: ‘Emotional for me to come back’: New top executive named for Youth Opportunities Unlimited
creator: CTVNews
content: A new top executive has been named to lead Youth Opportunities Unlimited. It’s a new face but one with long ties to the organization. Steve Cordes has been Executive Director of Youth Opportunities Unlimited (YOU) for more than 35 years. One of his final tasks has been preparing a report to help with the leadership transition. “As I was writing that and reminding myself of those milestones, it becomes really emotional for me. I was telling the management team earlier this week when we talked about vulnerability, when you bring your vulnerability to work. And I said, ‘I’m getting used to crying in public now,’” said Cordes. Having Andrea Topham named as his successor has given Cordes confidence the organization is in good hands. “I am retiring more easily knowing that it’s somebody who understands the culture so welcoming it.” Topham’s fingerprints are already on the YOU operations. She was with the organization as they launched the Cornerstone Project in 2011. It was a bold initiative that established geared youth supportive housing in the Cornerstone building at York and Richmond. “I learned so much, and I’ve taken so much of what I’ve learned from Steve with me, for sure. It’s emotional for me to come back. I’m excited to come back. And really, really honored that I get to build on the legacy that Steve created here.” Youth Opportunities Unlimited has changed dramatically in the time that Steve Cordes has been at the helm, going from a youth employment consultation service...

title: 2027: Nigeria to release rebased GDP data end of July
content: Nigeria’s National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) is expected to release the long-awaited rebased Gross Domestic Product (GDP) data before the end of July, as the agency completes final validation of the updated economic statistics. The rebased GDP figures—anticipated within the next two weeks—will incorporate previously under-represented sectors such as information and communication technology (ICT), e-commerce, digital finance, the blue economy, and Nigeria’s thriving creative industry Additionally, economic activities within the informal sector will be more comprehensively captured. The move marks a significant update in Nigeria’s economic data framework, aimed at aligning national statistics with current structural realities. The new base year for the GDP series is 2019, replacing the 2010 base year used in the last rebasing exercise conducted in 2014. Statistician General of the Federation and Chief Executive Officer of the NBS, Adeyemi Adeniran said “This is a routine statistical activity to ensure our national accounts accurately reflect the structure and growth dynamics of the Nigerian economy.” According to the NBS, the rebased GDP will offer a clearer picture of the nation’s economic landscape and is expected to influence key indicators such as the debt-to-GDP ratio, tax-to-GDP ratio, and broader fiscal planning frameworks. It could also help Nigeria reclaim its position as Africa’s largest economy—a spot it lost to South Africa after years of outdated economic...

title: Senado Federal aprova proposta de Nelsinho Trad contra tarifaço de 50% de Trump
creator: Anna Gomes
content: O requerimento do senador Nelsinho Trad (PSD) foi aprovado pelo Senado Federal nesta terça-feira (15). O parlamentar, que também é presidente da Comissão de Relações Exteriores, encaminhou o documento que institui uma missão do Congresso Nacional aos Estados Unidos. A proposta visa abrir diálogo com parlamentares norte-americanos diante do aumento de tarifas anunciado por Donald Trump contra produtos brasileiros. “Essa é uma resposta institucional do Senado para proteger o agronegócio , os empregos e a economia brasileira. Como presidente da CRE, entendo que o caminho é o entendimento, não o confronto. O Brasil precisa agir com responsabilidade e firmeza”, afirmou o senador Nelsinho Trad. A missão deve ocorrer ainda este mês, com apoio da Confederação Nacional da Indústria (CNI). No último dia 9 de julho, Donald Trump bateu o martelo e decidiu tarifar o Brasil em 50%. Após uma série de embates e troca de farpas nas redes sociais com o presidente do Brasil, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, foi definida a porcentagem sobre os produtos importados do Brasil. A medida entra em vigor a partir do dia 1° de agosto. Donald Trump fez o anúncio na rede social Truth Social, onde menciona perseguição do STF (Supremo Tribunal Federal) ao ex-presidente Jair Bolsonaro (PL). Além disso, o norte-americano diz que as relações comerciais entre o Brasil e os EUA são injustas. Tem alguma denúncia , flagrante , reclamação ou sugestão de pauta para o Jornal Midiamax ? 🗣️...

title: Trump downplays possibility of sending Ukraine long-range weapons as it struggles to repel Russia
creator: Darlene Superville, Aamer Madhani And Stephen Groves The Associated Press
content: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Donald Trump on Tuesday downplayed the possibility of sending Ukraine long-range weapons as Kyiv awaits an injection of U.S. weaponry that it hopes will help it beat back an intensifying Russian air offensive. Trump offered a more cautious tone on what to expect after he threatened Russia a day earlier with steep tariffs if President Vladimir Putin doesn’t act within 50 days to end the three-year conflict . He also on Monday announced plans to bolster Kyiv’s stockpile by selling American weapons to NATO allies who would in turn send arms to Ukraine. Providing Ukraine with more long-range weaponry would give Kyiv the chance to strike further into Russian territory, a move that some in Ukraine and the U.S. have said could help push Putin toward negotiations to end the fighting. Asked if he intended to supply Ukraine with weapons that could reach deeper into Russian territory, Trump replied, “We’re not looking to do that.” He made the remarks to reporters before departing the White House for an energy investment event in Pittsburgh. While Trump’s threats of weapons, sanctions and tariffs mark the most substantive pressure he’s placed on Putin since returning to office nearly six months ago, some lawmakers said they remain concerned that the administration, with the 50-day deadline, is giving Putin time to grab even more Ukrainian territory. Sens. Thom Tillis, a Republican from North Carolina, and Jeanne Shaheen, a Democrat from New Hampshire, said...

title: Candidato Oscar Cedeño: «Con Mi Gente Se Resuelve» en Zamora
creator: Lixett Santil
content: Este martes 15 de julio, el candidato a la alcaldía de Zamora, Oscar Cedeño, realizó un encuentro con estudiantes universitarios del municipio en las inmediaciones de la Universidad Politécnica Territorial del Norte de Monagas «Ludovico Silva», en Punta de Mata.(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});La reunión, organizada por el Comando de Campaña «Con Mi Gente Se Resuelve», contó con la participación del estudiantado, personal administrativo, docente y obrero de la universidad. Durante la actividad, Cedeño destacó la importancia de la formación de los nuevos profesionales de la República.(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});«Hoy me encuentro aquí en compañía de estos jóvenes, futuros profesionales, quienes merecen la mejor formación y las mejores condiciones. Allí está puesto mi compromiso, siempre de la mano con la juventud en el esfuerzo que hacemos cada día, conjuntamente con el presidente Nicolás Maduro y gobernador Ernesto Luna en pro de todos los estudiantes zamoransos», afirmó el candidato.La actividad fue acompañada por Ylluminata Sabatino, coordinadora municipal de Educación, y representantes de la Organización Bolivariana de Estudiantes (OBE) y de las universidades del Magisterio «Simón Rodríguez», Nacional Abierta (UNA) y de las Ciencias para la Salud «Hugo Chávez» y Nacional Experimental de la Seguridad (UNES); así como Misión Sucre.La entrada Candidato Oscar Cedeño: «Con Mi Gente Se Resuelve» en Zamora se...

title: Vania Bludau envía contundente mensaje a Mario Irivarren: “Cuando toma es una persona agresiva"
creator: Karla Caycho
content: Cansada de que la sigan relacionando con Mario Irivarren , Vania Bludau mostró en ‘Amor y Fuego’ una captura de pantalla en la que el ‘guerrero’ admite, a través de un mensaje a un amigo en común, que se equivocó durante su relación. ¿Qué dijo Vania Bludau acerca de su vínculo con Mario Irivarren? Sus declaraciones no tardaron en llegar a los programas de espectáculos, como Amor y Fuego, donde Vania mostró pruebas que respaldarían sus palabras, incluyendo capturas de pantalla de conversaciones en las que Mario habría admitido haber cometido errores durante su convivencia. La modelo enfatizó que está cansada de que la sigan vinculando con su ex y aseguró que no tiene intenciones de retomar contacto con él, dejando en claro que busca dar vuelta la página y centrarse en su bienestar emocional. En un momento Vania dijo: “Me ha molestado muchísimo que me metan como la manzana de la discordia, a mí no me interesa ese hombre. Cuando toma es una persona agresiva y ahora se olvida lo que hace. En un momento me había hartado, lo desbloqueé y le escribí ‘oe ya, di la verdad’, pero él nunca va a hablar”. “Por eso no me gusta tomar, mala cabeza la mía, la cag..., me cag... el alcohol, me cag... ver a Vania ”, se lee.

title: Arran-Elderslie council votes against Tara BESS zoning application
creator: Rob Gowan
content: Article content Arran-Elderslie council has rejected a zoning bylaw amendment application for a 400-megawatt battery storage facility on a property southeast of Tara. At its regular council meeting held in Chesley on Monday, council voted unanimously in favour of a motion to refuse the application by the proponent of the Tara BESS facility, which is proposed for a 40-acre leased parcel of land on the southwest corner of Arran Concession 4 and the Grey Bruce Line. The property, located within a regulated floodplain of the nearby Sauble River, is currently zoned Environmental Protection (EP) and General Agriculture (A1) in the municipality’s zoning bylaw. The amendment proposed to rezone the project area within the EP zone – of which the majority of the facility is proposed within — to an A1 zone with site-specific permission allowing the establishment of a battery energy storage facility. An adjusted floodplain area within the property would be rezoned EP. But following a nearly two-hour public meeting, at which the applicant Neoen requested the decision be delayed, council voted 7-0 in favour of refusing the application, as had been recommended by Bruce County planning staff. During the meeting, council heard from about half-a-dozen residents who raised concerns about the project, particularly around constructing it on a floodplain and the potential environmental impact it could have on the surrounding area and the drinking water of residents in communities downstream. “I...

title: Will Miami steal a top Recruit from Ohio State? Here's what we know so far
content: Derrek Cooper, a five-star running back's enthusiasm for Ohio State seems to be slipping. Miami and Georgia have caught up to the Buckeyes in Cooper's mind. With that said, where does Miami stand in this race for the coveted rusher? Let's take a closer look. The Buckeyes already have an uphill battle trying to remain atop the college football mountain. Roster turnover always makes repeating as national champions extremely hard and Ohio State had 31 seniors on last season's roster. Recruiting is an essential part of replenishing their depth chart. Minimizing the loss of so many seniors is one reason why Derrek Cooper is such a coveted target for Ohio State. Quinshon Judkins' departure only exacerbates the situation. The star-studded recruit recently revealed that Miami and Georgia may be sneaking ahead of the Buckeyes on his list. “The ones who’ve been contacting me mostly are Miami and Georgia,” Cooper told On3 this week. “They’ve just done a great job texting me, keeping in contact. All the other schools have done a great job, too. But ever since the beginning, it’s been those two schools.” Cooper, who played high school football at Chaminade-Madonna is in ESPN's top 10 for the class of 2026. He is the last member of that group who remains undecided, so he could still change his mind before July 20. His recent comments seem to suggest his final decision will be between Miami and Georgia with Ohio State out of the mix. The Hurricanes currently have the 13th-ranked recruiting...

title: Ambedkar Nagar News: अस्पताल की आड़ में चल रहा था फर्जी पैरामेडिकल कॉलेज
content: अंबेडकरनगर। अकबरपुर के सदरपुर-अकबरपुर रोड पर अस्पताल की आड़ में फर्जी पैरामेडिकल कॉलेज संचालित करने का खुलासा हुआ है। सीएमओ स्तर से हुई जांच में सामने आया कि यह पैरामेडिकल कॉलेज बिना किसी मान्यता के आरके हॉस्पिटल एंड मेडिकल सेंटर की आड़ में चलाया जा रहा था। यहां बिना वैध मान्यता के ही नर्सिंग और फार्मेसी कोर्स चला कर मोटी फीस लेकर उन्हें फर्जी मार्कशीट थमाई जा रही थी। हैरानी की बात यह है कि जिस निजी अस्पताल की आड़ में इस फर्जी कॉलेज को चलाया जा रहा था, उसके लाइसेंस का भी नवीनीकरण नहीं था। जांच में फर्जी मार्कशीट देने के आरोप की पुष्टि के बाद सीएमओ कार्यालय की तरफ से पुलिस में पैरामेडिकल कॉलेज संचालकों के खिलाफ केस दर्ज कराया गया है। पुलिस मामले की जांच कर रही है। ग्राम गौरा सोनगांव की मीना ने सीएमओ डॉ. संजय कुमार शैवाल से की गई शिकायत में बताया था कि उन्होंने वर्ष 2021 में आरके पैरामेडिकल कॉलेज में प्रवेश लिया था। उनकी परीक्षा सहारनपुर ले जाकर कराई गई थी। इसी तरह फरीदपुर कला के श्रीश चंद्र वर्मा ने बताया कि उन्हें जो मार्कशीट दी गई, उस पर स्टेट बोर्ड ऑफ फार्मेसी, भुवनेश्वर, ओडिशा अंकित था, लेकिन लखनऊ पुलिस ने प्रमाण पत्र को फर्जी बताकर सत्यापन कराने के लिए कहा था। पुंधर मौहरिया के अनूप कुमार पटेल ने भी श्रीश चंद्र जैसे ही फर्जी मार्कशीट देने का आरोप लगाया था। मुख्य चिकित्सा अधिकारी कार्यालय की ओर जब उत्तर प्रदेश नर्सिंग फैकल्टी लखनऊ से इस कॉलेज की वैधता के संबंध में जानकारी मांगी गई तो बताया गया कि उक्त नाम के किसी भी कॉलेज की कोई मान्यता फैकल्टी से नहीं मिली है। सील के बाद किया नवीनीकरण का आवेदन 28 जून को सीएमओ के निर्देश पर टीम कॉलेज की जांच करने पहुंची तो पता चला कि परिसर...

title: BREAKING: Oakdale police chief arrested during law enforcement conference
creator: Doris Maricle
content: Published 4:18 pm Tuesday, July 15, 2025 By Doris Maricle Federal agents reportedly arrested three central Louisiana police chiefs on Tuesday. At least two were reportedly arrested while they were attending a statewide law enforcement conference in Baton Rouge. Oakdale Police Chief Chad Doyle and Forest Hill Police Chief Glynn Dixon were reportedly arrested at the conference and Ville Platte Police Chief A. Perry Thomas has also reportedly been arrested as part of an ongoing investigation into federal reimbursements. Officials from the U.S. Attorney’s Office, the Federal Bureau of Investigation, Homeland Security Investigations, and the Internal Revenue Service are scheduled to hold a news conference at 10 a.m. Wednesday at the U.S. Attorney’s office in Lafayette. An indictment is expected to be unsealed and arrests announced at that time, according to a news release from the U.S. Attorney’s Office Western District of Louisiana. Lester Duhé, spokesperson for the Attorney General’s office, told the American Press on Tuesday that agents from the Louisiana Bureau of Investigation were “assisting federal agents with court-authorized activities.” He also noted that federal agencies are leading the investigation but could not elaborate on the details of the operation. State Police Troop D spokesman Matt Gaspard also confirmed that state police had been asked to provide marked units as part of an investigation including the FBI, Homeland Security and other agencies. Most of the...

title: إعلام أوكراني: سماع دوي انفجارات في كييف وكريفوي روغ وخاركوف
content: وقالت قناة "سترانا" الأوكرانية عبر "تلغرام": "دوت انفجارات في كييف، وكريفوي روغ، وخاركوف، وسط إنذار بغارة جوية". وأفادت قناة "بابليك" الأوكرانية بوقوع انفجارات في مدينتي كريفوي روغ وخيرسون، الخاضعتين لسيطرة القوات الأوكرانية، كما أفاد عمدة خاركوف، إيغور تيريخوف، بوقوع انفجار في المدينة. وبحسب وزارة التحول الرقمي الأوكرانية، تم إعلان حالة التأهب لشن غارات جوية في 10 مناطق في أوكرانيا، بما في ذلك كييف. وردا على هجمات القوات المسلحة الأوكرانية على المنشآت المدنية، تقوم القوات الروسية بشكل منتظم باستهداف مواقع تمركز الأفراد والمعدات والمرتزقة، بالإضافة إلى البنية التحتية الأوكرانية بما في ذلك منشآت الطاقة والصناعة الدفاعية ومراكز القيادة العسكرية والاتصالات. من جانبه، أكد المتحدث باسم الكرملين دميتري بيسكوف مرارا أن الجيش لا يستهدف المنازل السكنية أو المؤسسات الاجتماعية. المصدر: "نوفوستي"

title: FIFA anunció los detalles para la compra de entradas del Mundial
creator: Jesus Rodriguez
content: La alta demanda que hay por adquirir un boleto les habría hecho lanzar la venta en varias fases, esto con el propósito de no vender todas las entradas al mismo tiempoFIFA anunció los detalles para la compra de entradas del MundialFIFA anunció los detalles para la compra de entradas del Mundial-. La FIFA reveló los detalles del proceso de venta y compra de entradas para la Copa del Mundo de 2026 a disputarse en Canadá-Estados Unidos-México. Revelando, incluso, la fecha de apertura de las solicitudes para la adquisición.El organismo rector del fútbol mundial comunicó que será el miércoles 10 de septiembre cuando se dará inicio a las solicitudes para que los fanáticos puedan comprar los tickets para el Mundial del año próximo.De acuerdo con la propia federación, la alta demanda que hay por adquirir un boleto les habría hecho lanzar la venta en varias fases, esto con el propósito de no vender todas las entradas al mismo tiempo.Te puede interesar: Estadio Universitario de Caracas será escenario de práctica en Serie del Caribe 2026Ante esto, el ente invitó a todas aquellas personas que deseen una entrada a su apartado de tickets en su portal web. Asimismo, indicó que, para poder solicitar una, tendrán que estar registrados y poseer una FIFA ID.Además, la FIFA señaló que las fases iniciarán el ya mencionado 10 y se cerrarán el día del último partido del Mundial 2026, es decir, el 19 de julio. Adicionalmente, se mencionó que las fases podrían cambiar...

title: Panipat News: रीडर को 25 हजार रुपये की रिश्वत लेते कुर्सी पर किया गिरफ्तार, तहसीलदार कुर्सी छोड़कर भागे
content: - तकसीम का केस उनके हक में करने के बदले मांगी थी 50 हजार रुपये की रिश्वत- आधे रुपये पहले और आधे काम पूरा होने के बाद देना हुआ था तयसंवाद न्यूज एजेंसी इसराना (पानीपत)। राज्य सतर्कता एवं भ्रष्टाचार निरोधक ब्यूरो करनाल की टीम ने मंगलवार को इसराना तहसीलदार के रीडर इंद्रजीत सिंह को 25 हजार रुपये की रिश्वत लेते उनकी सीट पर ही पकड़ लिया। रीडर की तलाशी ली तो उनकी जेब से 20 हजार रुपये और मिले हैं। वे इन रुपयों का भी हिसाब नहीं दे पाए। रीडर के पकड़े जाने के बाद तहसीलदार नरेंद्र दलाल कार्यालय छोड़कर भाग गए। आरोपी रीडर ने मांडी गांव के किसान नवीन से जमीन तकसीम के केस का फैसला उनके हक में कराने की एवज में 50 हजार रुपये की रिश्वत की मांग की थी। इसमें आधे पहले और आधे बाद में देने की बात कही थी। ब्यूरो ने रीडर के खिलाफ करनाल के सेक्टर-32 थाने में मुकदमा दर्ज कर लिया है। मांडी गांव के किसान नवीन ने राज्य सतर्कता एवं भ्रष्टाचार निरोधक ब्यूरो करनाल को शिकायत देकर बताया था कि उनकी मां और भाई के नाम गांव में नौ बीघा जमीन है। उनके चाचा ने उनके खिलाफ इसराना तहसील में तकसीम का केस दायर कर रखा है। इस केस का फैसला उनके हक में करने की एवज में तहसीलदार के रीडर इंंद्रजीत ने 50 हजार रुपये की मांग की है। उन्होंने 25 हजार पहले और 25 हजार बाद में देने को कहा है। करनाल की टीम शिकायत के आधार पर इंस्पेक्टर वीरेंद्र की अगुवाई में ड्यूटी मजिस्ट्रेट सिंचाई विभाग के एक्सईएन सुरेश सैनी के साथ इसराना तहसील पहुंची। टीम ने 25 हजार रुपये पर पाउडर लगाकर शिकायतकर्ता को दे दिए। उन्होंने उक्त रुपये रीडर इंद्रजीत को देते ही टीम को इशारा किया। टीम ने रीडर इंद्रजीत को पकड़ लिया और उनकी तलाशी ली। उनसे रिश्वत के 25 हजार रुपये...

title: Líderes del movimiento MAGA critican a Trump por envío de armas a Ucrania
creator: Últimas Noticias
content: «Cuando el perro muerde al amo», con esa expresión popular podría recrearse la dura crítica que han hecho partidarios del presidente estadounidense, Donald Trump, a su giro en la política bélica de su gobierno al decidir seguir enviando armas a Ucrania.Voces influyentes del movimiento ‘Make America Great Again’ (MAGA), liderados por la congresista Marjorie Taylor Greene, cuestionaron este martes el acuerdo entre el presidente Donald Trump y la OTAN con el que Estados Unidos enviará armas a Ucrania para defenderse de Rusia.Greene, representante federal de Georgia y una de las principales figuras de la derecha en el Congreso, expresó este martes en múltiples publicaciones en redes sociales que «MAGA no votó por más armas para Ucrania».«MAGA entregó la mayoría a los republicanos y votó para que no haya mayor involucramiento de Estados Unidos en guerras extranjeras. ¡Pero los neoconservadores y republicanos del ‘establishment’ se han apropiado de MAGA!», denunció la legisladora en X.Defensores de la filosofía ‘America First’ (Estados Unidos primero) cuestionaron el anuncio del lunes de Trump sobre el envío de armamento a Ucrania, incluyendo sofisticados sistemas antimisiles Patriot solicitados por el mandatario ucraniano, Volodímir Zelenski, cuyo coste asumirá los aliados europeos, no Estados Unidos.El presidente estadounidense también indicó que el acuerdo con la OTAN «incluye misiles y municiones», lo que sugiere que podría tratarse de armamento ofensivo,...

title: Costa Rica: cotización de cierre del euro hoy 15 de julio de EUR a CRC
creator: Infobae Noticias
content: En la última jornada el euro se negoció al cierre a 585,10 colones costarricenses en promedio, de modo que implicó un cambio del 1,63% comparado con los 575,70 colones de la sesión previa.Teniendo en cuenta los últimos siete días, el euro anota un ascenso 1,18% y en términos interanuales mantiene aún un incremento del 4,48%.Respecto de días pasados, invirtió la cotización de la jornada previa, cuando obtuvo un descenso del 0,23%, mostrando que es incapaz de asentar una clara tendencia en las últimas fechas. La volatilidad referente a la última semana es superior a los datos conseguidos para el último año (10,16%), así que está presentando un comportamiento más inestable.Previsiones para Costa Ricaen 2025Durante el 2024 el crecimiento de la economía subió en 0.1 por ciento con respecto a la estimación presentada a mediados de año y para el nuevo periodo de 2025 se ajustó las proyecciones de crecimiento económico a la baja. El Banco Central de Costa Rica explicó en un comunicado que la demanda interna será vital para el crecimiento económico del país.El organismo estima que el crecimiento económico del país será mayor al del promedio de sus principales socios comerciales. “Las actividades financieras, agrícolas y la construcción presentaron una mayor expansión respecto al 2024”, detalló el banco en un comunicado de prensa.BCRC destacó que el ingreso de la economía mantendrá su crecimiento en este periodo gracias a la estabilidad proyectada...

title: Backpacks being filled as part of Stuff the Bus program; ‘We want to get them to the kids who need them the most’
creator: Steve Sadin
content: By the time a group of nine volunteers from the Great Lakes Credit Union finished filling backpacks with school supplies as part of the United Way of Lake County’s Stuff the Bus program, they had provided enough for seven classrooms — 196 altogether. “It makes me really happy,” Jessie Flores, one of the volunteers, said. “The kids need these essential tools to be successful in school. Every student needs these. They are our present, and they are our future.” Flores and her colleagues put notebooks, pencils, folders crayons, scissors, earbuds, stylus pens and more into the backpacks on Tuesday at the United Way office in Gurnee as part of an effort to put more than 3,000 backpacks in the hands of Lake County students in time for the upcoming school year. Volunteers from Great Lakes Credit Union put backpacks filled with school supplies in a car as part of United Way of Lake County’s Stuff the Bus program. (Steve Sadin/For the Lake County News-Sun) Bobbi Selvik, United Way’s manager of community engagement, said items like earbuds and stylus pens were added more recently because of the increase in the use of technology in education. “Most of the kids have tablets or another electronic device provided by the school,” Selvik said. “They use the stylus-like pens. It makes it easier for them. So do the earbuds. We want every child to start school with the same resources as any other child.” Jennifer Strom, United Way’s director of marketing and communications, said last year the...

title: Fluminense mira alto e sonha com plano Premier League para repor John Arias
creator: Gávea News
content: A iminente transferência de Jhon Arias para o futebol europeu impulsionou o Fluminense a iniciar uma articulação estratégica para repatriar Richarlison, atualmente vinculado ao Tottenham. A diretoria tricolor, liderada por Mário Bittencourt, considera o atacante de Xerém como a principal alternativa para suprir a provável ausência do colombiano, em negociações com o Wolverhampton. A proposta inicial dos ingleses foi recusada, mas o desejo do jogador em atuar no Velho Continente pressiona pela concretização do acordo. A ideia da alta cúpula das Laranjeiras é apresentar ao camisa 9 da Seleção Brasileira um plano que combine o vínculo emocional com o clube e a possibilidade de protagonismo. Conforme o presidente, houve contato recente com o atleta para detalhamento do projeto, que deve ser intensificado ao longo da semana. Apesar da identificação com o Tricolor das Laranjeiras, a negociação é considerada complexa, principalmente diante da concorrência e dos altos valores exigidos pelo clube inglês. Palmeiras avança com proposta agressiva O Palmeiras também está envolvido na disputa pelo atacante e, diferente do Fluminense, já iniciou movimentações concretas para tentar viabilizar a contratação. A presidente Leila Pereira assumiu pessoalmente as tratativas e mantém contato direto com o jogador há aproximadamente duas semanas. Segundo o jornalista Fabrício Lopes, "ela está pessoalmente conversando e convencendo o atleta a ir para o Palmeiras"....

title: As Maritime temperatures rise, so does demand for air conditioning
creator: CTVNews
content: Despite heat warnings and heat waves, many Maritimers have been taking full advantage of the scorching temperatures, but only under the promise they’ll have ice-cold air conditioning available afterwards. “I think we love golfing in the heat more than the wind, the rain, and the cold. But if we don’t have a cold beer and some air conditioning after a round of golf, we’re not too happy,” says Richard Gormley. While there was a time when AC wasn’t as common or attainable, these days the cooling system has proven to be a hot commodity. Download the CTV News App for breaking news alerts and video on all the top stories Brodie Sampson, president of Nova Heat Pumps, Plumbing and Electrical, says they’ve seen a noticeable demand for heat pumps. “There has been a huge uptick. As soon as the weather started to get hot, we saw about a 30 to 40 per cent increase in sales. Year over year, we’re up about 14 per cent in sales,” he says. Sampson says they’ve been getting emergency calls to install new pumps and replace old ones. “Heat is obviously a necessity, something that we can’t live without. But we’re soon approaching the bar of AC as something that we can’t live without,” says Sampson. “People die due to heat waves, so air conditioning is really an essential item for comfort. But also necessary, in hospitals, in other businesses and in commercial settings.” Records show summer months have been getting warmer, which should keep the demand for AC steady. “Additionally, our chances of...

title: Put Your Portfolio Into Action Through Momentum Investing
content: There are several factors in the market which play important roles. Each factor has its impact on the market movement and at times several factors come to play together which decide the market directions. Some of the notable factors which directly have its impressions on the market include Quality, Value, Growth, Size, Low Volatility and Momentum. What is Momentum Investing? Developing a trend and sustenance of it before it dies out is one of the important factors when it comes to market movements. The tendency of market trends or stock price trends to persist is widely referred to as momentum factor in the market. And the investment strategy to capture and capitalise these trends is known as momentum investing. One may have observed that at times cricket players are in full form. Irrespective of the grounds, climate or opposition, a player who is in form, substantially adds value to the overall performance of the team. The same works in investing as well. Momentum investing simply means picking stocks that are in form and dropping those that go out of form. Momentum investment strategy aims to capitalize on the continuance of existing trends - price or earning trends - in the market. Principally, it is based on the thought process that recent winners in the stock markets will continue to remain winners. Thus, this strategy involves owning securities (stocks) that show positive momentum and exit those which exhibit negative trends. Benefits of Momentum Investing? Bet Against...

title: Police Vari Heccharika Set For July 18 Release – Trailer Teases Gripping Cop Drama
content: The gripping trailer of the upcoming Telugu action drama “Police Vari Heccharika” has officially been released, offering a powerful glimpse into the high-stakes world of law enforcement, corruption, and justice. The much-anticipated film is all set to hit theatres worldwide on July 18, 2025. Directed by Babji and produced by Belli Janardhan, the movie features a stellar ensemble cast including Sunny Akhil, Shubhalekha Sudhakar, Ajay Ghosh, Jaya Vahini, Himaja, Sayaji Shinde, Ravi Kale, Kashi Vishwanath, Sanjay Nair, Shankarabharanam Tulasi, Meghana Khushi, and Babji himself. Notably, the film also marks the on-screen debut of producer Belli Janardhan, stepping into the limelight after a distinguished military and social service career. A Producer with a Purpose: Belli Janardhan’s Journey What sets “Police Vari Heccharika” apart is the inspiring journey of its producer and debut actor, Belli Janardhan. A retired Indian Army soldier from Telangana’s Nalgonda district, Janardhan served the nation with honor and discipline, earning admiration for his dedication and courage. After retiring from the armed forces, he transitioned into social activism, devoting himself to causes such as youth empowerment, education, and rural development in Telangana. His relentless efforts toward societal welfare earned him national recognition, including the prestigious Bharat Seva Vibhushan National Award – 2025. Blending his real-life experiences with a passion for cinema, Janardhan now enters...

title: 15 Temmuz'un yıldönümünde tüm camilerden sela sesleri yükseldi
creator: Haberler
content: 15 Temmuz 'un yıldönümünde saat 00:13'te tüm camilerden sela sesleri yükseldi. Diyanet daha önce eş zamanlı sela okunacağını duyurmuştu. Diyanet İşleri Başkanlığı , 15 Temmuz Demokrasi ve Milli Birlik Günü dolayısıyla ülke genelinde kapsamlı anma ve dua programları düzenledi. Programlar kapsamında Diyanet, 81 ildeki tüm camilerde 15 Temmuz'u 16 Temmuz'a bağlayan gece saat 00:13'de sela okunacağını da duyurdu. Diyanet İşleri Başkanlığı 'nın 15 Temmuz Demokrasi ve Milli Birlik Günü dolayısıyla ülke genelinde sela okunacağını açıklamasının ardından 15 Temmuz'u 16 Temmuz'a bağlayan gece saat 00:13'de tüm camilerden sela sesleri yükseldi. Öte yandan, cami minarelerinin ışıkları sabaha kadar açık kalacak. Ayrıca Diyanet'in açıkladığı etkinliği programı kapsamında çarşamba sabahı ise tüm camilerde "sabah namazı" buluşmaları düzenlenecek.

title: Yalova'da Kırsal Alan Yangını Kontrol Altına Alındı
content: Yalova 'nın Çiftlikköy ilçesine bağlı Kılıç köyünde kırsal alanda meydana gelen arazi yangını itfaiye ekipleri tarafından söndürüldü. Alınan bilgiye göre, Kılıç köyü kırsalında arazide çıkan yangın rüzgarın etkisiyle kısa sürede yayıldı. Yangının bir eve yaklaşması üzerine Taşköprü İtfaiyesi, Çiftlikköy, Altınova ve Orman itfaiye ekipleri tarafından alevlere hızlı ve koordineli şekilde müdahale edildi. İhbar üzerine bölgeye AFAD tarafından 1 arama kurtarma aracı, 3 arama kurtarma personeli ve 1 dron gönderdi. Müdahale çalışmalarına köy halkı da traktörleri ve su tankerleriyle destek verdi. Ekiplerin ve vatandaşların yoğun gayretleri sonucunda yangın, eve ulaşmadan kontrol altına alındı. Soğutma çalışmalarının tamamlanmasının ardından ekipler bölgeden ayrıldı. - YALOVA

title: Viktor Gyokeres to Arsenal transfer lowdown: 'Tense' talks, Arteta aim and £8.7m concern
creator: staronline@reachplc.com (Neil Docking, Kieran Horn)
content: Arsenal and Sporting CP are still ironing out the payment details for Viktor Gyokeres , despite having reached a preliminary agreement over a week ago. The two clubs are said to have settled on an upfront payment of £55million (€63.5m) for the Swedish goal machine , but there's a snag over add-ons, with the Portuguese champions insisting they should be easily attainable. However, personal terms aren't causing any headaches, with Arsenal having a five-year deal ready for Gyokeres to ink. Sporting and Arsenal bigwigs have been holed up in London for several days hammering out the details, but it doesn't seem like significant headway is being made. While there's optimism that a full agreement will eventually be struck, Arteta will be keen to get the 27-year-old ace onboard by a specific date. With the situation becoming increasingly tense, here's the latest updates on Gyokeres. The sticking point lies with the £8.7million (€10m) add-ons, reports Football London . Sellers typically want these extra bonuses to be as achievable as possible, while buyers would likely prefer them to be tied to team achievements, as this would mean success and prize money. Given Sporting president Frederico Varandas' insistence that €60+€10 million wouldn't suffice for them to part ways with their player, it's hardly surprising they're pushing for virtually guaranteed add-ons. While Sporting's demands are clear, Arsenal aren't currently meeting them, according to an update from Fabrizio Romano on the...

title: La bacteria causante de la tuberculosis “se hace la muerta” para sobrevivir ante las vacunas, según la ciencia
creator: Carolina García
content: CIUDAD DE MÉXICO.- Aunque muchos la consideran una enfermedad del pasado, la tuberculosis sigue cobrando más de un millón de vidas cada año. En algunos países, la imagen de sanatorios antiguos y pacientes aislados ha contribuido a la idea de que se trata de un problema superado. Sin embargo, el bacilo que causa esta enfermedad, Mycobacterium tuberculosis, continúa circulando de forma activa en el mundo entero.Una amenaza que persisteUn nuevo estudio científico revela que esta bacteria ha desarrollado una sorprendente capacidad para evitar ser eliminada, incluso en organismos ya vacunados. La investigación, publicada en la revista npj Vaccines, muestra que el bacilo puede “hacerse el muerto”, es decir, entrar en un estado de inactividad para esquivar al sistema inmunológico. El hallazgo fue realizado mediante análisis genéticos en ratones por investigadores de universidades como Tufts, Utah y Harvard.La vacuna más usada, conocida como BCG, se aplica a más de 100 millones de bebés cada año y protege eficazmente en la infancia contra las formas graves de la enfermedad. Sin embargo, su efectividad en adultos, especialmente frente a la tuberculosis pulmonar, es mucho más baja. Esto se debe en parte a que, hasta ahora, no se comprendía del todo cómo la bacteria lograba sobrevivir en un cuerpo vacunado.Una táctica de evasión genéticaPara entender esta resistencia, los científicos emplearon una técnica de secuenciación genética llamada TnSeq, que permite...

title: Amazon To Invest Another $100M In AWS Generative AI Innovation Center
creator: Dade Hayes
content: At an event Tuesday aimed at showcasing the capabilities of its web services division, Amazon announced it would invest an additional $100 million in the AWS Generative AI Innovation Center. In a blog post, Amazon execs Francessca Vasquez and Taimur Rashid wrote that the investment will further the goals of the center, which was established two years ago. Amazon, like fellow tech giants Meta, Google, Microsoft, Nvidia and OpenAI, has pledged to spend hundreds of billions on AI infrastructure in the coming years. In that context, $100 million isn’t a game-changing amount, but the blog posted said it’s money aimed at developing new business methods. Related Stories Emmy Nominations: Disney+, Peacock & Apple Pick Up Steam As Broadcast, Amazon & FX See Declines CAA And Comcast Ventures Among Backers In $84M Funding Round For AI Firm Moonvalley AWS, a powerful engine of profit for the tech giant, used to be led by Andy Jassy. The exec was named CEO of Amazon in 2021, succeeding Jeff Bezos. Watch on Deadline The innovation center has helped “thousands of customers across industries from financial services to healthcare – including Banco Itaú, Formula 1, Fox, GovTech Singapore, Nasdaq, NFL, Rio Tinto, and RyanAir – from AI experimentation to full-scale deployment, driving millions of dollars in productivity gains and transforming customer experiences,” the blog post said. title: Se espera una tarde calurosa en la frontera
creator: Staff / El Diario de Juárez
content: Ciudad Juárez. - Esta tarde la temperatura alcanza los 35 grados centígrados (95 Fahrenheit), mientras que la temperatura mínima para hoy ronda los 31 grados centígrados (87.8 Fahrenheit), de acuerdo con Weather Channel. El reporte meteorológico señala que el cielo estará mayormente soleado con nula probabilidad de precipitación. El viento prevén que se registre en velocidades que van de 6 a 18 kilómetros por hora (3.72 a 11.18 millas por hora), según el reporte de Weather.com. Publicidad
